Then you go to the page with current tasks. Tasks are generally changed every month on the 1st day of each month. Other periods of activity may also be available (e.g. for tasks related to current events in the real world).

Sample tasks list
On the screen you will see current tasks to choose from, with basic information: task name, difficulty level, predicted rewards, number of players. You will also find information on whether this is a sponsored task or a user task.
The difficulty of the task is determined by the opinion of the players.
The new task has an "unknown"  difficulty at the beginning. Each player after completing the task is asked to determine his difficulty scale:

 easy
 rather easy
 average
 rather difficult
 difficult
 hard

The current difficulty of the task is determined by these subjective opinions. The opinions of advanced players (higher status) is more important than the beginners opinions.
You will find out about the award system later...
Selecting a task
Selecting a task from the tasks list will take you go to the current task window. You will find here all information about the terms of the task, the rules of his scoring, or the secondary maps and your task history.
Sample task conditions:

Task: 8 new wonders of the world
Goal: Visit 8 new wonders of the world in the shortest possible time and return to the starting airport
Start: Any airport in the world, any day and time.
List of mandatory sights to visit:

Great Wall of China, Beijing +, China
Petra, Wadi Musa +, Jordan
Statue of Christ, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
Machu Picchu, Cusco +, Peru
Chichen Itza, Merida +, Mexico
Colosseum, Rome, Italy
Taj Mahal, Agra, India
Great Pyramids of Giza, Cairo +, Egypt


Note: A "+" sign means that the sight is located near the place.
Sample scoring rules:

Countries: standard
Airports: standard
Places: standard
Mandatory sights: x5
Other sights: standard
Sights categories: standard
Activities: standard
Activity types: standard
Meetings: standard
Postcards: standard
Money spent: standard
Time: x5
Task completing: standard

 
After reviewing the task, you can start, continue or restart it. During the task, you can check your current detailed results and your place in the task classification. You can also see the current classification of a given task, a map showing the places visited and to visit, the location of other players online.

Sample appearance of the current task page 
Warning! User can perform each task any number of times, but only the best result will be saved in the task history. The best result will also affect the total number of visited countries, airports, places, sights, activities, categories of sights and types of activities – that is, the values accumulated from all user completed tasks affecting its status in the game.
User panel
At any time by clicking on the username, you can access the user panel, where you can see your status, achievements (tasks history, rankings, best results). You can also log out and change the user. Here you can also change some parameters of your account – for example, change your profile picture.

The countries visited by the user in all the tasks in which he participated and his status.
In the user panel, you can also see what you have purchased, the expiration date and purchase new facilities... Generally, payments can be made through PayPal. Financial prizes are transferred to the user through PayPal as well.
From the user panel, you can manage postcards made during game play – edit them, change their status from public to private and vice versa. You can also send postcards in the form of posts on Facebook or finished JPG images via e-mails, instant messengers, other social networking sites.
Some of the information contained in this panel is available to other users via chat (achievements in the game, a map of visited countries, public postcards, profile picture, a country you represent).
In the user panel, you will also find your unique link to send to friends as a game invitation. Inviting friends to play affects the prize pool (see Prizes section). In addition, for successful invitations to every 10 people (successful invitation = new user visit www.baveltravel.com with your unique link sent to him, sign up and start doing any task) you will get a free " starter pack" – the same as when registering to the game. You can use this package yourself or transfer it to another player.
Statuses
There are no classic levels in this game. The status of the user is determined by a number of visited countries for all tasks in which the user participated. The remaining parameters (number of completed tasks, visited airports, places, etc.) are included in the overall rating of the users with the same number of visited countries. Statuses are updated with the appearance of new tasks on the first day of the month.
Depending on the number of countries visited, users receive statuses according to the scheme:


Visited countries
Status
Status symbol
 


1-25
Rookie
yellow scarf



26-50
Traveler
red scarf



51-100
Guide
green scarf



101-150
Globetrotter
blue scarf



151-200
Conqueror
brown scarf



201+
Master
black scarf



I plan the possibility to buy (for the lowest levels)/receive free (for higher levels – from the globetrotter up) scarfs in status color with logo and game name. However, this requires additional organizational activities – such as ordering appropriate scarfs and organizing cheap shipping. However, I need information of the needs, which will come out only after the game release. If my campaign collects 200% of the required founds then scarfs will be for sure and will be given to the donors first.
Let's return to the tasks.
Performing tasks
You can start the task, continue the interrupted task or restart it. When you perform a task for the first time (or restart it), the task always starts at an airport. This is the starting point, where, in many tasks, you must return to complete the task.
When you play in the free version – airport and the start time is drawn – this is the only random element in the game! You may not accept the draw result and draw a different starting point, but each repetition of the draw will cost you a couple of points.
Once you have purchased "Starting Point" feature you will be able to choose your starting point and start time, and you can also draw airport without loss of points. This makes it easier for you to get a better result of task because you can choose a popular airport (e.g. Amsterdam (AMS)) with a lot of connections and choose an optimal departure time. When unhappily you draw the airport at the "end of the world" with the nearest plane in 3 days, you may lose a lot of time... but also gain on visited sights, airports or countries! Starting point does not count for rankings – only the places to which you reach count. The starting point airport will count only when you return to this place...
The game starts at the departure time or any other move from the airport to another place (while you are waiting for the plane, you can explore the area).
Navigation in the game

The screen in the game is divided into panels:

Menu – general game options,
Position – your geographical location or in-game location,
The main panel – shows maps, basic information, checklists (e.g. schedule); you will also find buttons to continue playing here,
Go back – a button that allows you to return to the previously displayed page/option,
Auxiliary panel – shows additional information: descriptions of selected items in the main panel, description of markings on maps, selection options,
Score – your current score,
Navigation – Main panel content selection buttons,
Game time – current time in the game – local time in the place, time zone and day of the week; below is an "artificial horizon" visualization of time of day.


Examples of "artificial horizons" with the default background colors of the application.
User interface consists of cards in responsive design. The location of the cards varies depending on the screen size of the device on which you play. This is a mockup only!. The final appearance of the application will be determined later, as a result of planned cooperation with the graphic designer.
When do you earn points?
In the case of airports – when you get there. In the case of countries – when you leave the airport (when you are just going to another plane, the airports are treated extraterritorially – they have no assigned country or place). Points for places – when you get there. Points for sights and activities – when you finish visiting/participating.
The diagram below shows the basic possibilities of moving in the game.

In all places, you can just wait – only move the game clock. This may be needed when you are waiting for a plane, you are waiting for a meeting, you are waiting to open a sight, etc. Clock shifts cost you only a correction of the task time.
Virtual backpack
You can also use the virtual backpack and check its contents. You have souvenirs (see below) and diary there. In the diary you have information on whether you have rented a car, when and where to return it, whether you have a valid daily public transport ticket in the place where you are and notes like your planned aircraft departure time, bus departure time – in due course diary will remind you that you need to go to the airport/bus stop. In the backpack, you can also find SOLVER – a useful travel planning tool (see section Paid Facilities).
When you are at the airport:

Sample airport connection map
You can wait and change to another plane. You have an up-to-date schedule, with all available flights, their prices, duration and time of arrival at other airports, including time zones. But if you plane departures after midnight or waiting for the plane is longer than 8h then you have to go to the city center, near the airport, to the hotel for the accommodation or you can visit some sights.

Sample timetable
In the user panel, you can buy the "Flying miles" facility, which gives you a 50% discount on the next connection. More precisely, if at the airport you only change plane – that is, you arrived and before 8 hours fly away somewhere else, you get a discount – 50% of the standard price of cheaper of these two connections. This does not apply to the "cheap lines" – there are no discounts! But in the meantime, you can go to the city center and get some points visiting available sights ☺ You only have to return within 8 hours...
You can rent a car. Prices depend on country and city. In each country there is also a different fuel price.
In some cities, you can buy a 24-hour public transport ticket.
You can go to the city center by public transport, special airport-center connection (e.g. in Shanghai by magnetic rail), taxi or rented car. All travel options have their price and duration.
You can go to another city or airport by rented car, taxi, bus or hitch.
You can "save" to the diary, in your virtual backpack, departure time of selected connection, you want to use after spending time in the area. Diary reminds you when you must return to the airport.
When you are in the city center

Sample map of sights
Just like at the airport you can rent a car and/or buy a 24-hour public transport ticket.
You can use the hotel (actually, the application will tell you that the night is approaching, all the facilities for sightseeing are closed and will direct you to the hotel automatically, where you have to spend at least 8 hours). You will be charged daily for meals and accommodation depending on your actual location. In the user panel, you can purchase a "Hotel facility" – 25% hotel discount. The hotels are located in the city center and if you are anywhere in the city center you need 10 minutes walk to the hotel. You can also come directly to the hotel from the airport.

Sample list of sights available from the city center
You can explore the city center on foot. There is a standard time of 10 minutes to go among sights. How to visit the sight? About that later...
You can go to visit a sight outside the center. Various options are available – a pedestrian crossing, public transportation, taxi hire, rented car.
You can go to visit a sight outside the city by rented car, taxi, bus or hitch.
You can buy activity. Activities are not related to a particular place on the map. Treat it as an organized trip, someone will come up for you, take you to the right place, and then take you back. Activities take a certain amount of time, you have to pay for them and take place in a "logical" time interval (e.g. dive trips must start after dawn, a certain amount of time is required, but must end e.g. one hour after dusk; you choose the departure time yourself).
You can return to the airport (same options as the airport transfer to the center). But remember one rule – ALWAYS you must be at the airport at least 40 minutes before departure!
Once you reach the sight outside the city center 
You can return to the center/hotel – transport options such as the road from the center to the sight. You can do it after visiting the attractions or without visiting it – because you have a plane soon or upon arrival, it turned out that the object is already closed and you did not notice it ☺
In some cities apart from the center are separated "zones" – these are areas with several sights located close to each other, but outside the center. In such cases, you can go within the standard 10 minutes to another sight.
Traveling directly between sights placed not in the city center or not in the same "zone" is not permitted. In this case, you must first return to the center and then move on to another sight.
Summary of transport options
Plane – departs according to the timetable, moves very quickly, the price is partly related to the distance traveled. Planes always lands at the airport, from which you have to go by other means of communication to the nearest city or other selected place. You need to be at the airport at least 40 minutes before the departure.
On foot – only for short distances, slowly but for free and you are not waiting. There is a standard time of 10 minutes to travel among the sights in the city center and in the "zones".
Airport-to-airport communication – sometimes there are dedicated connections on the airport-center-airport route, such as fast train – such connections may have a special price, they can also be accounted as other connections in the public transport system.
Public transport – the primary way of moving around cities. In many cities, you can also use the 24-hour ticket. With such a ticket, you can go for the duration of 24 hours after first use of the communication free of charge, otherwise, single-pass charges are charged when you get on the city bus, subway, tram. The overall average fast but cheap. For simplicity, you leave after 5 minutes of waiting.

Taxi – you can go anywhere, relatively fast, but expensive. You pay for the distance traveled. A taxi can carry between 1 and 4 passengers. You can share the cost with other passengers. Time from order to taxi arrival – 5 minutes
Bus – is used to travel between cities, airports, or between a city and a sight. A scheduling algorithm was created, simulating the rules of operation of real bus operators. I assume that the buses leave the city center and finish the route in the center of another city, at the airport or at a distant sight. There are courses in reverse directions, too. Cheap, slower than a rented car, you have to adjust to the schedule.
Rented car – you pay for a 24-hour rental in advance. You can extend your rent for another 24 hours. Usually, you have the option of standard renting with the return in the same point or more expensive options with the ability to return anywhere in the same country or even abroad. You pay the fuel costs for each km you drive – the fuel cost is charged at the return of the car. You can ride "bus routes", but you are not limited by schedules. You must take breaks during your trip. The rented car can take from 1 to 4 people. The fastest means of land transport, guaranteeing temporary independence. Rented car can also travel in cities at the same speed as taxis, but access to the center "costs" you 15 minutes to find a car park ☺
Hitchhikers also go on "bus routes", but on other terms. I think hitchhiking is everywhere popular (but I plan to research how it looks in reality in different countries – for now, it's a fresh idea and needs to be refined ☺). You can catch cars from dawn to dusk. Each time you catch a hitch for 30 minutes and then it carries you for max 1 hour.
Same as fast as a rented car. If you do not reach the destination within an hour, you will lose 30 minutes to catch another hitch and you will be traveling another hour. You can ride alone or with one extra person. You can hitch efficiently using souvenirs whose way of buying is described further. You can "pay" the driver who will chase you with a souvenir. Each souvenir has its own strength, which you can express in the distance you are carried by the hitch. When you catch a hitch in the afternoon and pay by a valuable souvenir, you can drive even through the night and save money on the hotel – you just fall asleep during the hitch!
I also plan to introduce rail connections and some water communication: ferries, boats to hire, cruisers. Ferries are partially implemented but in undisclosed form – travel time takes into account ferry time but does not generate extra travel expenses.
Railway connections require additional research – each country needs to be treated very individually. It would be interesting to introduce the possibility of moving TGV or another high-speed rail system, but developing a simulation of the right quality can be very time-consuming to prepare.
I am tempted by the option of renting airplanes – but it is more about my fascination with aviation than with the needs of the game ☺. But on the other hand, it would be possible to use small airports that are not used for day-to-day communication and facilitate getting into interesting sights located far from large airports... For now, the flight of the small plane is available as one of the type of activities.
How to visit the sight?

An example Wikipedia page describing the tourist attraction and sightseeing options
Once you reach the sight, a page from Wikipedia will appear on the screen describing this sight. To earn points for visiting sight, you must have at least one interaction with this site – scroll through the page to the end, click on any photo or change the language of the page. This is done ESPECIALLY – the goal of the game is to learn something! I hope that your general knowledge will increase ☺
When you select the tour option, you will see a short animation of the elapsed time. Every 5 minutes of game time equals 1 second of animation. Visiting an example object will, in fact, last 12 to 18 seconds! Similar animations will appear during virtual travel by any means of transport.
Postcards 
Once you have visited the sight, before deciding where you are going, you can generate your own "postcard". You can use any of the Wikipedia commons pictures (copyright issues) and simply insert into picture your profile photo or other picture previously uploaded via user panel, your username and some text (from ready-made templates or at your own choice). You can change the size, location, and color of these items. The application will add a BavelTravel logo and signature to the post containing the location of the object, original signature, and picture author data (license requirements). For making a "postcard" you will get points and you will be able to put it in your postcard album and send it to whom you want (see User panel).

Sample "postcard"
Souvenirs
When you visit sights or participate in activities in some places you can buy souvenirs. These are, of course, virtual souvenirs, they are not named, but they "remember" the place of their purchase. As part of the "education" of the game, I will try to determine what are the real souvenirs characteristic of the country and place ☺.
Every souvenir has a reasonable price – about 20 GLD. But souvenirs are not so easy to buy... You have to look for them. You can buy them on average every fifth tourist attraction. When you do not have a place in your virtual backpack, before you buy a new souvenir, you have to use an older one.

Each souvenir has variable strength, which depends on the distance between the place where you are located and the place of purchase of the souvenir (air distance by the orthodox – it is such information for curious ☺). What is the use of souvenirs? To "pay" for hitchhiking, to "pay" for accommodation while hitchhiking and to "bribe" staff to let you visit sights outside opening hours/days.☺
You can hitch a distance of 1/10 of its current strength, i.e. the distance from the place of purchase in kilometers. Suppose you bought a souvenir in Brazil. You are now somewhere in Europe. From the place of purchase is e.g. 8000 km, that is, you will ride hitchhiking 800 km, and if you choose the right moment of its use you will not pay the cost of accommodation – you will just sleep in the car.
If you want to pay for the hotel souvenir strength is converted to GLD. Souvenir value in GLD is 1/10 of its current strength. For example, if a hotel costs 200 GLD then look for a souvenir in the backpack purchased at least 2000 km from your actual location Note: souvenir cannot be paid in part, nor does it get "rest". So if you have to pay 200 GLD and you have a souvenir of 1500 km "strength" you cannot use it. When you have a souvenir of 3500 km "strength" using it you "overpay".
Little bribe. Example: You want to visit the museum on Monday and it turns out to be closed. You can try to "bribe" the staff to let you in. Of course, cash does not come into play! But if the strength of your souvenir converted into GLD (as for paying for a hotel) will exceed the price of an admission +20 GLD you will be admitted to. ☺ The same applies to visiting the sight after the official closing time or before opening.
You do not have to remember all these conversions. The game itself will tell you if you can use a souvenir.
Perhaps during the development of the game or in some specific tasks, the souvenirs will be used in some other way. Remember! There is a strength in souvenirs ☺
Meetings, chat, and blog
These functionalities have already been described in previous chapters...
 
Here is the end of my description of the game. In case of doubt please ask questions. A lot of this and I could skip something...
There are still 2 topics:
Paid facilities

Purchased facilities, terms of their validity, prices
Discounts on hotels and air connections have already been described. Just like choosing a starting point.
Another facility is obvious nowadays – no ads. By displaying ads, app users can play for free. But many are upset. Hence, this possibility.
And the latest facility – useful for more advanced players in the planning of travel. I called them NEXT HOP. It allows you to view, without moving from the airport, flight schedules of another airport connected with current airport. This allows you to check, for example, what time you have to fly from the "actual" airport, to catch another plane at another airport.
If you purchase the NEXT HOP, you will find in your backpack an additional, very useful route planning tool – SOLVER. This tool can answer you where is the best place to get to the place you are looking for. You can also set the day and time when you want to get there. You can use SOLVER at any time and ask for access to any location – you can search for a country, airport, city, sight. SOLVER also allows you to search for the nearest places where selected type of activity or sight category is available. Finally, it shows the location of various "useful" places to perform a specific task.
You can buy one facility or a bundle of all facilities for one month. Of course, I recommend buying the bundle ☺
Facilities can be paid from any PayPal account (such as parents, adult friends)
Facilities may change during game development. But you will always be able to buy a bundle of all the facilities for a fixed price of $4.99 per month. I only reserve the possibility of changing the price in the case of major currency market changes or changes in the PayPal commissions.
Prizes

Those who achieve the best results in the given task will be rewarded. Prizes may vary in each task.
Generally, for the best result in a given task or some best results (2nd and 3rd place, the top ten) financial awards are provided (or material prizes from the sponsors). The prize pool is given for each task in the tasks list. More detailed information can be found in the task description.
The "+" of the prize amount means that the prize will increase as the number of players performing the given task increases (both free and paid). Therefore, it is beneficial of the players ito invite friends to play, for example through social networking sites.
Important note! Prizes are given as gross amounts, which does not include any applicable taxes in your country and money transfer costs. Depending on the user's residence, taxes can be settled automatically or the user will receive a tax-deductible email. In most countries, there are certain amounts of tax-free winnings. Usually, such amounts are around $500, so there should not be a problem with settling typical winnings. Financial awards can only be received by adults who have an active PayPal account registered for the same email address as given when registering for the game!
In addition, the best players get "status rewards" – public information about the user in the form of icons and descriptions, for results in a given task:

1, 2, 3 places
Placement in the top 10
Placement in the top 100
Placement in the first 10% of players

In addition, depending on the number of players in a given task, you can get a free "starter pack" – the same as a new player signing up. This package can be used by itself or given to any user of the game.
At the end of each month, the user status is updated. As I have written before, I plan to introduce the scarfs/bandanas as status symbols. Obtaining a globetrotter or higher status will be associated with a gift in the form of a corresponding scarf surface-mailed to a previously set e-mail physical address. Minors are also involved.
There are also status icons for reaching each sight category and type of activity. It's a bit like picking scout skills. J
And finally... see rest of the story

story:
Abstract

GoldenChip is a gaming platform that shares its profit and is based on the EOS.IO blockchain. The blockchain ecosystem has enabled us to form a new gambling platform that provides a safe, trustworthy and unlimited gambling system. All games found on the platform are extremely fair because they are maintained by the blockchain. The GCHIP tokens provide their holders with the dividends obtained from the game profits on the platform. At the same time due to the cross-platform, users can play at any time and from any device.

The team of GoldenChip has a large experience of working as a developer of mobile games on Web, IOS, and Android on the blockchain there are many DApps, but we are sure that our expertise in developing games, operatingand marketing them will enable us to become market leaders.

 

1. ​Introduction

Our team started its professional activity in developing games in 2010. In 2012 the whole industry started being involved into the mobile world. Therefore, we started developing mobile games, too. We performed all actions – including design, development, operation and marketing – on our own without attracting any third parties. It allowed us to obtain perfect gaming experience. We have learnt how to attract users and publicity, how to maintain users, and how to prolong the game popularity. It took us only several years to achieve more than 10 million downloads and gain above 1 million users who actively played our games.

Our deep involvement in the cryptocurrency industry has started since 2015. Certainly, it set some challenges, but at the same time it allowed us looking at our activity in a new and unprejudiced way. We started developing unique games that made us different from our competitors. Moreover, it allowed us to become absolute market leaders. Step by step we launched our own mining pool and thus made our own contribution to the network. We fixed daemon bugs and provided feedback. The industry was growing, so were we. We learnt how to add something exciting and entirely new to the network. We based our gaming philosophy on three presumptions: firstly, people love games, secondly, they prefer simple games and avoid complexity, and thirdly, they do not like high cost and high risks. Thanks to the EOS.IO blockchain, we have a perfect platform where we can easily achieve our goals. As soon as the blockchainwas launched, our team began to plan and find the best method to develop on it. The code of implementing the node was read, our own endpoints were built, and as a result a sustainable and safe network on the cloud was provided. Each step was taken as carefully as possible until the whole blockchain was perfectly understood. At last, our first project – GoldenChip – was launched.

The EOS.IO blockchain is the basis of GoldenChip. It offers a reliable, profitable and top-quality gambling expertise on the Internet. It involves the principles of not only traditional online gambling platforms, but also online cryptocurrency casinos. At the same time it has not the disadvantages of those above, including high commission fees, slow depositing and withdrawing, and lack of reliability. Our company has the aim to become the largest cryptocurrency gambling platform. We know that we can achieve this goal only by sharing our own profits with holders of our tokens. Thus, we invite every user to join us and help us to increase our community. We are sure that in addition to our own team and our offer, these are users who create the value. Joining us, you contribute to working out a perfect solution on developing and marketing that is sure to benefit each owner of our tokens.

 

2. Market Analysis

2.1 General Data

The following activities are thought to be online gambling:

  • casino games,
  • bingo,
  • lotteries,
  • sports betting
  • poker.

The largest share of the market is made by sports betting and casino games. The latter include such activities as slot machines, dice and roulette. According to some forecasts, by 2022 online gambling will have achieved USD 59.79 billion.

 

Fig. 1. Global Market of Gambling from 2009 to 2015, Including Forecasts for 2016-2020

https://www.statista.com/statistics/270728/market-volume-of-online-gaming-worldwide/

 

2.2 ChallengesTraditional Casinos Face

This is not a secret that traditional casinos face a lot of difficulties and shortcomingsthat complicate the attraction of new users. We are sure that the operation performed on the EOS.IO blockchain will make it possible to avoidthe above problems.

 

Challenge 1. Tokens are insignificant

In some traditional casinos tokens are issued for their users, but the majority of them are insignificant because they are not circulated and there are no loyal users. Sometimes issuers pump and dump their tokens to increase the price by making recommendations that are based on incorrect, false or greatly dramatized statements. Besides, some issuers even betray the users’ confidence as soon as they issue the ICO.

In order to issue the most trustable tokens, our team made the decision to launch the platform. It showed our hard work at developing and marketing for the game success. Our tokens are actively circulating on the exchange and market, and we entirely control them. Moreover, each token owner can fully control them by auditing how coins are spent. We share our profits, and thus we make up a foundation value for all coins. It means that the value will never become zero. When tokens are issued by the users who play the game, it means that we have sufficient profit and it will never be zero. Only a little part of the tokens is reserved for ourselves. It means that it never stops developing because we personally have a great interest in the token success and value. We conducted a small and short-term token sale. Our task was to prove that we do not scam or deceive our users. All we want is to start the project that has enough budget to let us achieve our success.

 

Challenge 2: Slow withdrawals and deposits

The players attending ordinary casinos have to change chips or credit a definite amount of money. However, they often wait for a long period time to get a cashback. The progress itself is too slow. In fact, it is far from reliable and the results are not too good. These are the most common issues:

  1. It is easy to deposit money but it is difficult to withdraw it.
  2. The balance is displayed incorrectly.
  3. Depositing and withdrawing are slow. It may take users up to several hours to complete the action.
  4. Audit is not provided.
  5. New users are not trusted.
  6. High withdrawal fees are demanded.

To solve these problems, any EOS-based tokens are accepted for our games. EOS enables users toapply their coins without making any deposits and/or withdrawals. Instant payments and payoutsonly provefull confidence and safety. It also diminishes the risk of bugs. The blockchain records all transactions. It means that all records can be easily audited by any user at any time.

 

Challenge 3: Attacks of bots

Attacks of bots are the most ordinary attack an online casino may suffer. Especially in relation to smart contracts, users can push actions directly to the blockchain without using the gaming platform. Besides, creating bots, it is possible to get benefits from every event organized by us. Of course, it is not fair in relation to any other players, when the majority of the rewards are taken by attacker. This is not our aim.

To solve this problem and in general to eliminate this situation, our team will implement a special mechanism on checking sums to make sure that all players are pushing actions on our platform. It is hard for attackers to forge the request because the checksum mechanism is calculated in private. It requires a lot of work to understand and get the answer. This is how we can decrease the number of bots and protect the rights of all our users.

 

Challenge 4: Almost unsecure

Traditional online casinos tend to collect personal information. Users are required to providetheir passport number, details of bank accounts, real name, etc. for verification and payouts. In spite of the fact that all these details are sensitive, they are stored in unsafe servers that can be easily accessed by hackers. As a result, some valuable information can leak.

These and other associated problems can be eliminated by using the EOS Scatter wallet. Users can access our platform by signing up and logging in through Scatter. The only data you need to use is your own device. It is up to the user whether to provide or hide his or her private information.

 

Challenge 5: The random function is unsafe

In case the random function is unwell designed, it can be vulnerable, and hackers can easily break it. Random is thought to be the most difficult part on modern computers. This is not a secret that some developers do not have enough expertise to form true random values.

These are some frequent mistakes made by developers:

1. The use of easily estimated seed for random,

2. The use of any deterministic value (user id, time) as a seed for generating random value,

3. The use of hashing functions for generating pseudorandom number

4. The use of unequal distributed random values.

Real random function is extremely important for an online casino. It is unfair in relation to users when a weak random function is selected because in spite of the correct nature of probability, the output is still biased.

        Real Random Function               Weak Random Function

To solve this problem, we aim at generating a random value, and use a cryptographically secure generator of pseudorandom numbers. In this case it is difficult for attackers to guess or evaluate the future value. Thus, it provides our platform and our token owners with the best safety.

 

Challenge 6: Games are not proved to be fair

Most of active casinos are proved to be unfair. It means that the site can cheat any user by selecting a lottery winner they favor. All winners are selected on a random basis.

As for our games, all of them are completely transparent and fair. All of them are smart contracts that are executed by the EOS.IO blockchain. They are maintained by all producers. As soon as it is released, no part of it can be changed or modified. Its fair nature can be proved by the way it works. Every play is calculated by using three parameters – the client seed, the server seed, and nonce.

The user can see the client seed and nonce used for the next roll, as well as a hash of the server seed. At the user’s request, it is possible to change the client seed. The server seed is kept in secret before dice rolling. After rolling, the user will get a receipt about the use of the server seed. Then it is possible to check out whether this was the same server seed we mentioned before the roll by checking if the hash of this seed matches the hash shown before the roll.

 

3 GoldenChip Platform

The market comprises many gambling platforms. Ours is special because

  • We support multi-currency,
  • We share our profit, and
  • We develop a lot of various games.

More than that, we provide the most sustainable servers by means of covering CDN that is protected by the cloud firewall. Smart AI is used to momentary detect suspicions actions. The cross-platform allows our users to play our games at any time and in any place they want.

 

3.1 Variety of Games

We are planning to develop all types of games. We will not stop at dice betting game only. We are going to release about 1-3 games per month. We want to offer a full win-win solution among all holders of tokens. We will develop all kinds of games on the platform and make them long-lasting. This will allow us to protect our tokens and achieve our main goal – to create the first gambling platform that immediately shares profit in the world.

 

3.2 Multi-Currency

On the EOS.IO blockchain there are a lot of various coins. In addition to the main EOS, we will support all coins on the platform. Thus, users will be free to choose any coin for betting. Moreover, our team supports betting by using GCHIP tokens. It means that users can use tokens both for sharing the profit, and playing our games.

 

3.3 Dynamic Max Bet

Max bet is set to prevent from running out of our bankroll. At the same time when a higher max bet is allowed, it can benefit large players and let them play by using many various strategies. Numbers and probability are calculated accurately, it is still possible for players to consecutively win. In order to prevent bankruptcy, there are platforms that set a fixed max bet in ratio to their bankroll. For example, 1,000 is set as a cap for every bet if the bankroll comprises 100K. Thus, there is a room for some lucky players. However, it is difficult to increase the max bet because much bankroll is required to do this. We have invented another method:

Using our formula, various kinds of players can be satisfied by dynamic max bet. It is possible for them to bet large amounts with low expected value, as well as small amounts with high expected value. Typically, the max bet is increased ~100x with the same bankroll by using this mechanism. Our team does not need manual setting of the max bet. Our system automatically protects us from the bankruptcy.

 

3.4 Private EOS Endpoints

Outside there are many sites, but they are not sustainable because it is possible for an EOS node to run on a single core, and no multithreading implementation is possible. It is difficult to grow if the team does not have enough expertise. That is why it is necessary to create and maintain private load balanced sites.

To do this, it is necessary to apply a load balancer and establish a lot of single core servers to run only one EOS node per one server. Since there is too short block time for EOS, it is impossible to synchronize all nodes. Some of them can be outdated and cause the head block number to jump up and down. We know how to solve this problem. It is necessary to implement our own custom load balancer. However, this requires special knowledge and expertise.

The GoldenChip team is lucky to have several years’ experience of operating data centers and managing servers. That is why this is not a big problem for us. To provide our users with a sustainable and top-quality service, we have brought to life our own private site with the ability of AI load balancing. We select the best backup node and automatically filter bad and outdated nodes. Thus, we provide modern and scalable sites, and efficiently make a single core EOS official node that runs on various nodes.

Of course, it takes extra cost to maintain our own private site. However, in spite of this we are sure that it is worth it because it allows us to provide our users with the best gaming environment.

 

3.5 Leaderboard

“Wishing to win” against “wishing to avoid loss” is a crucial distinction. According to Murayama and Elliot (2012), the competition effects depend on this distinction in the players’ minds. When someone wants to be better than others, they try to benefit from the competition. But when they wish to avoid acting worse than others, competing tends to decrease their performance.

The quote is based on: https://medium.com/practical-motivation-science/how-to-motivate-with-leaderboards-da5a461fb2f6

The leaderboard is designed on the basis of self-determination theory. According to this theory, people take part in various activities to meet their fundamental psychological needs. The leaderboardcan satisfy one’s conceit. Users set accurate goals when they play in our platform. They want to get the first ranking in the board. Besides, users learn about their progress when they check the leaderboard. This is also one of the ways to interact with other players. We are sure that competition has a motivating nature and stimulates users to achieve even more. We will offer an online leaderboard next to the game. It will show top users.

 

3.6 Lotteries

Lottery is one more way to keep users playing on our platform. It does not matter when a user places a bet in any game, 10% of this fee is placed in the lottery pot. It will ensure our pot from lacking tokens.

1 lottery ticket is provided to users for 1 token they bet. It is also possible to buy 1,000 tickets with 1 token. 80% of the income obtained from selling tickets will be placed in the lottery pot. The rest of the funds will be the profit.

Every ticket will be numbered in sequence. Ten numbers of lottery tickets will be taken out each hour, and their holders will share the lottery pot as the distribution below.

Our platform supports multi-token. That is why every token will run its own lottery. Thus, all users have an opportunity to win a large prize when betting in any of our games, and it does not matter whether they win or lose.

It motivates users to go on using our platform and contributes to retaining users.

 

3.7 Lucky Payment

All users can roll a number to win free EOS on a daily basis without any additional expenses and any risk.

We are sure that this strategy is good because it increases the user involvement and attracts a lot of users. We have to pay tokens for prizes, but in spite of this we realize this is relatively cheap as compared to other types of marketing campaigns.

Besides, providing users with free tokens is better than spending them on advertising and promotional campaigns. On the one hand, it can increase the brand and user loyalty, and on the other hand, it retains our user base. The higher the customer lifetime value is, the more profit we can obtain at the end.

The rewards based on the statistics collected over time will be reviewed and adjusted to make sure that the rewards are attractive for users and profitable for us.

 

3.8 Achievements

Achievements are a perfect way to rise the users’ involvement on our platform. We offer users several missions to complete. Achievements are unlocked afterwards. These missions encourage and motivate our users to pass on various features they might not make a try of on their own initiative. Achievements can also be a wonderful approach to design missions to get greater user retention rate. Users will wish to go on playing on our platform even more.

 

3.9 GCHIP tokens

We are motivated by the users who continue playing on our platform and it makes them happy. We enjoy immediately sharing our profit with them. At the same time immediate payout is a great challenge because it comprises a high degree of server workload, a swift change of the balance, and a high cost of network fees. We have made an accurate investigation and learnt how to make immediate payout. Now our users can get their own profit quickly and without any worries. What have we done? We have invented an entirely new token – GCHIP.

 

Max Supply: 18.022.400.000

 

What does the name mean?

The GCHIP name is not originated from “Gambling”. On the contrary, it symbolizes “Fate” and “Gold”. All our existence looks like a GCHIP game. Every new step is made of luck and randomness, while the future itself is the result of this arbitrariness. Moreover, like life itself, GCHIP is exciting and unexpected because you can both win and lose.

 

Why large max supply?

We made a decision to use a large max supply for marketing because most of users prefer big numbers. Tosucceed, it is necessary to focus on marketing rather than on anything else. This is an important point, although manytoken issuers do not pay due attention to it. No negative effect is here because profit is shared on theproportional basis. It also simplifies immediate payouts.

 

How to create GCHIP value?

There is no sense to issue tokens that have no value. In order to create this value, our company is going to launch an entirely new gambling platform. All owners of tokens will be able to share the platform profits. Our goal is to develop an entirely winning solution. We believe that GCHIP will become one of the most valuable tokens on theexchange.

 

Detailed Distribution

 

Cost of Startup (10%)

High costs are required for operating a gambling site. They include network, server, marketing and other fees. We will issue 1 token as the startup cost for each 10 tokens that are issued from the overall supply. This will confirm that at the same time large amounts of tokens are not issued. It will allow protect rights of all token holders. More than that, these tokens will not be staked for sharing profit.

 

Prize Fund (50%)

The fund of prize is the most crucial in our business.It is motivating for our users and makes them bet. It is known that themore tokens are bet by our users, the more profit is made, and the more dividends are received by our token owners. It is the same as in the case of mining bitcoins.To earn more, it is necessary to invest more.This strategy is based on the betting is mining principle. It is the solution that never loses. 204.8 tokens will be issued for each 1 EOS bet, and the final reward is divided into two after every 5% tokens are issued in this manner.

 

Tokens Sale (20%)

We need to have a considerable budget for operating the site. It is necessary to secure the servers to offer our users the safest and most reliable environment. It is necessary to make a private EOS site to eliminate the unstable nature of a public site. Moreover, this is a great challenge to manage wallets and make immediate payouts.

The token sale will be launched for 15 days. All tokens that remain are going to be transformed into the fund for motivating the team. After the token sale, we will start sharing the profit. This is when owners of tokens can claim their dividends. Moreover, we have managed to contract exchange platforms. As a result, our coin will be listed after the token sale. 10,000 GCHIP will be issued to the buyer for every EOS. Thus, in total about 360,448 EOS will be funded.

We will use the raised funds for:

1. Developing more gaming products,

2. Fees for law consultations,

3. Maintaining the platform cost,

4. Larger bankroll to invite more serious players,

5. Paying network fees, predominantly staking NET and CPU, and buying RAM,

6. Marketing costs, and

7. Maintaining cost of the private efficient sites.

According to our latest calculations and evaluations, it is necessary to stake at least 30K+ EOS. This amount will let us provide our users with the best user experience.

 

Motivating the Team (10%)

We are going to continue developing new games. We plan to release from 1 to 3 games each month. To do this, we need to encourage our team. It also includes compensation. Thus, we are going to provide them with token after 50% of all tokens have been issued. 2 tokens are issued from every 10 tokens of the total supply to make sure that no larger number of tokens is issued simultaneously. It will allow to protect rights of everyone. Besides, in the first half of the year they will not be staked for sharing profit.

 

Bounty Program (10%)

 

Bug Reports

We believe that for our business the contract we offer is perfect. We will not let any bugs. Every user who reports about bugs is sure to be rewarded 1,000 GCHIP. As for serious bug reports that, for example, cause the loss of platform, the reward will be 100,000 GCHIP for each reporter.

 

Referral Program

It is extremely important to launch and implement a referral program. In fact, it does not require many funds to get new users. A small motivation fee is a perfect incentive for users to invite their friends to the platform. Sharing positive feedbacks about the platform is a wonderful marketing tool that will allow attracting more and more new loyal users. We are sure it will enable us to expend the platform and increase profits. We will inform about the details later.

 

Rewards for Signup

During some period of time users will be given 1,000 GCHIP upon signup. We think that a reward for signupis crucial to attract new users.

 

Events

We are planning to organize various events to efficiently boost the revenues. It will also allow us saving on marketing. This is because our users will act as promoters sharing information about our platform with their friends and acquaintances. Our experience shows that events are effective for attracting public attention. Positive gaming experience and funs on the platform will allow growing our user base.

 

3.10 Revenues Use and Profit Sharing

We are going to become a stable platform that will continue operating for a long period of time. We do not aim at instant profits and escaping. We want to expand our business. That is why we need a good and efficient strategy. It is not easy to adjust the use. To compete, we need power and the ability to make our users happy. We have made much research and investigations, and came to the conclusion that the following revenue distribution scheme will be the most efficient one:

 

Bankroll (40%)

Bankroll must include the downward side of the variation expected for a certain stake. The platform cannot withhold a certain amount as the funds.

A famous strategy based on double up betting is used by many players because they are persuaded that it is always winning. In fact, according to mathematics, this strategy is a high risk. It is not that difficult to lose 10 rounds in a row. The table below demonstrates the statistic when 50% is chosen as the expected value and starting with $1:

 

The actual payout is similar to the expected one, but the user needs much money to bet for a dollar. If you have the bankrollover, you will become a bankrupt. In case of a cap in the game, this strategy is very difficult to play.

It is the same about the casino. If there is no enough bankroll, it is necessary to limit the amount for betting to avoid the use of this strategy. The bankroll supports the betting limit. A larger bankroll means our ability to support a higher betting limit. In its turn, it enables users to bet at a higher amount. Having a high limit, users can use more betting strategies. It makes them feel comfortable and they do not stop playing even using large amounts. It increases the odds of losing more eventually.

But what will happen if we add the tax?

 

The user loses money after round 5 when the tax is used because of the wrong calculation. We must not double the wager, it is also necessary to consider the tax in the calculation to eliminate this flaw. There are still a lot of players who fail to understand this flaw and go on playing.

There are also a lot of players who bet non-stop. They are mainly small players. According to the Pareto principle, 80% of the profit is generated by 20% of the players. If the limit for betting is too low, there is the risk to lose that part of income.

A larger bankroll also means our ability to launch more games. In its turn, it will attract more players and thus generate more revenues and make the competitiveness better.

We need to increase the bankroll as quickly as possible. This will allow us to compete with others. A higher bankroll is crucial for getting a competitive benefit. Besides, they are better in the long run. Thus, we take more expenses for the bankroll purposes.

As the time goes on, the bankroll ratio is adjusted in order to make sure that the platform has enough bankroll for supporting games and is attractive for serious players. Since there are difficulties in sharing the bankroll across all games and there is a risk of attacks, the bankroll must be separated into different contracts and accounts. That is why we are in need of more bankroll to support more games. The bankroll ratio will be adjusted on the quarterly basis by using the following formula:

Besides, when the project is over, all bankroll will be spent for dividends.

 

Operating Cost (10%)

In order to make our competitiveness better, our team has to go on developing new games. The more games arelaunched, the more revenues can be generated. It is necessary to employ more and more talented and highly professionaldevelopers. This will allow us expanding globally.

We aim at providing the most stable, best and safest gaming platform. To do this, we need to maintainour own servers and network. This may require funds, but we want to minimize the costs. Using ourlarge experience, we want to make sure that our setup can support the traffic and offer the best service withlow cost.

It is not a secret that in order to become famous and popular, it is necessary to promote the platform. We are not going to spend large sums for advertising campaigns. Instead we want to use a small budget for attracting people’s attention by organizing various types of events. We are thought to be a decentralized gaming platform. Some methods of our work include contests, bonus tokens for newcomers, and media coordination.

 

Net Profit (50%)

We believe that all holders of our tokens can share their success. We are thankful to them for their contributions. We want them to be happy, highly motivated and interested. We also want to share our wealth with them. That is why we are going to share the largest part of our profit as the prize. Immediate payoutwill be adopted. To learn more, please read Section 3.12 Immediate payout.

We want to offer a gaming platform where everyone will win. It will be based on friendly entertainment and profit sharing principles.

 

3.11 Immediate Payout

We want users of our platform to accumulate and get the profit we share without any additional actions. It may seem to be difficult technically. If we want to share our profit immediately, we must know the number of the tokens that are circulating at the moment when the profit is shared. This will allow us to distribute the profit fairly. We can achieve it by taking snapshot of the EOS blockchain. Although in case of immediate profit sharing, we will need a lot of snapshots which may cause our servers over-load. Besides, it will take time to send tokens directly to holders of tokens.

In order to solve this problem, we have developed a new payout system. Now users do not need to oftenstate about theirpayout. However,it does not mean that they will miss any. All holders of the tokens who wish to share the profit should stake their GCHIP token. After that our system will accumulate the profit everyhour. They can state the accumulated rewards at any time they wish. We are going to share all profitsfrom the platform, including EOS and all tokens we support and managed to earn.

 

Profit = Current bankroll− Last bankroll

 

Foraccurately and quicklycalculating the profit, each hour will be taken as a calculationpoint. If it is positive, it will be taken as revenue. After that it will be processed for the distribution. If it is negative, it will be accumulated to the next round until becoming positiveagain. It will be processed.The interval can be shortened later. If the interval is a minuteor even a second, the payout will be made immediately.

Whenautomatically implementing the payout, the payout can be made without any additional actions. If usersset the automaticthreshold of the payout, the payout will be automatically sent by the system to their accounts in casetheir balance is above the threshold.

If users intend to use GCHIP that is staked, they will have to unstack first. GCHIP will be refunded in 24 hours. In the future it is possible to decrease it, but first it is set as 24 hours.

It will allow decreasing the server workload needed to take the EOS blockchain snapshot. Besides, it will let us share the profit in a short period of time. The reduction of the tokens circulation will also increase the tokens price.

 

4 Roadmap
story_txt:
Abstract
GoldenChip is a gaming platform that shares its profit and is based on the EOS.IO blockchain. The blockchain ecosystem has enabled us to form a new gambling platform that provides a safe, trustworthy and unlimited gambling system. All games found on the platform are extremely fair because they are maintained by the blockchain. The GCHIP tokens provide their holders with the dividends obtained from the game profits on the platform. At the same time due to the cross-platform, users can play at any time and from any device.The team of GoldenChip has a large experience of working as a developer of mobile games on Web, IOS, and Android on the blockchain there are many DApps, but we are sure that our expertise in developing games, operatingand marketing them will enable us to become market leaders. 1. ​IntroductionOur team started its professional activity in developing games in 2010. In 2012 the whole industry started being involved into the mobile world. Therefore, we started developing mobile games, too. We performed all actions – including design, development, operation and marketing – on our own without attracting any third parties. It allowed us to obtain perfect gaming experience. We have learnt how to attract users and publicity, how to maintain users, and how to prolong the game popularity. It took us only several years to achieve more than 10 million downloads and gain above 1 million users who actively played our games.Our deep involvement in the cryptocurrency industry has started since 2015. Certainly, it set some challenges, but at the same time it allowed us looking at our activity in a new and unprejudiced way. We started developing unique games that made us different from our competitors. Moreover, it allowed us to become absolute market leaders. Step by step we launched our own mining pool and thus made our own contribution to the network. We fixed daemon bugs and provided feedback. The industry was growing, so were we. We learnt how to add something exciting and entirely new to the network. We based our gaming philosophy on three presumptions: firstly, people love games, secondly, they prefer simple games and avoid complexity, and thirdly, they do not like high cost and high risks. Thanks to the EOS.IO blockchain, we have a perfect platform where we can easily achieve our goals. As soon as the blockchainwas launched, our team began to plan and find the best method to develop on it. The code of implementing the node was read, our own endpoints were built, and as a result a sustainable and safe network on the cloud was provided. Each step was taken as carefully as possible until the whole blockchain was perfectly understood. At last, our first project – GoldenChip – was launched.The EOS.IO blockchain is the basis of GoldenChip. It offers a reliable, profitable and top-quality gambling expertise on the Internet. It involves the principles of not only traditional online gambling platforms, but also online cryptocurrency casinos. At the same time it has not the disadvantages of those above, including high commission fees, slow depositing and withdrawing, and lack of reliability. Our company has the aim to become the largest cryptocurrency gambling platform. We know that we can achieve this goal only by sharing our own profits with holders of our tokens. Thus, we invite every user to join us and help us to increase our community. We are sure that in addition to our own team and our offer, these are users who create the value. Joining us, you contribute to working out a perfect solution on developing and marketing that is sure to benefit each owner of our tokens. 2. Market Analysis2.1 General DataThe following activities are thought to be online gambling:
casino games,
bingo,
lotteries,
sports betting
poker.
The largest share of the market is made by sports betting and casino games. The latter include such activities as slot machines, dice and roulette. According to some forecasts, by 2022 online gambling will have achieved USD 59.79 billion. Fig. 1. Global Market of Gambling from 2009 to 2015, Including Forecasts for 2016-2020https://www.statista.com/statistics/270728/market-volume-of-online-gaming-worldwide/ 2.2 ChallengesTraditional Casinos FaceThis is not a secret that traditional casinos face a lot of difficulties and shortcomingsthat complicate the attraction of new users. We are sure that the operation performed on the EOS.IO blockchain will make it possible to avoidthe above problems. Challenge 1. Tokens are insignificantIn some traditional casinos tokens are issued for their users, but the majority of them are insignificant because they are not circulated and there are no loyal users. Sometimes issuers pump and dump their tokens to increase the price by making recommendations that are based on incorrect, false or greatly dramatized statements. Besides, some issuers even betray the users’ confidence as soon as they issue the ICO.In order to issue the most trustable tokens, our team made the decision to launch the platform. It showed our hard work at developing and marketing for the game success. Our tokens are actively circulating on the exchange and market, and we entirely control them. Moreover, each token owner can fully control them by auditing how coins are spent. We share our profits, and thus we make up a foundation value for all coins. It means that the value will never become zero. When tokens are issued by the users who play the game, it means that we have sufficient profit and it will never be zero. Only a little part of the tokens is reserved for ourselves. It means that it never stops developing because we personally have a great interest in the token success and value. We conducted a small and short-term token sale. Our task was to prove that we do not scam or deceive our users. All we want is to start the project that has enough budget to let us achieve our success. Challenge 2: Slow withdrawals and depositsThe players attending ordinary casinos have to change chips or credit a definite amount of money. However, they often wait for a long period time to get a cashback. The progress itself is too slow. In fact, it is far from reliable and the results are not too good. These are the most common issues:
It is easy to deposit money but it is difficult to withdraw it.
The balance is displayed incorrectly.
Depositing and withdrawing are slow. It may take users up to several hours to complete the action.
Audit is not provided.
New users are not trusted.
High withdrawal fees are demanded.
To solve these problems, any EOS-based tokens are accepted for our games. EOS enables users toapply their coins without making any deposits and/or withdrawals. Instant payments and payoutsonly provefull confidence and safety. It also diminishes the risk of bugs. The blockchain records all transactions. It means that all records can be easily audited by any user at any time. Challenge 3: Attacks of botsAttacks of bots are the most ordinary attack an online casino may suffer. Especially in relation to smart contracts, users can push actions directly to the blockchain without using the gaming platform. Besides, creating bots, it is possible to get benefits from every event organized by us. Of course, it is not fair in relation to any other players, when the majority of the rewards are taken by attacker. This is not our aim.To solve this problem and in general to eliminate this situation, our team will implement a special mechanism on checking sums to make sure that all players are pushing actions on our platform. It is hard for attackers to forge the request because the checksum mechanism is calculated in private. It requires a lot of work to understand and get the answer. This is how we can decrease the number of bots and protect the rights of all our users. Challenge 4: Almost unsecureTraditional online casinos tend to collect personal information. Users are required to providetheir passport number, details of bank accounts, real name, etc. for verification and payouts. In spite of the fact that all these details are sensitive, they are stored in unsafe servers that can be easily accessed by hackers. As a result, some valuable information can leak.These and other associated problems can be eliminated by using the EOS Scatter wallet. Users can access our platform by signing up and logging in through Scatter. The only data you need to use is your own device. It is up to the user whether to provide or hide his or her private information. Challenge 5: The random function is unsafeIn case the random function is unwell designed, it can be vulnerable, and hackers can easily break it. Random is thought to be the most difficult part on modern computers. This is not a secret that some developers do not have enough expertise to form true random values.These are some frequent mistakes made by developers:1. The use of easily estimated seed for random,2. The use of any deterministic value (user id, time) as a seed for generating random value,3. The use of hashing functions for generating pseudorandom number4. The use of unequal distributed random values.Real random function is extremely important for an online casino. It is unfair in relation to users when a weak random function is selected because in spite of the correct nature of probability, the output is still biased.        Real Random Function               Weak Random FunctionTo solve this problem, we aim at generating a random value, and use a cryptographically secure generator of pseudorandom numbers. In this case it is difficult for attackers to guess or evaluate the future value. Thus, it provides our platform and our token owners with the best safety. Challenge 6: Games are not proved to be fairMost of active casinos are proved to be unfair. It means that the site can cheat any user by selecting a lottery winner they favor. All winners are selected on a random basis.As for our games, all of them are completely transparent and fair. All of them are smart contracts that are executed by the EOS.IO blockchain. They are maintained by all producers. As soon as it is released, no part of it can be changed or modified. Its fair nature can be proved by the way it works. Every play is calculated by using three parameters – the client seed, the server seed, and nonce.The user can see the client seed and nonce used for the next roll, as well as a hash of the server seed. At the user’s request, it is possible to change the client seed. The server seed is kept in secret before dice rolling. After rolling, the user will get a receipt about the use of the server seed. Then it is possible to check out whether this was the same server seed we mentioned before the roll by checking if the hash of this seed matches the hash shown before the roll. 3 GoldenChip PlatformThe market comprises many gambling platforms. Ours is special because
We support multi-currency,
We share our profit, and
We develop a lot of various games.
More than that, we provide the most sustainable servers by means of covering CDN that is protected by the cloud firewall. Smart AI is used to momentary detect suspicions actions. The cross-platform allows our users to play our games at any time and in any place they want. 3.1 Variety of Games We are planning to develop all types of games. We will not stop at dice betting game only. We are going to release about 1-3 games per month. We want to offer a full win-win solution among all holders of tokens. We will develop all kinds of games on the platform and make them long-lasting. This will allow us to protect our tokens and achieve our main goal – to create the first gambling platform that immediately shares profit in the world. 3.2 Multi-CurrencyOn the EOS.IO blockchain there are a lot of various coins. In addition to the main EOS, we will support all coins on the platform. Thus, users will be free to choose any coin for betting. Moreover, our team supports betting by using GCHIP tokens. It means that users can use tokens both for sharing the profit, and playing our games. 3.3 Dynamic Max BetMax bet is set to prevent from running out of our bankroll. At the same time when a higher max bet is allowed, it can benefit large players and let them play by using many various strategies. Numbers and probability are calculated accurately, it is still possible for players to consecutively win. In order to prevent bankruptcy, there are platforms that set a fixed max bet in ratio to their bankroll. For example, 1,000 is set as a cap for every bet if the bankroll comprises 100K. Thus, there is a room for some lucky players. However, it is difficult to increase the max bet because much bankroll is required to do this. We have invented another method:Using our formula, various kinds of players can be satisfied by dynamic max bet. It is possible for them to bet large amounts with low expected value, as well as small amounts with high expected value. Typically, the max bet is increased ~100x with the same bankroll by using this mechanism. Our team does not need manual setting of the max bet. Our system automatically protects us from the bankruptcy. 3.4 Private EOS EndpointsOutside there are many sites, but they are not sustainable because it is possible for an EOS node to run on a single core, and no multithreading implementation is possible. It is difficult to grow if the team does not have enough expertise. That is why it is necessary to create and maintain private load balanced sites.To do this, it is necessary to apply a load balancer and establish a lot of single core servers to run only one EOS node per one server. Since there is too short block time for EOS, it is impossible to synchronize all nodes. Some of them can be outdated and cause the head block number to jump up and down. We know how to solve this problem. It is necessary to implement our own custom load balancer. However, this requires special knowledge and expertise.The GoldenChip team is lucky to have several years’ experience of operating data centers and managing servers. That is why this is not a big problem for us. To provide our users with a sustainable and top-quality service, we have brought to life our own private site with the ability of AI load balancing. We select the best backup node and automatically filter bad and outdated nodes. Thus, we provide modern and scalable sites, and efficiently make a single core EOS official node that runs on various nodes.Of course, it takes extra cost to maintain our own private site. However, in spite of this we are sure that it is worth it because it allows us to provide our users with the best gaming environment. 3.5 Leaderboard“Wishing to win” against “wishing to avoid loss” is a crucial distinction. According to Murayama and Elliot (2012), the competition effects depend on this distinction in the players’ minds. When someone wants to be better than others, they try to benefit from the competition. But when they wish to avoid acting worse than others, competing tends to decrease their performance.The quote is based on: https://medium.com/practical-motivation-science/how-to-motivate-with-leaderboards-da5a461fb2f6The leaderboard is designed on the basis of self-determination theory. According to this theory, people take part in various activities to meet their fundamental psychological needs. The leaderboardcan satisfy one’s conceit. Users set accurate goals when they play in our platform. They want to get the first ranking in the board. Besides, users learn about their progress when they check the leaderboard. This is also one of the ways to interact with other players. We are sure that competition has a motivating nature and stimulates users to achieve even more. We will offer an online leaderboard next to the game. It will show top users. 3.6 LotteriesLottery is one more way to keep users playing on our platform. It does not matter when a user places a bet in any game, 10% of this fee is placed in the lottery pot. It will ensure our pot from lacking tokens.1 lottery ticket is provided to users for 1 token they bet. It is also possible to buy 1,000 tickets with 1 token. 80% of the income obtained from selling tickets will be placed in the lottery pot. The rest of the funds will be the profit.Every ticket will be numbered in sequence. Ten numbers of lottery tickets will be taken out each hour, and their holders will share the lottery pot as the distribution below.Our platform supports multi-token. That is why every token will run its own lottery. Thus, all users have an opportunity to win a large prize when betting in any of our games, and it does not matter whether they win or lose.It motivates users to go on using our platform and contributes to retaining users. 3.7 Lucky PaymentAll users can roll a number to win free EOS on a daily basis without any additional expenses and any risk.We are sure that this strategy is good because it increases the user involvement and attracts a lot of users. We have to pay tokens for prizes, but in spite of this we realize this is relatively cheap as compared to other types of marketing campaigns.Besides, providing users with free tokens is better than spending them on advertising and promotional campaigns. On the one hand, it can increase the brand and user loyalty, and on the other hand, it retains our user base. The higher the customer lifetime value is, the more profit we can obtain at the end.The rewards based on the statistics collected over time will be reviewed and adjusted to make sure that the rewards are attractive for users and profitable for us. 3.8 AchievementsAchievements are a perfect way to rise the users’ involvement on our platform. We offer users several missions to complete. Achievements are unlocked afterwards. These missions encourage and motivate our users to pass on various features they might not make a try of on their own initiative. Achievements can also be a wonderful approach to design missions to get greater user retention rate.
