Besides, in the first half of the year they will not be staked for sharing profit. Bounty Program (10%) Bug ReportsWe believe that for our business the contract we offer is perfect. We will not let any bugs. Every user who reports about bugs is sure to be rewarded 1,000 GCHIP. As for serious bug reports that, for example, cause the loss of platform, the reward will be 100,000 GCHIP for each reporter. Referral ProgramIt is extremely important to launch and implement a referral program. In fact, it does not require many funds to get new users. A small motivation fee is a perfect incentive for users to invite their friends to the platform. Sharing positive feedbacks about the platform is a wonderful marketing tool that will allow attracting more and more new loyal users. We are sure it will enable us to expend the platform and increase profits. We will inform about the details later. Rewards for SignupDuring some period of time users will be given 1,000 GCHIP upon signup. We think that a reward for signupis crucial to attract new users. EventsWe are planning to organize various events to efficiently boost the revenues. It will also allow us saving on marketing. This is because our users will act as promoters sharing information about our platform with their friends and acquaintances. Our experience shows that events are effective for attracting public attention. Positive gaming experience and funs on the platform will allow growing our user base. 3.10 Revenues Use and Profit SharingWe are going to become a stable platform that will continue operating for a long period of time. We do not aim at instant profits and escaping. We want to expand our business. That is why we need a good and efficient strategy. It is not easy to adjust the use. To compete, we need power and the ability to make our users happy. We have made much research and investigations, and came to the conclusion that the following revenue distribution scheme will be the most efficient one: Bankroll (40%)Bankroll must include the downward side of the variation expected for a certain stake. The platform cannot withhold a certain amount as the funds.A famous strategy based on double up betting is used by many players because they are persuaded that it is always winning. In fact, according to mathematics, this strategy is a high risk. It is not that difficult to lose 10 rounds in a row. The table below demonstrates the statistic when 50% is chosen as the expected value and starting with $1: The actual payout is similar to the expected one, but the user needs much money to bet for a dollar. If you have the bankrollover, you will become a bankrupt. In case of a cap in the game, this strategy is very difficult to play.It is the same about the casino. If there is no enough bankroll, it is necessary to limit the amount for betting to avoid the use of this strategy. The bankroll supports the betting limit. A larger bankroll means our ability to support a higher betting limit. In its turn, it enables users to bet at a higher amount. Having a high limit, users can use more betting strategies. It makes them feel comfortable and they do not stop playing even using large amounts. It increases the odds of losing more eventually.But what will happen if we add the tax? The user loses money after round 5 when the tax is used because of the wrong calculation. We must not double the wager, it is also necessary to consider the tax in the calculation to eliminate this flaw. There are still a lot of players who fail to understand this flaw and go on playing.There are also a lot of players who bet non-stop. They are mainly small players. According to the Pareto principle, 80% of the profit is generated by 20% of the players. If the limit for betting is too low, there is the risk to lose that part of income.A larger bankroll also means our ability to launch more games. In its turn, it will attract more players and thus generate more revenues and make the competitiveness better.We need to increase the bankroll as quickly as possible. This will allow us to compete with others. A higher bankroll is crucial for getting a competitive benefit. Besides, they are better in the long run. Thus, we take more expenses for the bankroll purposes.As the time goes on, the bankroll ratio is adjusted in order to make sure that the platform has enough bankroll for supporting games and is attractive for serious players. Since there are difficulties in sharing the bankroll across all games and there is a risk of attacks, the bankroll must be separated into different contracts and accounts. That is why we are in need of more bankroll to support more games. The bankroll ratio will be adjusted on the quarterly basis by using the following formula:Besides, when the project is over, all bankroll will be spent for dividends. Operating Cost (10%)In order to make our competitiveness better, our team has to go on developing new games. The more games arelaunched, the more revenues can be generated. It is necessary to employ more and more talented and highly professionaldevelopers. This will allow us expanding globally.We aim at providing the most stable, best and safest gaming platform. To do this, we need to maintainour own servers and network. This may require funds, but we want to minimize the costs. Using ourlarge experience, we want to make sure that our setup can support the traffic and offer the best service withlow cost.It is not a secret that in order to become famous and popular, it is necessary to promote the platform. We are not going to spend large sums for advertising campaigns. Instead we want to use a small budget for attracting people’s attention by organizing various types of events. We are thought to be a decentralized gaming platform. Some methods of our work include contests, bonus tokens for newcomers, and media coordination. Net Profit (50%)We believe that all holders of our tokens can share their success. We are thankful to them for their contributions. We want them to be happy, highly motivated and interested. We also want to share our wealth with them. That is why we are going to share the largest part of our profit as the prize. Immediate payoutwill be adopted. To learn more, please read Section 3.12 Immediate payout.We want to offer a gaming platform where everyone will win. It will be based on friendly entertainment and profit sharing principles. 3.11 Immediate PayoutWe want users of our platform to accumulate and get the profit we share without any additional actions. It may seem to be difficult technically. If we want to share our profit immediately, we must know the number of the tokens that are circulating at the moment when the profit is shared. This will allow us to distribute the profit fairly. We can achieve it by taking snapshot of the EOS blockchain. Although in case of immediate profit sharing, we will need a lot of snapshots which may cause our servers over-load. Besides, it will take time to send tokens directly to holders of tokens.In order to solve this problem, we have developed a new payout system. Now users do not need to oftenstate about theirpayout. However,it does not mean that they will miss any. All holders of the tokens who wish to share the profit should stake their GCHIP token. After that our system will accumulate the profit everyhour. They can state the accumulated rewards at any time they wish. We are going to share all profitsfrom the platform, including EOS and all tokens we support and managed to earn. Profit = Current bankroll− Last bankroll Foraccurately and quicklycalculating the profit, each hour will be taken as a calculationpoint. If it is positive, it will be taken as revenue. After that it will be processed for the distribution. If it is negative, it will be accumulated to the next round until becoming positiveagain. It will be processed.The interval can be shortened later. If the interval is a minuteor even a second, the payout will be made immediately.Whenautomatically implementing the payout, the payout can be made without any additional actions. If usersset the automaticthreshold of the payout, the payout will be automatically sent by the system to their accounts in casetheir balance is above the threshold.If users intend to use GCHIP that is staked, they will have to unstack first. GCHIP will be refunded in 24 hours. In the future it is possible to decrease it, but first it is set as 24 hours.It will allow decreasing the server workload needed to take the EOS blockchain snapshot. Besides, it will let us share the profit in a short period of time. The reduction of the tokens circulation will also increase the tokens price. 4 Roadmap

story:
Thank you for visiting this page

Loot it! will be a 2D puzzle game where you help our not-so-smart rogue to get his hands on the treasure. By moving walls and other objects, you can make a safe path to the precious loot or push him to a miserable death.

My name is Adam, and I’m a game developer since 2014. Currently, I’m managing Runemark Studio, which is our family business with my wife. We are creating Unity assets and tools for other game developers to help them in their work.

Loot it! is an interesting project, born from my disappointment caused by a false advertisement. I saw a video on facebook which shows a fun little puzzle game. It turned out that game doesn’t exist, it’s just a marketing trick. I was sad, I wanted to play with that game.

After reading the comments below the ad, I noticed many others feel the same way and waiting for someone to actually make that game. This is how the idea was born, and our facebook page grew over 1000 follower within a month.

 

I’m dedicated to this game, but it wasn’t in my original plans for this year. As I wrote above, I’m managing our little business, and also working as a freelancer. I have to balance my time between this two.

I could work on Loot It! in my free time but that way the development would take even years. A more effective way would be to replace my freelancer projects by developing this game. This is why I need your help.

My plan to finish this project by the end of this year. I believe it would be a great Christmas present for you all. :) This is my planned timeline so far. It might change later when the IndieGoGo project finishes.

By backing the game, you can gain access to early releases and VIP rewards! Your support will allow me to bring the game to you sooner!

 

Your name will be listed in the in-game credits screen as a token of my appreciation.

 

  • Your name will be listed in the in-game credits screen.
  • You will receive a digital copy of the game once it released.

When you pledge, you choose the platform on which you want to play the game.

 

Play the game a month before others!

  • Your name will be listed in the in-game credits screen under the beta testers section.
  • You will receive a digital copy of the game once it released.
  • You get access to the beta release which will happen around November.

When you pledge, you choose the platform on which you want to play the game.

 

Play the game before everyone else! This is the best option if you don't like waiting!

  • Your name will be listed in the in-game credits screen under the special thanks section.
  • You will receive a digital copy of the game once it released.
  • You get access to the beta release which will happen around November.
  • You get access to the alpha release which will happen around October.

When you pledge, you choose the platform on which you want to play the game.

 

A very limited perk for those who want to get involved in the development through suggestions and polls.

  • Your name will be listed in the in-game credits screen, under the Who married the princess section.
  • You will receive a digital copy of the game once it released.
  • You get access to the beta release which will happen around November.
  • You get access to the alpha release which will happen around October.
  • This perk contains the VIP Discord Access add-on perk too!
  • On discord, you can suggest new mechanics, world themes, level designs, ideas. I'll add it to the next poll where the VIP community can decide if I should add it to the game or skip it.

When you pledge, you choose the platform on which you want to play the game.

 

This is an add-on perk for the Digital, Beta, and Alpha perks. The Marry the Princess perk automatically contains it. You get access to my VIP Discord Channel. Here you can chat with me directly, and participate in decisions during the development through polls. 

 

What happens if the project doesn't reach its goal?

The project is running with a fixed goal concept. This means if we don’t reach the goal, IndieGoGo will give you a refund automatically within 5-7 days.

To work on this project full-time and deliver it by the end of this year, I need at least $2000 funding. From this amount the game will have one world with about 20 levels, and a handful of mechanics (like water, lava, doors, explosive barrels, spikes). 

This is the bare minimum what the project requires. On the pie chart below you can see where this funding will go. 

 

I prepared a few stretch goals for you to see where this project can go, what potentials does it have. Every additional $ beyond the goal will go to Art & Sound (after fees are removed from it). 

  

Extra worlds are thematical categories of art sets and mechanics that only appear in that world. For better understanding, I show you two example worlds. Keep in mind that these are only samples. The actual world will be build and decided by the VIP community!

This game is developed by myself (Adam Galla) a solo indie game developer and freelancer from Hungary. I graduated in 2013 with a BSc degree in Software Engineering and working as a game developer since 2014.

The projects I worked on during these years, taught me, how to plan a project, set a realistic deadline, and use the budget well.

Since I'm a programmer I lack artistic knowledge. To get over this limitation I plan to hire an artist and use the Unity Asset Store.

Game development is an iterative process and full of challenges. Questions and problems could come up at any time during the work.

I contributed in many projects, encountered and successfully solved plenty of problems since I'm working as a game developer. 

I won't say there is no risk in this project. However, I can promise that I'll keep you updated during the development. Not just about my successes, but my difficulties too.

If you don’t want or can’t contribute to this project, you can still help me to make it successful.

Please, share this page and get involved on social media. The more people we get involved, the better this game will be!

story:
HEY ZOMBIE LOVERS!!!!

IT'S BEEN AN AMAZING JOURNEY WITH ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN.  IT ALL STARTED WITH A SIMPLE DREAM BY CREATING A ZOMBIE FILM. I NEVER HAD THE SLIGHTEST IDEA OF HOW FAR THIS PROJECT WOULD'VE TAKEN ME.  I HAD MANY WONDERFUL PEOPLE THAT HELPED ME DURING THIS PROCESS. I TRULY THANK THEM AND EVERYONE THAT SUPPORTED ME AND ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN. ONE MORE THING, I ALWAYS EXPLAIN TO MY FANS THAT IF I CAN DO IT, ANYONE CAN AND THAT'S THE TRUTH. FOLLOW YOUR HEART AND YOUR DREAMS...

ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN THE VIDEO GAME!!!

IT ALL STARTED IN THE YEAR 2012 AS A WEB-SERIES AND A COUPLE OF YEARS LATER WE'VE CREATED A COMIC-BOOK SERIES.

WE DIDN'T STOP THERE....IN 2016 WE DECIDED TO GO ON A CAMPAIGN TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE FEATURE FILM ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN!

NOVEMBER 27 2019  ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN DEBUTED ON AMAZON PRIME VIDEO.

TO WATCH FILM ON TUBI ~ ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN

TO WATCH FILM ON AMAZON ~ ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN

IF YOU HAVEN'T SEEN IT HERE'S THE TRAILER....

THIS WOULD HAVE NEVER HAPPENED IF IT WASN'T FOR ALL YOUR AMAZING SUPPORT!!!

 

AND NOW.....

WITH YOUR AWESOME HELP WE WOULD LIKE TO RAISE MONEY TO RELEASE....

ZOMBIE WITH A SHOTGUN THE VIDEO GAME!!!!!!

 

Zombie with a Shotgun is going to be that zombie GAME where all the rules we know about zombie GAMES go right out the window.​

It begins:

You’re getting chased! Quickly you hurry through the front door of an old apartment complex.
For a second you think you’re safe, but better think again! Accomplices to the ones that are after you are already inside, hiding in the dank hallway for you to show up.
You have a room here, where you have your belongings. You left the apartment-key on the dresser so get to your place , pick up that key and lock the door behind you!
You pull a tucked away handgun and prepare to face your enemies.

GAME ON!!!

Shoot down the bad guys, pick up some weapons, pet and rescue some rabbits and be careful around all those zombies roaming 'round the dark. They're hungry!...

Feel like wasting ammo? Blast away your enemies, cupboards, chairs, vases, and whatever else gets in the way! Though some things may be better left alone as they'll keep you covered from enemy fire - at least a little while.

  • Main Character Aaron's development/degeneration through the game

  • Cast and Crew: Meet the NPCs, Goons with guns, the Zombies and pets

(the characters so far)

  • Weapons to be used:

 

Depending on how many stretch goals we reach the more levels, story and characters we'll add to the game. These are the 10 levels we've planned for and with your help, we'll reach to make every single one a memorable experience!

READ BELOW AS WE ASK FOR YOUR HELP TO GRAB ONE OF OUR WONDERFUL PERKS!

THANK YOU ALL!!!

The demo version of Zombie with a Shotgun the Video Game has just finished cooking. Now you can strap on Aaron shoes yourself and go blast some nasty goons with your arsenal of fiery projectiles on the first quarter of the first level of the game.

Follow the link to download the ZWAS Demo:

DOWNLOAD

Requirements: PC, monitor, mouse, keyboard and M4D SKILLZ!

Support us with $15 and get your own copy of the Zombie with a Shotgun Video Game to play at your leisure.

Support us with $25 we'll throw in a digital "behind the scenes" Art Book where you'll get to see the process of making the game and all the drawings and final renders, layouts and 3D models.

Support us with $35 we'll thank you by name in the game's credits.

Support us with $50 we'll go out of our way to thank you by name in a little more exclusive way in the game's credits.

Support us with $200 we'll make a Zombie or an enemie in the game look like you. Limited offer! There are only so many characters in the game...

Support us with $500 or more we will grant you the title of Co-Producer of the game.

 

When we reach $9000 the game will get an amazing soundtrack composed by music master Jönköping Sound Machine (his awesome music is already in the trailer & demo!). We will also bring in the phenomenal artist Ian J. Miller from the ZWAS comics to draw portraits for characters in the game.

Reaching $10 000 we will port the game to Android and iOS and make it cell-phone friendly.

At $12 500 another level will be built and the plot will thicken. With every new level, more story will be revealed and more characters will pop in, both friendly and those ready to put a gun in your face.

At $13 000 there will be new weapons and we'll add another character.

When going for $15 500 there will be yet another level added for Aaron to run around in.

$16 000 and we'll drop in a bunch of new characters.

For $18 500 you'll get one more level to practice your shotgun at.

When we get to $19 500 Ian will come back and artistically illustrate an intro sequence and some other scenes.

At $22 000 there will be another level filled of goons with guns and hungry zombies.

$24 500 Mini Game! Drive between levels, and be careful of whom or what you might bump into.

We will add another level to play at $27 000.

At $27 500 there will be new weapons and another character.

If we reach $30 000 there will be more gameplay on another level.

Going for $30 500 there will be a new weapon and new characters.

$33 000 will grant us to make yet another level to explore. This far into the game there will be lots of dangerous enemies and a variety of weapons to use.

With $33 500 Aaron will get 2 extra attacks another character will be added to the mix.

Reaching $36 000 there will be one more level. The enemies on this one are out of this world!!!

With $38 500 we will add a FINAL LEVEL to the game. Now we have 10 places for Aaron to swing his shotgun at.

Drop us another buck and we reach $40 000 we will with this final goal squeeze in another weapon and adding a whole two more characters.

 

Hilton Ariel Ruiz

Creator and Producer

Fredrik "fedde" Mattsson

Game Designer and Art Director

Jimmy Brunnberg

Game Designer and Programmer

 

Who will get to eat pie after the campaign?

With $38 500 we will add a FINAL LEVEL to the game. Now we have 10 places for Aaron to swing his shotgun at.


Drop us another buck and we reach $40 000 we will with this final goal squeeze in another weapon and adding a whole two more characters.
 


Hilton Ariel Ruiz
Creator and Producer
Fredrik "fedde" Mattsson
Game Designer and Art Director
Jimmy Brunnberg
Game Designer and Programmer
 

Who will get to eat pie after the campaign?

story:
Do you have a dream of driving a Supercar or even a Hypercar at Circuit of The Americas, the greatest Formula One track in North America? This is a community project that we can and will deliver...

We are an established driving experience company, headquartered in Golden Colorado. Our project has several outcomes, ultimately we are striving to bring a McLaren P1 to 10 Tracks around the United States. Allowing Hypercar fans such as yourself, the opportunity to DRIVE a McLaren P1.

To kickoff the campaign and get the ball rolling, we have a very achievable goal of $95,000 which will put our current fleet on the greatest track in North America, Circuit of the Americas! We have built a budget which will allow us to throw an incredible event and cover the expense of renting the facility to share with our backers. If we can break $500K we will also bring a McLaren 675LT to the event for participants to drive. We will also increase the number of days required to fulfill the laps sold thru our crowdfunding campaign. Shooting for the stars we break $2.5MM we are touring 10 Tracks including COTA with the entire fleet and a McLaren P1.

Because this is a community project, we will be asking our backers to make many decisions along the way. We have also setup several "Early Backer" discounted offers, these perks are offered in limited quantities. Once they're gone, they're gone.

We have also setup our campaign with a money back fixed funding platform. If we do not meet our goal all of the funds are returned to the backers. Now lets get behind this and make it at an incredible event!

Thanks,
The Team @Oxotic.com

www.ProjectP1.com

Frequently Asked Questions


Q: Can I buy more laps after the campaign has ended?
A: Based on our projections we are expecting to sell out of laps offered in the funded vehicle. We are expecting to sell available laps in other vehicles in our fleet. We will have a capacity number based on required days to fulfill our offer during the tour. In the event we do end up offering additional laps in the funded vehicle, we will be increasing these rates after the campaign has ended.

Q: What are your age Restrictions?
A: Driving:18+ with a valid drivers license. Ride-Along: 6+ with a parent or guardian

Q: My daughter is a car fanatic, she is 10 year old. Question, do you offer ride-along experiences?
A: Quick answer, YES! This is is the part of the business we love THE most. She will be in the hands of a professional and she will go nuts...You're about to be the parent of the year!

Q: Can I bring a passenger in the car?
A: Sorry, on our traveling tour we will be requiring a professional instructor to sit shot-gun. All of our Supercars are 2 seat vehicles. Come out to Denver and you can join one of our YOU+1 Canyon driving tours, in this setting you can bring a passenger.

Q: Do I pick a car when I get to the event?
A: No, you need to get on the schedule and join a heat.

Q: Will you sell out?
A: We sure hope so, if your a registered backer we will deliver.

Q: Not being a downer, but if you don't make the goal to get the P1 can I pick any of the Supercars to drive if I back your campaign?
A: We know it's a huge undertaking and we are hopeful the car community will want to make this happen... However we are grounded and down to earth. If it does not happen and we meet one of the other goals, Yes you can drive any of our cars using your allocated lap(s)

Q: I can't drive, can I sit in the Ferrari 458 Italia and take a picture with the 458 ?
A: It's going to be an action packed day when we are in your city. If you grab an Oxotic team member we will see if we can make it happen!

Q: I like the idea of driving a P1 but I LOVE LAMBOS! Can I just drive your Superleggera with my 3 Laps instead of the Funded vehicle?
A: When registering you will pick the city and the vehicle you would like to reserve. We have two tiers of laps Funded vehicle and fleet vehicle. Funded vehicle laps can be used on any cars in the fleet. Fleet laps can not be used on funded vehicle(s). So, Yes... you can have at it with the Superleggera! Great choice BTW!

Q: When will the tour dates be release ?
A: As you can imagine there is a lot of planning that will go into delivering a world-class event. We need a few months to get our ducks in a row. Our guess, late Summer 2015 dates will be released. We will have a newsletter that goes out twice a month with updates. If you back us you will automatically be on the list.

Q: I want your job. Let's make that happen. ok?
A: ;), It's pretty RAD, yes. But it's still work. FUN work, but work. Get involved when we come to your city, we will need volunteers. Join our mailing list and you will be notified when we have volunteer sign ups. Our boss will even feed you and give you free stuff!

Q: Will there be food and drinks at the event?
A: We are putting on a World-Class experience here... not some hack show ;) We will arrange to have food-trucks in attendance, Drinks will be sold at multiple stations throughout the event area. You're welcome to bring coolers, food/drinks, shade tents, lawn chairs etc.

Q: Can I buy additional laps at the event.
A: This is a question we would LOVE to say yes. At this point, we really don't know if we will have flexibility to offer additional appointments above and beyond those reserved by the initial backers. Our advice is to contribute and fund based on the laps you think you need. If we have openings and can add additional laps then we will offer to our backers prior to the event.

Q: Do I need to bring a helmet?
A: We will provide Helmets and head socks are available for purchase at the event. You're welcome to bring your own Motor Racing helmet (restrictions apply)

Q: Say you get the P1, What happens to it after the tour?
A: Well we put it in our fleet and offer it to the general public. We are doing this for the community and want to continue to offer it as we offer the rest of our Supercars. You will need to come to Denver to visit the P1 after the Tour has been completed.

Q: Are your fleet cars modified, do they have governors.
A: No, they are all bone stock as they came from the factory.

Q: Can I take my own Pictures or do I have to buy yours?
A: Most packages include a free key to download our professional pictures. However, we do allow cameras at the event, snap away cowboy!

Q: My package does not include a Hat, can I buy one at the event or now?
A: Once we have designs finalized we will open an e-commerce site, where you can order merchandise. We will also have a merchandise booth at the event. Please send us feedback on items you would like to see.

Q: Is this really going to happen?
A: Honestly, We sure do hope so. We've put a ton of time and money to get it to this point. We are not going anywhere if the campaign falls short. We operate a busy Supercar Experience company in Colorado. We conduct on average 100 Driving tours a week. Often our cars are booked 2 months in advance. So, It will happen if the community wants to back it. If they do we are the team that can deliver. In fact we are super excited to take our experience on the road. We know how to throw an event.

Q: I've never been on a track. Can I still do this experience.
A: Everyone has to start somewhere. Why not in a Hypercar or Supercar! LOL We would prefer that you get a package that has both a Supercar and Hypercar lap included. If not we will get you comfortable in the funded car. If everything works out as we hope, and you have a lap in the funded car and a lap in one of our fleet supercars. We will start with the Supercar first.

Q: I thought all of the P1's were sold?
A: Yes, you can not order a P1 but there are a number on the 2nd hand market. This is where we will source ours.

Q: Can I bring my GoPro camera?
A: Yes, we will have mounts inside the car, ready for GoPro cameras. We will also have GoPro cameras available for rental and SD cards for purchase at the event.

Q: What's the catch? Like will I have the equivalent to a city block to drive the P1?
A: Actually we are going by the lap in most cases. Certain Perks have actual  mile route experiences offered (in Denver). At the track, it's the track lap. Distance obviously differs from track to track. Seriously we are not into funny businesses or fine print. We do these drives year round and have almost 4,000  under our belt. We want you to walk away saying WOW, that's the best money i've ever spent!

Q: I'm 6'5 can I fit in these cars?
A: We would say all cars should accommodate, with the exception of the Superleggera. It has a fixed carbon fiber seat that has just backwards and forward seat adjustments.

Q: Take my money, take my money!!!!... I MUST to drive a P1.
A: We get it, and we are doing everything we can to make this happen! We need to get  the campaign fully funded to get to the P1. We feel bullish that it can happen. Tell your friends and support our effort!

Q: Will there be other things to do at your event?
A: Yes, we are planning to have a car corral area.  Trendy Food trucks, Drink vendors, etc. We are trying to bring the local car communities together in every city we visit.

Q: Can I bring a passenger in the car with me?
A: Sorry but they're not gonna fit, We will have a professional driving instructor riding shotgun with you. If it's a ride-along we can only allow one passenger to ride safely.

story:
UPDATE:

Hi everyone, the last month  has been an amazing one. That you for all your support.

The campaign ends in less than a day and sadly we wont be making it. This is entirely mostly our fault since some unexpected personal issues came up which didn't allow us devote the time required to make this campaign a success.

Never the less, we really appreciate everyone who contribuited, shared or supported us in any way. We have already directed most of you to request refunds before the camapign ends from Indiegogo.

We will be keeping you updated on how we intend to proceed with this project in future. Thanks again

Elizabeth


1.  A little background...

Hello. My name is Elizabeth Eremie and I am the founder of Lizzie’s Creations. Lizzie’s Creations is a mobile app and game development outfit that seeks to educate and entertain women and children using mobile technology.

We launched our outfit with the release of AfroTalez. It’s an educative and interactive app for children that narrates African folk-stories. When we launched it, it was a passion project but it received such acclaim that we were honored and felt encouraged to go further.

2.  About our project...

For our next project, we would like to develop an episodic game for women and young girls. Its titled ‘Choices’ and its an interactive novel. This means like a novel, it would have an engrossing story line that one can be captivated by. But unlike a regular novel, this will be interactive. The reader creates their own story! How cool is that?

Let me explain further: At certain points in the story, the reader will be given a number of options to choose from that will determine how the story progresses further. Every choice will lead to a different ending. So essentially, you can’t play it once, because every time you play and make a different choice, it leads to a different ending.

Here's an exclusive trailer that I think will explain it better.


3. Why i think it's important...

I feel the need to develop this game because I love an interesting story. I always have. And I know a lot of women out there do too. But in addition to that and most importantly, this game will be an educational tool for young women. Because our stories will be about societal ills we experience or hear about on a daily basis. The story follows the life of Cecelia, a teenage girl growing up in unenviable circumstances and trying to navigate the pitfalls of early marriage, abuse, promiscuity, drugs and a host of other things. Playing the game as Cecelia gives the reader an immersive experience that I hope will help them relate with her circumstances and thus know how some of the choices we make in life will impact our future for good or otherwise.



I feel I’m not doing the description much justice. When we launch, you all will better understand what I am trying to say. Trust me, it’ll be awesome!

4.  Why we need a little help...

So from the description above, you can tell that as awesome as this project is, it’s also a massive one. We’ll need to hire a number of amazing writers to create amazing story lines full of plot twists and cliff hangers. The success of the whole project hinges on the quality of the story really. So we need writers who are worth their salt and that isn’t going to come cheap. In addition, we also need kick-ass graphic artists to bring the story alive with unbelievable lines and colors. That isn’t going to come cheap either. Then there are also voice actors, music/sound producers and programmers.

It helps that we have a bunch of young, vibrant, independent artisans who are totally on-board with this project and will not charge the full price they would normally do but we all have to feed while we are working on this and it’s always good to encourage talent.

That is why we need your help and your donations. Without you all, this project will not have the kind of impact we would like it to. We believe anything worth doing is worth doing well and so we would love you to throw your lot in with us and let us all create this masterpiece together.

5.  How much we need and where it's going...

For the completion of Episode 1 of Choices: an interactive novel, we are looking to raise at least $6,000. We are keeping our fingers crossed and hoping to surpass that amount but $6,000 is the barest minimum we can use to do an incredible job. Here’s a breakdown of what we intend to use that money for.

Indiegogo fees – 7%

Perk fulfillment – 20%

Writers – 10%

Voice actors – 10%

Graphic artists – 25%

Music/sound engineers – 5%

Programmers – 20%

Miscellaneous – 3%

If we do surpass our target though, that will be a whole other picnic altogether. Depending on how much we are able to raise, we could even start work on Episodes 2 and 3! That will be so great!!

6.  What you get...

“So, what’s in it for me if I give you my money?”

That’s the question running through your mind right about now and we have an answer for that. We aren’t selfish individuals and we aren’t looking for charity……… per se. You will definitely get something. It might not be commensurate to the amount you are donating but please know that a lot of thought went into it and every unique present carries a wealth of gratitude from each and every one of us.

So, here are our perks:

$1 : email thanks

$5 : 1$ + website thanks

$10 : 5$ + advance light edition(beta testers)

$25 : all above + advance collector's edition + soft copy of still art from novel

$50 : all above + custom flash drives

$100 : all above + our custom T-shirts with any name of donor's choice + special thanks in end credits

Tee

$200 : all above + soft & hard copy of high res portrait of donor in style of game.

$500 : all above + character modelled after donor + access pass to game creators & writers

$1000 : all above + corporate partnership with Lizzie's Creations. In-app ads, product placements etc



7.  Suppose we do not make our target...

If we do not reach our $6,000 goal, it’ll cause us a lot of heartache but we will still complete the game. Because we did a lot of number crunching before we arrived at $6,000. It is at this amount that we can comfortably pay for all the perks, settle indiegogo fees and still be able to output a finished project to the standards we want. 

If we still don't achieve this target, we WILL finish the game, it might take a little longer than scheduled since we would have to raise the funds ourselves but we will ensure everyone gets the perks promised. 

I sincerely believe we can reach that goal and surpass it greatly though.

8.  Why you should be involved in the development of this project...

I live in a part of the world where news of under-age marriage, sexual abuse, violence against women, prostitution… to name just a few, is really not news anymore. We’ve seen and encountered it so many times that we’ve grown numb. Feeling indifferent about these evils doesn’t make them any less horrible. Almost all the victims of these crimes suffer in silence. The ones who dare voice out are told to be brave and endure it! Something is horribly wrong with our psyche and our awareness.

Choices will provide players with first-hand experience of what these voiceless victims are going through. We hope it brings about the re-education our society so desperately needs.

9.  Why i am qualified to do this...

In September 2013, we developed a story telling app for kids titled AfroTalez. A few months after launch, we got over 200,000 downloads across the various platforms it was placed on and won a number of awards. 2 years later, we still average 50 downloads a day. Its ongoing success can be attributed to the vast media coverage it has garnered. Articles on AfroTalez can be found on some of the below listed sites.

  

http://edition.cnn.com/2015/03/30/africa/gallery/african-education-transformation/

http://www.voanews.com/content/mobile-app-creator-seeks-preserve-african-folktales/2611103.html

Amongst several others...

Our award winning lead programmer Idamiebi also has a number of apps and games on various app stores that he has developed under his company ‘Sonbim Games’. All our team members are also equally successful in all their various fields. Together, we all make an unbeatable team.

10.  Any unforeseen obstacles?..

It will be unreasonably optimistic of us to assume that all we have planned will go hitch-free. We might have to waddle through a few missed deadlines because we are all freelance artists and thus operate in a virtual work space. And sending files to and fro sometimes take a lot longer to do virtually than it would if a colleague’s office was just across a hall.

10.  How we overcome this hurdle...

But we have churned out a few successful projects working this way, so this shouldn’t be any different. If anything, we will strive to be as punctual as possible seeing that we have investors who are waiting for our finished product.

11. If you can't donate...

Thank you so much for your time. At this point I feel I should re-iterate that no contribution is too small. Every dollar raised is a dollar closer to our target.

If however you cannot donate for one reason or the other, you can still contribute to the success of our campaign by helping us get the word out. Simply click on any of the indiegogo share tools below and it’ll automatically post on your social media timeline. Who knows: you might not have donated any money but through you someone else could help us reach our goal. Every effort counts.

Once again, accept our sincere gratitude and see you all at the finish line!

The success of the whole project hinges on the quality of the story really. So
we need writers who are worth their salt and that isn’t going to come cheap. In
addition, we also need kick-ass graphic artists to bring the story alive with
unbelievable lines and colors. That isn’t going to come cheap either. Then
there are also voice actors, music/sound producers and programmers.
It helps that we have a bunch of young, vibrant, independent
artisans who are totally on-board with this project and will not charge the
full price they would normally do but we all have to feed while we are working
on this and it’s always good to encourage talent.
That is why we need your help and your donations. Without
you all, this project will not have the kind of impact we would like it to. We
believe anything worth doing is worth doing well and so we would love you to
throw your lot in with us and let us all create this masterpiece together.
5.  How much we need and where
it's going...
For the completion of Episode 1 of Choices: an interactive
novel, we are looking to raise at least $6,000. We are keeping our fingers
crossed and hoping to surpass that amount but $6,000 is the barest minimum we
can use to do an incredible job. Here’s a breakdown of what we intend to use
that money for.
Indiegogo fees – 7%
Perk fulfillment – 20%
Writers – 10%
Voice actors – 10%
Graphic artists – 25%
Music/sound engineers – 5%
Programmers – 20%
Miscellaneous – 3%
If we do surpass our target though, that will be a whole
other picnic altogether. Depending on how much we are able to raise, we could
even start work on Episodes 2 and 3! That will be so great!!
6.  What you get...
“So, what’s in it for me if I give you my money?”
That’s the question running through your mind right about
now and we have an answer for that. We aren’t selfish individuals and we aren’t
looking for charity……… per se. You will definitely get something. It might not
be commensurate to the amount you are donating but please know that a lot of
thought went into it and every unique present carries a wealth of gratitude
from each and every one of us.
So, here are our perks:
$1 : email thanks
$5 : 1$ + website thanks 
$10 : 5$ + advance light edition(beta testers) 
$25 : all above + advance collector's edition + soft copy of
still art from novel 
$50 : all above + custom flash drives 
$100 : all above + our custom T-shirts with any name of donor's
choice + special thanks in end credits Tee
$200 : all above + soft & hard copy of high res portrait
of donor in style of game. 
$500 : all above + character modelled after donor + access
pass to game creators & writers 
$1000 : all above + corporate partnership with Lizzie's
Creations. In-app ads, product placements etc
7.  Suppose we do not make our target...
If we do not reach our $6,000 goal, it’ll cause us a lot of
heartache but we will still complete the game. Because we did a lot
of number crunching before we arrived at $6,000. It is at this amount that we
can comfortably pay for all the perks, settle indiegogo fees and still be able
to output a finished project to the standards we want. If we still don't achieve this target, we WILL finish the game, it might take a little longer than scheduled since we would have to raise the funds ourselves but we will ensure everyone gets the perks promised. 
I sincerely believe we can reach that goal and surpass it
greatly though. 
8.  Why you should be involved in the development of this project...
I live in a part of the world where news of under-age
marriage, sexual abuse, violence against women, prostitution… to name just a
few, is really not news anymore. We’ve seen and encountered it so many times
that we’ve grown numb. Feeling indifferent about these evils doesn’t make them
any less horrible. Almost all the victims of these crimes suffer in silence.
The ones who dare voice out are told to be brave and endure it! Something is
horribly wrong with our psyche and our awareness. 
Choices will provide players with first-hand experience of
what these voiceless victims are going through. We hope it brings about the re-education
our society so desperately needs. 
9.  Why i am qualified to do this...
In September 2013, we developed a story telling app for kids
titled AfroTalez. A few months after launch, we got over 200,000 downloads
across the various platforms it was placed on and won a number of awards. 2
years later, we still average 50 downloads a day. Its ongoing success can be
attributed to the vast media coverage it has garnered. Articles on AfroTalez
can be found on some of the below listed sites.  http://edition.cnn.com/2015/03/30/africa/gallery/african-education-transformation/http://www.voanews.com/content/mobile-app-creator-seeks-preserve-african-folktales/2611103.htmlAmongst several others...
Our award winning lead programmer Idamiebi also has a number
of apps and games on various app stores that he has developed under his company
‘Sonbim Games’. All our team members are also equally successful in all their
various fields. Together, we all make an unbeatable team.
10.  Any unforeseen obstacles?..
It will be unreasonably optimistic of us to assume that all
we have planned will go hitch-free. We might have to waddle through a few
missed deadlines because we are all freelance artists and thus operate in a
virtual work space. And sending files to and fro sometimes take a lot longer to
do virtually than it would if a colleague’s office was just across a hall. 
10.  How we overcome this hurdle...
But we have churned out a few successful projects working
this way, so this shouldn’t be any different. If anything, we will strive to be
as punctual as possible seeing that we have investors who are waiting for our
finished product.
11. If you can't donate...
Thank you so much for your time. At this point I feel I should
re-iterate that no contribution is too small. Every dollar raised is a dollar
closer to our target. 
If however you cannot donate for one reason or the other,
you can still contribute to the success of our campaign by helping us get the
word out. Simply click on any of the indiegogo share tools below and it’ll
automatically post on your social media timeline. Who knows: you might not have
donated any money but through you someone else could help us reach our goal.
Every effort counts.
Once again, accept our sincere gratitude and see you all at
the finish line!

story:
ENGLISH CAMPAIGN



"Graveyard Battle Arena" is the final result of an ambitious project based in the design, making and production of a 3D table-top game board, aiming the huge Battle Arena players’ community spread all around the world.

Since a while ago we have been observing how this large players’ community manage to play their games in printed paper boards, so now we want to offer you the opportunity of having an attractive, versatile, tough and quality board that will meet the expectations of the most demanding players.

Playing area measures 40 x 40 cm. approximately.

Mounted board measures 50 x 50 cm. + 12 cm. height approximately.



HMS (Hispania Modelling Solutions) has accomplished great economic and resourceful efforts to create the 3D design and make the “Graveyard Battle Arena” board physical prototype.

All board parts have been already printed in 3D using SLA technology (50 microns) and high definition UV photo-hardening resins for a completely professional result.

Prototype has been made with high quality PUR resins, the same materials that will be used in the final production.

For the board production we will use vacuum casting technology, completed with PUR resins in pressure chamber.

Therefore, we can proudly say that first two project phases (design and prototype) have been successfully reached, so now we want to start with production phase.



This campaign intention is to ease to all those interested the purchase of our product in a reliable and economic way, so we will start a production process based in pre-orders. This method will allow us to acquire all the necessary materials and equipment to create the boards with less cost, what will be reflected in the product final price, which will be much cheaper than in future direct sales. 

We achieve to slash production prices thanks to the company Kudo 3D, a world-wide reference in SLA printing who wants to support us being our exclusive sponsorship.

                                             

                      



Estimated time of arrival will be December 2016.

By this time you may already know this campaign is a platform to ease the “Graveyard Battle Arena” pre-orders.

We offer you different options to acquire the game board, which you can see below in the “perks” section.

Of course, this campaign also offers juicy rewards (free) for all backers, as you can see in the “goals” section below.

Here you can find a detailed list of all perks we offer you, including all content you will find in each of them:

(Assembly and painting not included). If you choose this option, you will obtain tiles in resin, demarcating board walls, and detailed instructions where we will let you know step by step how to assemble the board and which other materials you will need to give stability and consistency to the ensemble. This option doesn’t include magnetic tiles.

(Assembly and painting not included). With this option, in addition to the resin tiles and the demarcating board walls, you will also get some plywood sheets, a frame for higher stability and consistency, and a metallic sheet. With this option, all tiles come with a magnetic base (expect walls, as they will always be fixed in the same position): now your game board is steadier, more consistent and versatile! Now you won’t have to resign yourself to a closed board configuration, as you will be able to design alternative maps just changing the tiles in the board. But this is not all, because with this perk option you assure your board will be compatible with future board releases, as you will only need to change tiles to enjoy new experiences.

Of course, this option also includes a step by step guide so you can easily assemble your board.

(Painting required). This option includes all offered in Full Option as well as the game board totally assembled. We also include an attractive and tough box where you can keep and carry your game board easily and safe.

With this option you will just have to wait for your board, as we will send it totally assembled and painted with an amazing quality, all ready to play. We also include the transportation box included in FULL OPTION 2.


(In this attached image you can see the board final look. Although they are not appearing in the image, you will receive starting tiles and coins with your order. You can see how they look in the FULL OPTION 2 rendered image)


CUSTOM BOARD PAINTING (only available for backers purchasing the LUXE OPTION). 
If you acquire this option, our team will customise the board following your instructions and taking as reference a colour palette we will publish during the campaign. Also, as an extra, we will include a metallic plate in one of the board’s sides carved with your name or whatever you prefer (30 characters maximum).


“Graveyard Battle Arena” is totally hand-made, fabricated, casted, assembled and painted, so you could appreciate slightly differences in the pieces final touch.

Due to this product features, its use is not recommended for children under the age of 12 without adult supervision.

Shipping costs will be paid before shipment, and after we contact to inform you about the total amount. This way both sides will have a better control about the shipment.

ZONE A: Germany, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Slovakia, Slovenia, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, United Kingdom, Sweden, Switzerland, Norway and Iceland.

ZONE B: Rest of Europe not included in Zone A and Azores, Madeira, Monaco, Isle of Man and Morocco.
ZONE C: Africa except Morocco.
ZONE D: Asian and Oceania.
ZONE E: America.
ZONE F: Spain.
Indicative price, could vary. Contact us for other shipment methods.
Due to tax laws, delivery could be subject of importation and duty fees, which                   will be paid at destination and by costumer, as an obligation.

                           CAMPAÑA EN ESPAÑOL


"Graveyard Battle Arena" es el resultado final de un ambicioso proyecto basado en el diseño, fabricación y producción de un tablero de juego físico 3D, destinado a esa gran comunidad de jugadores de Battle Arena que hay repartidos por todo el mundo.

Desde hace mucho tiempo, hemos observado cómo esta numerosa comunidad de jugadores se las ingenia para poder jugar sus partidas en algo más que un mero tapete impreso. Por ese motivo queremos ofreceros la oportunidad de tener un tablero atractivo, versátil, resistente y de calidad que cumpla las expectativas de los más exigentes.

Medidas del área de juego 40 x 40 cm. aproximadamente.

Medidas del tablero montado 50 x 50 cm. + 12 cm. altura aproximadamente.



HMS (Hispania Modelling Solutions) ha realizado un gran esfuerzo tanto económico como en recursos humanos para crear el diseño 3D y fabricar el prototipo físico del tablero de juego "Graveyard Battle Arena". 

Todas las piezas del tablero ya han sido impresas en 3D utilizando tecnología SLA (50 micras) y resinas de alta resolución fotocurables UV para que el resultado sea totalmente profesional.
El prototipo se ha fabricado en resinas PU de alta calidad. Estos mismos materiales son los que utilizaremos en la producción.
Para la producción del mismo utilizaremos tecnología de casteado al vacío y acabados en cámara de presión para resinas PU.
Por lo tanto, podemos decir con orgullo, que las dos primeras fases del proyecto (diseño y prototipo) han sido alcanzadas con éxito y tan sólo nos quedaría poner en marcha la producción.

La intención de esta campaña es facilitar a todos los interesados la adquisición de nuestro producto de la forma más económica posible. Para ello pondremos en marcha un proceso de producción basado en pedidos formato pre-orders. 

Trabajar de esta manera nos va a permitir adquirir materiales y maquinaria para la producción de los tableros de juego a costos más reducidos. Este aspecto se verá reflejado en el precio final del producto, que siempre será mucho más económico que el ofrecido en una futura venta directa.
Además, 

Hemos conseguido abaratar considerablemente los costes de producción gracias a que la empresa Kudo 3D (referente mundial en impresión SLA) ha apostado por nuestro producto entrando como sponsor exclusivo.

                          

El plazo de entrega estimado sería a lo largo del mes de diciembre del 2016.

Si habéis leído los apartados anteriores, ya tendréis claro que nuestra campaña es una plataforma para facilitaros los pedidos o pre-orders de "Graveyard Battle Arena".
Os ofrecemos distintas opciones para adquirir vuestro tablero de juego que os presentamos con más detalle en el apartado "Opciones de Pedido".
- ¿Esto quiere decir que no existen recompensas en esta campaña?
En absoluto, en esta campaña también vais a poder disfrutar de jugosas recompensas (totalmente gratuitas y desbloqueadas desde el primer momento) para todos los mecenas tal y como podréis comprobar en el apartado "Metas".

Aquí vais a encontrar una relación detallada de cada una de las opciones de pedido que tenemos a vuestra disposición así como del contenido incluido en cada una de ellas.

(Requiere montaje y pintado).   Si os decidís por esta opción, obtendréis todas las casillas en resina,  los muros que delimitan el tablero de juego, así como las instrucciones detalladas donde os indicaremos paso a paso, tanto el proceso de montaje, como el resto de materiales que os harían falta para dar más estabilidad y consistencia al conjunto. (En esta opción las casillas no son magnéticas),

(Requiere montaje y pintado). En esta opción, además de obtener todas las casillas en resina y los muros que delimitan el terreno de juego, también recibiréis varias láminas de contrachapado, un bastidor para aportar mayor estabilidad y consistencia al conjunto y una base metálica. A diferencia de la opción anterior, esta vez las casillas sí tienen base magnética (exceptuando los muros, ya que estos siempre serán fijos). Ahora vuestro tablero de juego es más estable, consistente y ¡¡ versátil !! Ya no tendréis que conformaros con una configuración cerrada, sino que podréis diseñar mapas alternativos simplemente cambiando la disposición de las casillas del tablero. Pero las posibilidades no terminan aquí, porque eligiendo esta opción, os aseguráis tener una base de juego totalmente compatible con futuros lanzamientos de nuevos tableros de juego, en los que tan sólo tendréis que sustituir unas casillas por otras para disfrutar de nuevas experiencias. 

Por supuesto, también incluimos las instrucciones paso a paso para que vosotros mismos podáis montar el conjunto fácilmente.

(Requiere pintado). Esta opción incluye todo lo que aparece en OPCIÓN FULL y además servimos el tablero de juego completamente montado. También incluimos una atractiva y resistente caja para poder guardar y transportar el tablero de juego de forma fácil y segura.

Con esta opción sólo tendréis que preocuparos de recibir vuestro tablero de juego y poneros a jugar al instante, porque os lo servimos completamente montado y pintado con unos acabados que os sorprenderán por su calidad. También incluimos la caja anteriormente mencionada en  la OPCIÓN FULL 2.


(Adjuntamos esta imagen, para que podáis ver de primera mano el acabado final del tablero. Aunque en esta imagen no aparezcan las casillas de salida ni las de monedas, en el tablero que recibiréis en vuestro domicilio si estarán presentes. Podéis ver el diseño de las mismas en el render mostrado en la opción FULL 2)


PINTADO DE TABLERO PERSONALIZADO (Sólo disponible para los mecenas que adquieran la OPCIÓN LUXE)

Al adquirir esta opción, nuestro equipo personalizará el tablero siguiendo  vuestras instrucciones y tomando como referencia una paleta de colores que publicaremos a lo largo de la campaña.

Además como extra, incluiremos una placa metálica en uno de los laterales del  tablero de juego en la que irá grabado   vuestro nombre o lo que deseéis (hasta 30 caracteres).



"Graveyard Battle Arena" es un producto manufacturado, casteado, ensamblado y pintado a mano en su totalidad. Debido a ello pueden existir pequeñas diferencias de acabado entre piezas distintas de la misma producción.

Este es un producto que por su particularidad no es recomendable para ser usado por menores de 12 años de edad sin supervisión adulta.


Los gastos de envío se deberán abonar antes de enviar el pedido, y después de contactar con vosotros e indicaros el total requerido. De este modo, tanto los contribuyentes como nosotros tendremos más control sobre el envío. 

ZONA A: Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Países Bajos, Portugal, Reino Unido, Suecia , Suiza, Noruega e Islandia.

ZONA B: Resto de Europa no incluido en la Zona A y Azores, Madeira, Mónaco, Isla de Man y Marruecos.

ZONA C: Africa excepto Marruecos.

ZONA D: Asia y Oceanía.

ZONA E: América.

ZONA F: España.

Precios orientativos sujetos a variación. Para otros métodos de envío consultar.

A fin de cumplir con las obligaciones fiscales del país de destino, es posible que el envío esté sujeto a tasas de importación y aranceles, los cuales se cobran en destino y cuya responsabilidad de pago recaerá sobre el comprador.

(Requiere montaje y pintado). En esta opción, además de obtener todas las casillas en resina y los muros que delimitan el terreno de juego, también recibiréis varias láminas de contrachapado, un bastidor para aportar mayor estabilidad y consistencia al conjunto y una base metálica. A diferencia de la opción anterior, esta vez las casillas sí tienen base magnética (exceptuando los muros, ya que estos siempre serán fijos). Ahora vuestro tablero de juego es más estable, consistente y ¡¡ versátil !! Ya no tendréis que conformaros con una configuración cerrada, sino que podréis diseñar mapas alternativos simplemente cambiando la disposición de las casillas del tablero. Pero las posibilidades no terminan aquí, porque eligiendo esta opción, os aseguráis tener una base de juego totalmente compatible con futuros lanzamientos de nuevos tableros de juego, en los que tan sólo tendréis que sustituir unas casillas por otras para disfrutar de nuevas experiencias. 
Por supuesto, también incluimos las instrucciones paso a paso para que vosotros mismos podáis montar el conjunto fácilmente.






(Requiere pintado). Esta opción incluye todo lo que aparece en OPCIÓN FULL y además servimos el tablero de juego completamente montado. También incluimos una atractiva y resistente caja para poder guardar y transportar el tablero de juego de forma fácil y segura.



Con esta opción sólo tendréis que preocuparos de recibir vuestro tablero de juego y poneros a jugar al instante, porque os lo servimos completamente montado y pintado con unos acabados que os sorprenderán por su calidad. También incluimos la caja anteriormente mencionada en  la OPCIÓN FULL 2.



(Adjuntamos esta imagen, para que podáis ver de primera mano el acabado final del tablero. Aunque en esta imagen no aparezcan las casillas de salida ni las de monedas, en el tablero que recibiréis en vuestro domicilio si estarán presentes. Podéis ver el diseño de las mismas en el render mostrado en la opción FULL 2)



PINTADO DE TABLERO PERSONALIZADO (Sólo disponible para los mecenas que adquieran la OPCIÓN LUXE)


Al adquirir esta opción, nuestro equipo personalizará el tablero siguiendo  vuestras instrucciones y tomando como referencia una paleta de colores que publicaremos a lo largo de la campaña.
Además como extra, incluiremos una placa metálica en uno de los laterales del  tablero de juego en la que irá grabado   vuestro nombre o lo que deseéis (hasta 30 caracteres).



"Graveyard Battle Arena" es un producto manufacturado, casteado, ensamblado y pintado a mano en su totalidad. Debido a ello pueden existir pequeñas diferencias de acabado entre piezas distintas de la misma producción.
Este es un producto que por su particularidad no es recomendable para ser usado por menores de 12 años de edad sin supervisión adulta.


Los gastos de envío se deberán abonar antes de enviar el pedido, y después de contactar con vosotros e indicaros el total requerido. De este modo, tanto los contribuyentes como nosotros tendremos más control sobre el envío. 




ZONA A: Alemania, Austria, Bélgica, Dinamarca, Eslovaquia, Eslovenia, Finlandia, Francia, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Lituania, Luxemburgo, Países Bajos, Portugal, Reino Unido, Suecia , Suiza, Noruega e Islandia.
ZONA B: Resto de Europa no incluido en la Zona A y Azores, Madeira, Mónaco, Isla de Man y Marruecos.
ZONA C: Africa excepto Marruecos.
ZONA D: Asia y Oceanía.
ZONA E: América.
ZONA F: España.
Precios orientativos sujetos a variación. Para otros métodos de envío consultar.A fin de cumplir con las obligaciones fiscales del país de destino, es posible que el envío esté sujeto a tasas de importación y aranceles, los cuales se cobran en destino y cuya responsabilidad de pago recaerá sobre el comprador.

story:
TRY DEMO NOW

 

Brief Intro

Next.Land is a project that I started developing in my free time. At the beginning, it was only a small experiment to demonstrate amazing new possibilities of modern web browsers, especially WebGL technology. Over time, it has turned a into simple game designed for casual players. A beautiful demo is already available for preview. Gameplay, balance, tempo and all the things that make a game great are already mapped out but not yet obvious in the demo.

IMPORTANT NOTICE

Please note that this demo has a very limited gameplay. It is more like an early alpha preview of the game. It uses dummy data and many features are not available yet.

The main purpose of this campaign is to promote my game. I want to attract a wide audience of players. I’m looking for inspiration and feedback from people who know and love strategic games. Backers will receive perks but the game will never be pay to win. I am very grateful for your support.

 

The Game

Next.Land is designed to be a joy to play. Play in actual world locations with an accurate 3D terrain and objects from the real world. Choose a location you like. Invite friends or join an open game to build real estate empire and crush your opponents. Manage your investments and cash flow, compete for customers, leverage your opponents out. Join Next.Land and become a Real Estate Tycoon.

NEXT.LAND IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND IT IS COMING EARLY 2017

Until the release date, you can explore the game in the demo preview and become familiar with the basic gameplay features. You can visit more than 30 predefined demo locations. Visit http://next.land to learn more.

TYCOON, BUSINESS SIMULATION GAME

Buy and sell properties, manage your finances and grow your empire.

REAL WORLD, LOW-POLY GRAPHICS

Enjoy simple, neat, low polygon design art. Interaction with elements from the real world makes your gaming experience extraordinary.

DEVELOP YOUR WORLD, COMPETE ON THE LEADERBOARDS

Upgrade and maintain your properties, apply skins and get bonuses. Become a world class investor your way.

PLAY MINIGAMES, EXPLORE LOCATIONS

Accomplish different tasks by playing minigames, enhance your progress, increase your income, improve your ranking, buy special buildings and more.

SHORT IN-GAME VIDEO

In this video you can see a short game introduction. Subscribe to the Next.Land YouTube channel to keep up to date on new features and progress.

 

 

The Rewards

For your support, you can choose between silver and gold premium account as a crowdfunding campaign reward. These premium game accounts contain various ingame upgrades and bonuses. To keep it really simple, only these two types have been set. Please, take into account that the exact specification of upgrades and bonuses will be adjusted to keep the game balanced with a growing player base.

 

  • Increased player limits - Base limits for your properties will be slightly increased.
  • Boost to player basic statistics - You will start with a bonus to your personal stats. Also you will get a fixed level you can't drop below.
  • Premium building skins - Access to the premium building skins for your property customization.
  • Your name in the credit section - Your name will be displayed as a game backer in the credit section (optional).
  • Pre-launch name booking - Choose your in-game name before the official release.
  • Pre-launch property booking - Select several buildings that will be available only for you when the game is released.
  • Free voting points - Get a special ability to vote for various in-game events.
     

Visit http://next.land/blog.php?crowdfunding to learn more

 

The Funds

All funds raised by the crowdfunding campaign will be used primary for computer and network infrastructure. With a solid server performance the game will be able to run without issues. Insufficient server performance could disappoint many players and ruin the gameplay completely. Below you can see some basic distribution of your money raised in the campaign.

Developing a game is a costly business. I have already invested a lot of resources into this project and I will keep doing this, but your help is very welcome. All I can do is to provide you as much information as possible so you are able to decide on your support.

 

The Team

I am the creator and the only developer right now. Next.Land is my personal project that I started developing in my free time. I can not compete with top video game makers and bring you the ultimate gameplay, graphics or whatever. I just want to bring you a simple game that is fun to play. I hope that this game will become popular and I will be able to expand the team and bring you an even better gaming experience.

 

Risks & Challenges

Game development is a difficult task. Because of various unforeseen events, it is common for game production to be delayed. I am doing everything I can to avoid extended deadlines or delayed development, but there is always a risk that this could happen. To keep you updated, I post regular articles about the progress on my DEV blog.

Another big problem is an unknown player base at this moment. It is a big difference to provide computer infrastructure for one hundred players and for one hundred thousand players. No one wants to play a game that is laggy and slow. Running crowdfunding campaigns is a great way to get at least a basic prediction for this.

With your help, I can deal with various obstacles that are in the way, and make sure you will be able to enjoy Next.Land soon.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I totally understand that some people just can't contribute. Don't worry, Next.Land is a free to play game. You will get a full, unrestricted access even with a non-premium account. There are still other ways you can help:

  • Tell your friends about the game
  • Use social media - subscribe to YouTube channel or tweet about the game
  • Send me a message with your ideas

Anyways, the best way how to help is just to play this game and have fun!

Thank you!

story:
Don't be discouraged by the fact that this is a 2D box game, the idea and features lay deeper into the games core build. Yes, ok it might not seem that way but we all love a small game we can play on the side while waiting for GTA V to load right? Well Box Maze is just that, jump into a quick online 1v1 Duel Arena and challenge anyone around the world while trying to crack the ranking ladder.

Play as a silly box and pass each level by finding your way to the door without being killed by your enemies. Use your enemy to reach higher platforms by jumping on its head (this also kills some enemies). Some levels may have multiple doors which will either push you back a level (or more) or pass the level. Some levels will require quick reflexes just to survive the first second ;).

Play against a challenging AI set to destroy you as you fight to beat your high score.

Play with a friend and use each other to reach higher platforms or kill pestly bosses and high level enemies.

Challenge your friends or foes in a 1v1 arena where only the best will survive, win by reaching the door first or by entering into their world and destroying their faces :P

Challenge your loved one to a 1v1 Duel (Perfect for deciding who is going to wash the dishes)

Ever wanted to take down your bestie? No seriously, kill them.


Fun and educational levels and game modes for kiddies of all ages.

1. Player made levels. 
2. High score/online stats. 
3. Boss fights. 
4. Character customization. 
5. Score system. 
6. Online multiplayer. 
7. Market place (No pay to win perks will be available). 
8. Steam trading cards. 
9. Mobile version. 
10. Count down timers for each level. 
11. Any many more. 

Purchasing any of the Exclusive Packages will include a full copy of the game, your name will also appear in the Box Maze Hall of Fame with the feature/level/design/etc that you purchased.

Exclusive Packages will consist of: 

  1. Player created levels.
  2. Player created enemies.
  3. Community created character customization.
  4. And many more.

Question - What do you mean by "release version of the game"?
Answer - This simply means that once the full version of the game is released, some items purchased in Exclusive Packages will not be available in game until then.

Question - When will the game be considered the "release version of the game"?
Answer - Once the Goal 1 under the Development Goals has been reached full I will begin working on adding the game to Steam Greenlight

              

              

Important Note: The current build of the game is Single Player and Co-op only, online features will be available on Steam at a later stage if we get Greenlit. However if we get funded and do not get Greenlit we will still release the game with all features on another platform.

story:
Nine Dragons RPG Ltd & Honour

Honour is a manifestation for 30 years of playing, reading, collecting and designing roleplaying games.

I'm Dom Parry, founder of Nine Dragons and if you've ever dreamed of throwing off your day job and starting your own company just so you could put your game out there because you know it is great and others will get joy from playing it, then you know me already and we'd probably get on pretty well!

Honour is our first product.  It is the result of a truly international effort (Hong Kong,  England, Armenia, Australia, the USA, Brazil and Mexico) by people who just love RPGs, love fantasy artwork and who love playing lets-pretend.  Honour is the first book in a trilogy which will build the game from Earth to the stars and other planes of existence and then beyond reality itself.

Honour puts players into the roles of extraordinary people in an extraordinary version of Earth and reality.  It pits technology against sorcery, physical strength against emotional strength and good against evil.  This game is our passion and we want to share that passion with you.

We have already invested significant funds and made significant personal sacrifices to get the book ready for print and all we need now are the funds to make the dream come true.  Your support can make Honour a reality.  You can help us print a beautiful hardback book, with great art and a great game.

What We Need & What You Get

This is what we need to get Book One: Honour printed and to our warehouse.  All the costs in bold italics we have already paid for out of our own savings; we are committed to this company and to this game.

ITEM

Hong Kong Dollars

Book A Interior Art

$4,000.00

Book A Cover Art

$1,000.00

Book A Layout and Design

$9,100.00

Book A Print

$13,851.60

Editor salary

$9,600.00

Legal Costs Trademark

$10000.00

Legal Costs Copyright Book

$7000

Website Dev

$1700

Logo Design

$640.00

Web domain reg

$400.00

Web hosting

$195.00

Already Paid Out

$7935

Still to Pay

$49552


So our funding target will be half of that, HK$25000 which is approximately US$3200

Perks will be offering:
Postcards with full colour cover art from Books One, Two and Three!

Early access to PDF copies of the game.

Beautifully crafted SpacesDie, made by Q-Workshop delivered to your front door.

The hardback Book One: Honour delivered to your front door.

The chance to design your own character and/or Inhuman and have them appear in the upcoming publication Book Two:  Drifters.

The chance to design your own plane of existence to be included in Book Three: The Unfortunate Burden of Savvy.

Risks & Challenges

The only real risk is to us as we have already paid out money on the project.  If we do not raise the target amount then all contributions will be refunded, so as a contributor you take on no risk at all.

The main challenge will be to  raised the profile of the book, but we are confident we can do that by getting great reviews from RPG websites, bloggers and even industry hotshots.  We will advertise on RPG.net and make Honour available on DriveThruRPG.com.  We will use Twitter, Facebook and Google+ to spread the word and will be sending complimentary copies to Convention organisers for them to use as give-aways.  However we can we will get this book known and talked about.  We even have a plan to use some guerilla marketing!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like the sound of Honour and our little company but you can't help out financially then how about by spreading the word?  Use IndieGoGo's sharing tools, tweet about us, heck, tweet at us @NineDragonsPub !

Maybe you are the creative type?  Then contact us with your ideas for supplements and adventures, you might not have the cash to help out but you probably do have the imagination to write something for us!  Even if it is just the description of one, solitary Demon!

We hope that the idea of Honour excites you and the prospect of helping to bring it to fruition is enough to let you get involved.
