story:
It's nice to be happy!

Amazing timeless social board playing gadget Irohi kickstart the world. Adults, school and preschool children enjoy playing this fabulous gadget Irohi and discovering new rules and combinatorics. Let's hang out and play!


Our sweet home! 

Irohi games will attract you so much, you will forget about time and play till you will be distracted...


Impregnated with nature!

           This fun board playing gadget Irohi can be played practically everywhere.
 


Discover new games!

While playing, you can also discover and set completely new games and rules.    Irohi is constructed to enable playing 1001 different games. The playing board enables 38 different scores and extra combinations of results. It gives a possibility of many different results in numbers from 0-36 and all letters of alphabet. 


For fun you can play also American Roulette.


                  While you are waiting for a series of Golf you can play Irohi games.


Irohi is very suitable for celebrations on the holidays&outside&at home.


             Irohi is very suitable for playing especially after science fiction movies.


                About product


Irohi has a gold colored ball in the middle in which you can insert different colored playing balls, from 1-5 pieces. When you spin the gold ball with already inserted playing balls, clockwise, the centrifugal force will throw them out of a playing board. Before the playing balls stop, they rotate for some time on the inner playing area of the board - on mortise of the wooden pedestal, which is made out of quality walnut and maple wood.



Playing gadget Irohi is skillfully manufactured from natural solid chosen materials. The gold ball is 80 cm diameter, playing colored wooden balls are 16mm diameter, the wooden pedestal or the base is 28 cm diameter.


   Select your own color!

We have carefully selected a range of 5 different awesome colors + Premium Gold Edition to choose your product color or even the excellent Premium Gold Edition.


Games

In the kit will be available to play in relation to the intended use, such as: smart, entertaining, educational, sexual, relaxation, hyper-logical.

On our website we will make a blog where we and you too can post interesting new Irohi games.

Through game, children also can get to know numbers, letters, colors and geometrical shapes in no time! It makes a lot of studying easier and faster.

You can also play bingo or trust Irohi the selection winner of numbers for Lotto or Jackpot.

In the box you will receive 4 different timeless amazing games for playing Irohi! Below we present in detail the first game: Spiral A1...



First game: Spiral A1

is social drinking game for 2-5 players in the same time. The game consist Irohi board playing gadget, 5 colored balls, 5 colored pieces and printed playing boards from cardboard, dimensions 21x21 cm.


Rules

  • Each player chooses a color and and put a ball in a golden orb and the same color piece in place on the spiral playing board.
  • Once all players have placed their balls and pieces in place, the first player spins a golden orb.
  • Each player rotate Irohi in turn rotates clockwise.  
  • When the rotation of the balls stop every ball show your hit.
  • The winner of each game is the player who stops the ball with the highest number. Only that player can move piece on the playing board to as many places as it shows the sum of ones and tens to hit its number. For example if the player Hit number 16 then move piece for 1+6=7 places.
  • Each player start move piece  where is signed on the playing board as two red arrows.
  • The player who hit a lower number must dispose of one piece of clothing. If a player later hit the highest number he can put latest piece of clothing back instead to move piece on a playing board. 
  • If you did not want to undress then arrange with his second chance. For example, that the player to do ten push-ups or other physical exercises. 
  • If a player hit a black circle on a playing board then he must be returned back to its home position. 
  • Each bead shows also hit, which is marked with golden characters on the wooden part. 
  • If a player hit a character who is fully painted with gold color must drink one drink unit. 
  • If a player hit a character who include in the center another small character then must drink half drink unit. 
  • If a player hit a blank character is not allowed to drink. 
  • The ultimate winner is the player who first come 5 times to the goal which is in the center of the spiral.


Why is Irohi so mysterious and exciting?

Rotation and energy is a basic principle of all of us!

So Irohi with balls fast energy rotation immediately takes over players.
“Rotate and Hit” is the basic moto of this new social board playing gadget that has no limits. Observe and feel that amazing energy, which is displayed when the balls begin to circulate.


Flower of Life


The oldest known physical example symbol "Flower of Life" is in the 6,000 year old Osirian Temple in Abydos, Egypt. "The Flower of Life" symbol is carved with laser-like accuracy on huge granite blocks in the temple walls.


In the context of ancient Egyptian mystery religions, "The Flower of Life" represented the infinite, yet structured matrix that subtly forms the reality we experience. This underlying order can be called God, the Universe, the Quantum Field, the Tao, or whatever you prefer to call it. It is the complete, all-encompassing flux of the world- from the smallest electron fields to the largest scales of the cosmos.
The largest mysterious inventor and artist of all time Leonardo da Vinci is used everywhere of his work scales of the "The Flower of Life".
Irohi contains all the dimensions in relation to "The Flower of Life" and much more.
The picture bellow is the famous Leonardo's drawing "The Flower of Life" in half covered with photo gadget Irohi. When you look carefully at a drawing, you may notice that the rotation of the balls exactly on the periphery of the "Flower of Life" and also all dimensions Irohi coincide with it!

Irohi isn't only a gadget for playing!

Leonardo's famous drawing of a man who proves that the human body also "Like all" is in proportion to "The Flower of Life" and Irohi.

Press


Product Warranty

We are confident you will be able to enjoy playing Irohi with your family and friends for fun and pleasant atmosphere. However, to cover our valued customers from any unlikely and unforeseen manufacturing defects or faults, every Irohi comes with a life time warranty.

Why we need your help

We have come this far and we are now at the point where we need to enroll your help to get Irohi over the line! In order to kick start the production of Irohi and fund our first batch of stock, we are asking for contributors to place their orders meaning we will be able to bring Irohi to you sooner and fulfill orders from December 2016.
What’s in it for you guys? Unbeatable, exclusive discounts off the RRP and an exceptional product that we guarantee will function properly and socialise for the better!
Why should you trust us? Our exceptional expertise and design, remarkable customer service and undeniable work ethic will ensure that your order is in the best of hands - you won’t be disappointed.
We have appointed only the best manufacturing and production partners who adopt the very same attention to detail that we do and who share the same enthusiasm and excitement for getting Irohi to you.
Your contributions and continued support will bring Irohi off the production line and into your home, gardens, nature, holidays, beaches, parks, clubs and pubs all over the world - that is timeless social playing gadget Irohi!

Thank you

We'd like to say thanks to our thousands of followers who have helped shape Irohi over the years and also to our friends, families and loved ones. Your ideas, feedback and patience have allowed us to make this idea real and we're so excited to be sharing this journey with you.
If you have a spare second then please help us spread the word. Every extra person who knows about Irohi really helps.
@irohi

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I get in touch with your team?

If you want to get it touch with the Irohi team for anything to do with the campaign, or if you just fancy a chat then spin an email over to play@irohi.com or reach out to us on our social channels. We’re a chatty bunch and will be happy to help.

Why have you partnered with Indiegogo?

Partnering with Indiegogo allows us to kick start our production & get Irohi to customers quicker than traditional methods.  As an international platform, Indiegogo can also get us exposure to customers across Europe and the U.S, which is important to us.

Why is there a delay from purchase to delivery?

We are a small company without limitless access to finance to build a supply of stock.  By supporting us through our campaign, you will help pay for our first full production runs which we will ship to you as soon they’re ready on a first come, first served basis.

When will the first Irohi be delivered?

Deliveries will begin from December 2016, subject to no unforeseen production delays.

Does Irohi come with a warranty?

Absolutely!  Every Irohi will come with life time warranty from any manufacturing faults or defects.

What comes in the box?

With every Irohi comes 5 different colored balls, 5 different colored pieces, 4 printed playing games& user manual complete with rules for playing.

When can I choose my colour?

Shortly after you have ordered your Irohi through Indiegogo, you will receive an email asking for your colour preference.

Where are you shipping to?

The territories we are shipping to are listed within the perks & different shipping rates will apply depending on where you are in the world.

I would like to change my shipping address. What should I do?

Send us your data immediately and a new shipping address to our e-mail: play@irohi.com

What will happen after the campaign?

Irohi will be retailing at $95 after the campaign through our website - www.irohi.com. We will advise on delivery times for those orders at the time.
I’m in the USA, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?
We are aiming to get stock landed both here in the EU and in the US from the beginning of November 2016 for deliveries to start.  If this looks likely to change for whatever reason we will of course be informing supporters as soon as possible.
I’m in Canada, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?
We are aiming to get stock landed both here in the EU and in Canada from the beginning of November 2016 for deliveries to start.  If this looks likely to change for whatever reason we will of course be informing supporters as soon as possible.
I’m in Australia, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?
We fully intend on bringing Irohi to your region in line with everyone else. 

How much will Irohi cost to buy on Indiegogo?

The sooner you buy, the less you pay!  We will be using a tiered pricing structure throughout the campaign with an initial price of $49. Don’t worry though, for those of you who are a little late to the show Irohi’s final campaign price will still be lower than the RRP after the campaign concludes.

I’m having trouble making a payment. Who should I reach out to?

We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please reach out to Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. One of their payments specialists will be able to assist you within 24 hours.

Can I get a refund?

According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends.
After the campaign, please reach out to our team at play@irohi.com!
@irohi

It's nice to be happy!
Amazing timeless social board playing gadget Irohi kickstart the world. Adults, school and preschool children enjoy playing this fabulous gadget Irohi and discovering new rules and combinatorics. Let's hang out and play!

Our sweet home! Irohi games 
will attract you so much, you will forget about time and play till you 
will be distracted...Impregnated with nature!           This fun board playing gadget Irohi can be played practically everywhere. Discover new games!While playing, you can also discover and set completely new games and rules.    Irohi is constructed to enable playing 1001 different games. The playing board enables 38 different scores and extra combinations of results. It gives a possibility of many different results in numbers from 0-36 and all letters of alphabet.  For fun you can play also American Roulette.                  While you are waiting for a series of Golf you can play Irohi games.Irohi is very suitable for celebrations on the holidays&outside&at home.             Irohi is very suitable for playing especially after science fiction movies.                About product
Irohi has a gold colored ball in the middle in which you can insert 
different colored playing balls, from 1-5 pieces.
When you spin the gold ball with already inserted playing balls, 
clockwise, the centrifugal force will throw them out of a playing board.
Before the playing balls stop, they rotate for some time on the inner 
playing area of the board - on mortise of the wooden pedestal, which is 
made out of quality walnut and maple wood. Playing gadget Irohi is skillfully manufactured from natural solid 
chosen materials. The gold ball is 80 cm diameter, playing colored wooden balls are 16mm
 diameter, the wooden pedestal or the base is 28 cm diameter.







   Select your own color!

We have carefully selected a range of 5 different awesome colors + Premium Gold Edition to 
choose your product color or even the excellent Premium Gold Edition. 












Games

In the kit will be available to play in relation to the intended use, such as: smart, entertaining, educational, sexual, relaxation, hyper-logical. 
On our website we will make a blog where we and you too can post interesting new Irohi games.
Through game, children also can get to know numbers, letters, colors and geometrical shapes in no time! It makes a lot of studying easier and faster. 
You can also play bingo or trust Irohi the selection winner of numbers for Lotto or Jackpot.

First game: Spiral A1

is social drinking game for 2-5 players in the same time. The game consist Irohi board playing gadget, 5 colored balls, 5 colored pieces and printed playing boards from cardboard, dimensions 21x21 cm.

story:
What's all about?

  • Hi again! Let me introduce myself...  my name is Matt and I am young artist from Poland and basically I have a great idea to help people with making beautiful looking games!
  • I want to make a package of 70+ art assets for isometric fantasy games with You.
  • With your help I can achive it 10 times faster and better than I would do it alone.
  • Here you can find and download early prototype of the project https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BzHhi7W_d2W_Q...
  • So far I made about 17% of the whole project. With your help I will create list of assets that will be included in the package.

What I Need & What You Get

 

  • My goal is 1800$ and I want to spend this money on things that will help me with development procces. The most important for me is to get a new drawing tablet to improve quality of assets, next I will buy licenses for programms.  Rest of money I will save for my living because I work full time and I would like to limit my regular job time to the minimum and focus on 100% on this project.
  • Be Creator! The most important is the fact that you will contribute to the creation process. Simply we will co create the whole package. Starting from list of objects, concepts we will start making our unique world and you will get acces to assets before the be realsed. You will get chance to give me huge feedback and some of you will get the whole package for free and some extra illustrations with dedication.
  • If I will not get to 1800$ which with your generosity I hope is not going to happend, I will spend money on the development procces and licenses. I'm going to finish assets and realse it on unity assets store anyway, but it will take probably much more time.

Just Imagine

  • Maybe you are indie game developer and you have a great idea for an amazing game but unfortunately you lack art skills. And what if all you need will be available to you soon.  Just imagine an abundance of assets to use like crates, rocks, dungeons, buildings, trees, villages, small towns, paths, camps, ruins ... It will all be available to you and you will be able to release your creativity.
  • Make Your Own Games like never before and share it to the world!
  • The idea is to make it as simple as it possible for amateurs and professionals. You can use these assets for mobile, pc games or even board games!

Risks & Challenges

 

  • You will not find any risks here but a lot of challenges. First of all remember that im not asking you just for some money but I'm asking you for Help.  I want you to be co-creator of this project so the challenge is for us to make something amazing!

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Follow my Instagram  https://www.instagram.com/mz_creative_/
  • Follow my YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHH0xybh-iplyZ...
story_txt:
What's all about?

Hi again! Let me introduce myself...  my name is Matt and I am young artist from Poland and basically I have a great idea to help people with making beautiful looking games!
I want to make a package of 70+ art assets for isometric fantasy games with You.
With your help I can achive it 10 times faster and better than I would do it alone.
Here you can find and download early prototype of the project https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BzHhi7W_d2W_Q...

So far I made about 17% of the whole project. With your help I will create list of assets that will be included in the package.


What I Need & What You Get
 

My goal is 1800$ and I want to spend this money on things that will help me with development procces. The most important for me is to get a new drawing tablet to improve quality of assets, next I will buy licenses for programms.  Rest of money I will save for my living because I work full time and I would like to limit my regular job time to the minimum and focus on 100% on this project.

Be Creator! The most important is the fact that you will contribute to the creation process. Simply we will co create the whole package. Starting from list of objects, concepts we will start making our unique world and you will get acces to assets before the be realsed. You will get chance to give me huge feedback and some of you will get the whole package for free and some extra illustrations with dedication.
If I will not get to 1800$ which with your generosity I hope is not going to happend, I will spend money on the development procces and licenses. I'm going to finish assets and realse it on unity assets store anyway, but it will take probably much more time.


Just Imagine

Maybe you are indie game developer and you have a great idea for an amazing game but unfortunately you lack art skills. And what if all you need will be available to you soon.  Just imagine an abundance of assets to use like crates, rocks, dungeons, buildings, trees, villages, small towns, paths, camps, ruins ... It will all be available to you and you will be able to release your creativity.

Make Your Own Games like never before and share it to the world!
The idea is to make it as simple as it possible for amateurs and professionals. You can use these assets for mobile, pc games or even board games!


Risks & Challenges
 
You will not find any risks here but a lot of challenges. First of all remember that im not asking you just for some money but I'm asking you for Help.  I want you to be co-creator of this project so the challenge is for us to make something amazing!

Other Ways You Can Help
 

Follow my Instagram  https://www.instagram.com/mz_creative_/

Follow my YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHH0xybh-iplyZ...

story:
Who are we?

We are a new startup that focuses on running gaming tournaments. We come from Hearthstone scene and that is why we focus mainly on Hearthstone tournaments at the moment. Since the development of our platform, we have run dozens of tournaments. We were able to get our tournaments licensed for HCT (World championship) points that hundreds of players could compete for while also being able to win prize money. 

Our goal of this campaign is to fund our first big Hearthstone Lan tournament with one of the best Hearthstone competitors in the world, the best casting talent and great production so everyone around the world can enjoy watching it.

What is Esportlair Cup?

Esportlair Cup is a $20 000 prizepool Hearthstone tournament with 8 invited pros and 8 qualified players that will take place in a small villa near Prague for 3 days. Planned date of the event is 20th-22nd of April 2018, right after the new Hearthstone expansion comes out. The whole tournament will be broadcasted live on twitch.tv and our first invite is Stan Cifka who is at the moment No. 3 in the world. We will be releasing names of our other invites every 3 days but I can already tell you that it is stacked.

How can you participate?

There are two options. First one is for the competitive types. If that is you, there is a way to qualify for the tournament. The qualifier will have 512 spots, which you can get by contributing to our campaign with the "Player" perk. The format of the qualifier will be 9 rounds swiss, best of 5 Conquest with 1 class ban. Top 7-8 (depends on the "Crazy player" perk) will qualify for the main event. All of the players that will qualify for the main event will have their travels and accommodations paid for by us. 

If you are more of an observer type. You can participate just by watching the tournament once it will run in April on Twitch. But for that to happen, first we need to reach our campaign goal. Even though  55% of the campaign goal will come from the players themselves It is not enough to succeed with our campaign. That is why we are are also reaching out to the broader Hearthstone community and I think we prepared really nice rewards for all of our backers. If you can't or just don't want to contribute to our campaign with money, but you still like the project, sharing it on your social media or showing it to your friends would go a long way as well :).

What will the money go towards?

So since $60 000 for a $20 000 tournament might seem like a huge difference. You might be asking where is the rest of the campaign money going to? The money will go towards casting talent, production team salaries, some production tech that will need to be bought/borrowed, renting the villa, towards the rewards that you get for contributing to the campaign and as already mentioned towards paying the travels and accommodations of the qualified players. Around 10% of the campaign will be also eaten by the Indiegogo cut and processing payment fees.

Why are we crowdfunding the tournament?

Our main plan was to get the funds for the tournament from commercial brands that we would advertise during the tournament. Problem is that since we are a new startup with no tournaments of this scale done by us, these brands rather choose different companies with results behind them. This, of course, makes sense, but it is quite unfortunate for us. This is also the main reason why is this first tournament so important to us. 

If you decide to help us fund this endeavor, you will be also indirectly helping us fund more Hearthstone tournaments(which are unfortunately on decline at the moment) in the future, since we will finally have data we need to show to our potential partners in the future and that would mean more HS tournaments in general for you to watch. 

What happens to your money if we don't reach the goal?

This campaign has a fixed goal plan. Which means that all of our backers will get their money back if the goal of the campaign is not met. We are here to make this great project reality and not to take anybody's money from them if it fails. I hope you will join us! :)

This campaign has a fixed goal plan. Which means that all of our backers will get their money back if the goal of the campaign is not met. We are here to make this great project reality and not to take anybody's money from them if it fails. I hope you will join us! :)

story:
My name is Dean Ashford, an Unreal Engine 4 YouTube content creator. For almost two years I have been teaching others how to create video games while working as a freelancer for different indie studios around the UK. Today, I’d like to introduce you to my project, Boxi.

Boxi is a cute and colourful platform game fuelled by a community of gamers and developers. Members of our community tell us what kind of content they want to see in the game, and our team collect these ideas and discuss them to see which ones would gel together in a satisfying way.

Boxi is a creature made of cardboard living in a world of robots. Being the only one of their kind, our hero suffers from an inferiority complex, jealous of how advanced the robots are in comparison.

Boxi sets out on an adventure to upgrade their body so that they can fit in with the other inhabitants of the world. Along the way, Boxi discovers they have access to abilities and powers the robots can’t use. These unique abilities boost Boxi’s confidence and show them realise being different isn’t a bad thing.

 

 

As the player progresses through the game, Boxi will obtain upgrades that will overcome obstacles in upcoming levels and unlock previously unreachable areas in previous zones.

RC Car – Areas too small for Boxi to enter are perfect for the remote-control car. Take control of Boxi’s favourite vehicle and drive around through small tunnels and gaps, who knows what you might find lurking.

Bounce – Boxi can only jump so high, good thing you can throw down a bounce pad to spring yourself higher than usual to get to those hard to reach places.

Grapple – Some areas aren’t safe enough for a Bounce, good thing you found that grapple hook to fly across those extra wide gaps.

Freeze – Boxi can’t go into water! But luckily you can freeze the surface of the wet stuff to cross safely.

 

 

The funds we raise for Boxi will be used to purchase additional software licences for team members, additional equipment where needed, advertising and events.

If we don't reach our goal, we'll still be developing Boxi, but crowdfunding will allow us to work on the project quicker.

We appreciate every bit of help we receive, and would love to be able to bring Boxi to life as soon as we can.

 

The demo is now available, and can be downloaded at https://intergalacticsandwich.itch.io/boxi feel free to give it a try.

story:
The Game

Strange things are occurring in the galaxy. Multiple planetary systems, seemingly unrelated and far away from each other, have suddenly swirled into chaos. Wars are erupting, space gangs are running amok and communications are lost. Unexplainable phenomena are reported and weird creatures are sighted. What is happening? That's for you to find out, captain!

Captain on the Bridge is a multi-genre space adventure, encompassing action, strategy, puzzle-solving and RPG elements. It's a story-driven journey across a randomly-generated galaxy filled with varying sets of handcrafted encounters, locations, quests, characters and enemies. Emphasis is on replayability, as even the main story line will have alterations and provide surprises on different playthroughs.

Game's plot stretches over several planetary systems, which are small open worlds. You control a starship, with a freedom to explore each system at your own pace, undertake missions, solve quests, gather resources, defeat enemies and meet the inhabitants of the galaxy. 

As a starship captain, you have many tools at your disposal and plenty of things to upgrade and customize:

  • Ship: You can alter your ship's layout and build it piece by piece. Install weapons, engines, power generators and many other parts to change the ship's performance and appearance.
  • Fighters: Your ship can carry multiple small space fighters. You can design them the way you want by placing components in slots. Components work differently in different configurations. You must ensure that energy from power sources is properly routed to the components needing it.
  • Expeditionary force:  Under your command you have a small military force which can fight enemies on planets. You get to develop more advanced military units and structures and modify them to better suit your needs; for example, you can modify a unit to have more attack but be more expensive to build.
  • Away team: Away team is a group of close combat specialists who can infiltrate ships and buildings. You can recruit, train and equip team members. There are multiple classes of them, and they gain experience and level ups after missions.
  • Heroes: Some of the characters you meet may join your crew. These heroes can be used as leaders in battles to gain unique bonus abilities. They can also do special tasks, like use diplomacy to find a peaceful solution to a conflict.
  • Cards: Disposable quantum cards can be collected and used during battles to combat bad luck by getting an instant one-time bonus.

When hostiles are encountered or a mission is started, it's time to fight! Captain on the Bridge contains four different types of battles:

Real-time battles between big spaceships

Turn-based tactical combat between small space fighters

Real-time close combat shooting with an away team

​Turn-based strategic ground battles on planets

Each of these battle types features completely different game mechanics. Please watch the campaign video for more details on them.

But the game is not just about fighting. There is also plenty of adventuring to do with decisions to make, inventory-puzzles to solve and characters to talk with (by typing in keywords). Many of the quests have alternative non-violent solutions and you can discover hidden locations, gain unique items and even open secret paths on the main storyline by looking around and using your brain.

Here's an example of a simple quest with multiple possible solutions:

 
In addition to story-related content, there are side quests and other optional activities, which are randomly selected for each adventure. The heroes, ship components and other resources you find and have to survive with are also different on each playthrough.

     

    About Me

    My name is Veli-Matti Törmänen, pleased to meet you! I'm a professional programmer, an amateur musician and a wannabe game developer, making games in my free time and operating under the name Hot Byte Games. My first and so far only released creation is a rock band management simulation A Story of a Band, which was released on Android (2012), iOS (2013) and PC/Mac (2018). I've also worked on music & sound design for other developers' projects, for example VirtuGO.

    I've been a keen gamer all my life and enjoy creating games because it involves multiple arts close to my heart: drawing,  music and storytelling. Besides games and music, I've made short movies and  comic strips (non-professionally).

     

    Why Crowdfunding & How Will The Money Be Used?

    The main objective of this fund-raising is to keep me alive while I complete Captain on the Bridge. I've been working on this game for three years in my spare time, and would now like to start developing it full-time. If this campaign is successful, it will allow me to focus 100% on this game, have it be completed faster, and use all my energy, time and creativity to make it as good as I possibly can. The raised money (after deducting taxes) will go to paying for food, rent and other necessities needed to keep my health bar full.   

    The secondary objective, if this campaign is popular enough, is to let me hire some help with the game's assets. Ideally, I would like to recruit three people: one to aid me with graphics, another one to create some of the music and sound effects, and a third one to proofread all texts and write some side quests. All of this is optional and not obligatory in order to finish the project, but any extra help would allow me to expand the game, add more content to it and make it overall more polished. I can hire at least one person for a couple of months if the campaign reaches 20,000€, and every contribution beyond that means more workforce.

     

    Current Progress

    The game engine and game mechanics are pretty much complete. All battle types are fully playable and stable. Most of the sound effects and music are missing. Majority of the story missions and quests are yet incomplete. Also much more content in general, like side quests, heroes, enemies, weapons etc. needs to be added, and they all require new graphic assets drawn, which is perhaps the single most time-consuming work left. Estimated release is in August 2020.

     

    Bonus Goals

    Below are some extra features I would like to add to the game, but had to put on hold because of lack of time and resources. They will be implemented if the project gets enough support so that I can hire some helping hands.

    20,000€ - Flight Crew: In addition to heroes, there will be various other classes of crew members to recruit, like navigators, medical officers and engineers. Their skills will range from boosting the ship's weapons to healing injured away team members after a mission.

    30,000€ - Minigames: Three minigames will be added: a hacking themed puzzle game, a resource mining game and a nuclear war themed arcade game within a game that can be played against various characters in the galaxy.

    40,000€ - Ship interior: Player will be able to walk inside their starship among the crew members. The rooms and spaces therein can be upgraded and decorated. The hangar bay, for example, can be modified to hold more fighters. This section will use the same top-down view as the close combat section.

    50,000€ - Explorable planets: You will be able to send an away team down to some planet surfaces to explore, gather resources, fight alien flora and fauna and to search for treasures.

     

    Risks

    This might seem like too big of a project for one person to handle. However, majority of the work has been done, and really the only thing that would prevent me from finishing this game is if something unexpected happens to me. The most realistic risk is that I'm unable to deliver the complete version of the game within the estimated time. If that happens, there's a possibility of releasing the game first as an early access title and then adding the missing content as updates.

     

    Don't Keep It a Secret!

    If you got interested in Captain on the Bridge, please spread the word and let more people know about it! Raising awareness for a game is vital, but also very difficult to do as a small indie developer. Even if you're unable to fund this time, you can help a great deal by sharing this page or the campaign video with your friends, web community, favorite streamers, youtubers and anyone you think might be interested.

    This project is very important to me, and I want to thank you for taking the time to read this pitch. See you on the bridge, captain!

story:
Set in a beautiful medieval world ...

You play a 17-year-old girl who has just been betrothed - to none other than the king ...

You are to journey to the palace to meet your fiance, escorted by five unusual companions ...

Experience romance, laughter and magic along the way ... but will you make all the right choices to find your 'happily ever after'? 

INITIAL REACTIONS FROM OUR FANS!

 

Play the FREE DEMO!

 

       

 

 

 

BEFORE YOU PLAY ...

  • Recommended Resolution: 1920x1080. 
  • Use manual click-throughs instead of 'Auto', which sometimes cuts off dialogue, even at slower speeds. 
  • Adjust your music and sound volume in 'Preferences' according to what feels  comfortable. We recommend setting Music at half volume, and Sound and Voice at max.
  • Do share any feedback on the demo, especially if you face technical issues. This is our first such project, but we will do our best to help resolve them, where possible. Let us know in the comments.

 

What can you expect from the full game? Here are bonus clips from each love interest's route (yet to be voiced).

It's the middle of the night, and Thrace wants to know what you're up to ...

Click here to view video!

Kadan wouldn't be Kadan without plenty of flirting, and he sure wastes no time with you!

Click here to view video!

Iandir is getting a lot of attention from admirers. What will that mean for you?

Click here to view video!

You and Roxas have a debate about your upcoming betrothal that gets a little heated ...

Click here to view video!

Something seems a little off with your old friend Aiden ...

Click here to view video!

These are just snippets, but we have written, coded and playtested the full game's script for all 5 love interests. What remains are the art, voice work, music and sound effects to bring the game to fruition.

Backers will get the game at a slight discount, compared to the retail price, and will receive Indiegogo-exclusive ...

We understand that it's hard to confidently back a project when you can't really visualize what you're going to get. So, here's what you can expect!

1) Good Endings only cheat guide for those who like smooth sailing (no judging, we promise!)

2) Digital artbook - How did we develop the characters? What was the inspiration behind the settings? What did the early and alternate designs look like? We will share the stories and rationale behind the world and characters we have created.

3) Original soundtrack (digital copy) for when you can't get that song out of your head. Here are snippets, each song unique in its emotions:

Click here to listen on our website

4) Desktop wallpapers - As featured in our intro video. Which one's your favorite?

5) Have a minor character in the game named after you! It can be your name, or you can dedicate it to someone else as a gift (Limited Slots). Or we can even choose for you and make it a surprise. Note that some characters have a larger role than others.

Learn more about the characters here. 

6) Get a voiced shout-out from one of the 5 love interests! It can be your name, or you can dedicate it to someone else as a gift. The shout-out will feature in the credits at the end of the game (Limited Slots).

7) Become an Easter egg in the background art (one visual). We can draw you, or one object that means a lot to you - a loved one, a pet, your home - you can get creative (Limited Slots)!

 

8) Early access - We're aiming for the first route (or at least some chapters) to be ready in Q3 2019, and all routes to be completed in Q1 2020. We will keep backers posted along the way, and will update with any changes in the timeline.

If we reach our funding goal, we will create an "Ask Us Anything!" video with the love interests! 

Comment with your questions for Thrace, Kadan, Aiden, Roxas and Iandir. Or tag us on social media, and we will pick our favorites to feature in the video, and mention you!

Facebook @tangodreamgames

Instagram @tangodreamgames

Twitter @tangodreamgames

Tumblr @tangodreamgames

Email us at hello@tangodreamgames.com

LYANA S.: CREATOR, WRITER & DEVELOPER

"The inspiration behind this project was to create the kind of visual novel that I wanted to play. Much as I love the Korean and Japanese visual novels out there, I wanted to see more Western ones, especially of the fantasy genre. If you're as excited about Queen of Hearts as we are, please support us!"

ANASTAS E.: CHARACTER & CG ARTIST

"I joined this project because I love the unique characters. Like Lyana, I love Japanese visual novels, but I really wanted to create my own style and create the characters the way I see them. I hope you like the characters as much as I do!"

BELA S.: BACKGROUND ARTIST

"I find it very special to work with creative people, achieving more than we could individually, being part of creating a visual novel. I love designing medieval fantasy places. My imagination feels fully at home in the Queen of Hearts kingdom, ready to kindle to life more enchanted places for the characters to explore."

CHINGIS S.: COMPOSER

"I started to work with Lyana, because I love the wonderful world created by her. I also really liked how the main character is drawn. Therefore, I wanted to write subtle and beautiful melodies using only the most delicate timbres to bring out this beauty."

ABOUT THE COMPANY 

Tango Dream Games is a Singapore start-up that aims to bring quality Western-geared romantic visual novels to the world. 

Our name comes from how our visual novels aspire to be fun, flirty and passionate, just like tango - the dance. "Dream" is the expression of seeking to turn dream projects into reality.

Queen of Hearts is our first visual novel, and the results of our campaign will be very important in determining if we can bring you more visual novels in future.

My imagination feels fully at home in the Queen of Hearts kingdom, ready to kindle to life more enchanted places for the characters to explore."CHINGIS S.: COMPOSER"I started to work with Lyana, because I love the wonderful world created by her. I also really liked how the main character is drawn. Therefore, I wanted to write subtle and beautiful melodies using only the most delicate timbres to bring out this beauty."ABOUT THE COMPANY Tango Dream Games is a Singapore start-up that aims to bring quality Western-geared romantic visual novels to the world. Our name comes from how our visual novels aspire to be fun, flirty and passionate, just like tango - the dance. "Dream" is the expression of seeking to turn dream projects into reality.Queen of Hearts is our first visual novel, and the results of our campaign will be very important in determining if we can bring you more visual novels in future.

story:
Welcome!

GrumpyMunkyGameDesign is a One-Man Sole Trader making games in my spare time.

Originally I wanted to be a Fast-Jet Pilot in the RAF but after my Mom had multiple strokes I had to resign myself to being a live-in full time carer. But during that time, I taught myself programming, game design and experimented with several engines from consumer level 'off the shelf' offerings such as FPSCreator and DarkBasic, up to eventually getting involved with Unreal Engine 4 and beginning Work on Minimum Wage.

I Spent almost 2 years working on the game before my Mom eventually passed away, and it sat stagnant for over a year just gathering dust as I dealt with the grief and my personal life falling apart, now thanks to much support from friends and loved ones I'm back in the saddle and after much encouragement from said friends and loved ones finally believe in myself enough to bring my project to the public.

After spending so long as a carer and being left with so much debt after my Mom passing, I dont have the funds to seek publishing on marketplaces like Steam or Gog.com, or pay for any advertising. We had the game on itch.io for a while but without the funds to purchase Ad's or otherwise drive traffic to the page it simply languished as it waited for people to stumble across it.

Your funding and support will go towards paying the fees to get the game listed on places such as Steam and towards securing Advertising, Marketing and Social Media prescence to drive potential customers towards the page and otherwise make people aware that the game even exists.

What We Need & What You Get

We aren't looking for a huge amount of funding, just enough to cover the Steam fees and other aggregator site fees or advertising to get the game in front of potential players and make them aware of its existence, what it is and why they might like to play it.

The game is currently in extreme early access, but is completely playable from start to finish (With the content we currently have tested and functional) so everyone who backs at the appropriate tiers won't have to wait to play it, the Early Access build will be made available at the end of the campaign with download codes being sent out to all backers who pledge at those levels.

Other perks are included such as credits, your own personal spaces in some of the levels (for example there are several unoccupied desks in the Office Level, that can be customized and made your own for you own unique stamp on the actual game itself, at the appropriate tier.)

If we fail to meet the goal, we will still endeavour to do as much as possible with the funds provided. If we cannot afford the Steam fees still, we will direct the money into driving traffic towards the Itch.io listing, but if we can at least get enough to pay the Steam fees, then any additional funding will go towards driving traffic to the Steam pages, securing content providers to play and stream the game and any other marketing avenues we can possibly use to get word out about the game.

The Impact you support will have

Without your help and support this project is stuck in limbo, with all the personal issues, both financial and mental we have endured over the last 12 months or so, there's almost no way we can afford to pay the Steam registration fees or put money aside for advertising. So without you, there is NO Minimum Wage, you are that important to the success or failure of this game and we understand that as first timer's when it comes to IndieGoGo and Crowdfunding, we are going to have to go the extra mile to build that important trust between backer and campaigner.

We aren't trying to pull a fast one, or defraud anyone, thats why we ask for so little. We believe the game can stand on its own two feet and attract an audience, if only we can get it in front of that audience and secure some advertising to bring the game to the attention of people who may wish to play it.

Risks & Challenges facing us

As first time campaigners we understand we are venturing into unknown territory, we have never ran a successful crowdfunding campaign nor had to handle any financial commitments that weren't solely our own.

But we are quick to learn and with your support and guidance we are certain we can overcome any hurdles or challenges that might befall us, I have almost 10 years experience in game design and have put out free games that have been streamed/played by youtubers and streamers, so we feel confident in the game itself, but simply lack the start up capital to get it in front of the right people and thats where you come in!

We have a distribution method in place to get download codes to backers to fulfill our pledges and have been in touch with Steam and places like Gog.com and Humble bundle, we just lack the funds for the upfront costs assosciated with registration and marketing.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant help out financially in these times, with Covid-19 running rampant its no surprise.

But please, Share this project with friends, facebook groups, twitter, youtube etc and help get the word out and maybe some of the folks you send here can contribute where you may not be able to.

story:
Update #1

IPA SUPPORT COMING!: After many requests I decided to add an IPA option to the game, I'm looking for the best way to implement it, but it is coming for sure!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

langues is a trivia or guessing game for your smartphone, it's really simple actually, you will have a word on screen and your goal will be knowing in what language it has been written.

...but it gets bigger...

See, just like you, I'm not a big fan of current trivia games, which is why I decided to make this one unique. Apart from it having a not-so-common theme, there will be ridiculous amounts of customization, from in-game wallpapers to clicking sounds, background music and more to come...

Work in progress.

You tell me, is learning how to say torpedo in German, while having a double rainbow across the sky on your phone and listening to a Mariachi jamming fun for you?

If not, then I guess this game is not for you.

Contributions are the only way this project could ever exist.

I'm a Venezuelan college student who just turned 18 (that basically means I'm broke beyond belief and finding developing partners in my country is extremely difficult), which is why this game would be fed with your contributions and grow to its full potential.


But don't worry, you would only be helping this dream become a reality, not helping me become a slob.

These are the available rewards (more info on the rewards section).

Q: Where will my money go?

A: It will towards development and some other finishing touches the game needs.

Q: Will you be coding this yourself?

A: No, actually I will be paying the help of a coder for this game.

Q: I (don't have/don't want to give you) money, how else can I help you?

A: Spread the word about this project, tell your family or friends if you really want to give me a hand.

Q: What will you pay with my money?

A: Licensing costs, developer fees and most important, coding.

Q: What if you can't complete the project?

A: I will do my best and a little extra for this game to be released, more than doing this for any money, I'm doing to prove something myself; but if by any circumstance the project shuts down your money will be reimbursed in full.

Q: What's your next move?

A: If this project goes succesfull (even if it doesn't), I will be moving to a ton of ideas I have right now.

Q: Can I see more photos?

A. Sure, there are more photos in the gallery.

story:
"Catch Krishna in Vrindavan" is the very first bhakti board game, in which main characters are divine personalities of Hindu mythology: Radha, Krishna and the gopis. Most of you might wonder how come that the idea of such an unusual game came to our minds. As behind every product made with Love there is always a story, there is also a story behind the “Catch Krishna in Vrindavan” game. How has it started? Read on our blog: http://catchkrishna.com/how-it-started

"Catch Krishna in Vrindavan” is a unique board game that will take you into the magical world of Vrindavan letting you participate in one of the most thrilling ancient spiritual love stories the world has ever known: the story about Krishna and the gopis. Like the gopis were always looking for their beloved Krishna in many places of Vrindavan, so you will now walk with your “gopi pawn” on the map, along with other players, trying to find and catch Krishna. You will discover many magical sacred places and temples on your way. But do not forget the goal! You have only 27 rounds to catch Krishna.




“Catch Krishna in Vrindavan” is a mythic board game in which one player, taking the role of Krishna, tries to hide and run away from the other players, the gopis, who attracted by the magical music of his flute try to find and catch him. It requires a great deal of strategic thinking as well as team spirit and cooperation between the players. Special powers, mystical gates and peacock roads add another dimension to the game, which opens up infinite possibilities and awakens imagination and out-of-the-box thinking. The board is an original map of Vrindavan which includes historic, mythical and holy places and temples of ancient India thus making “Catch Krishna in Vrindavan” an educational game!



  • the board of the game, the original map of Vrindavan, printed on canvas, rolled on two wooden sticks,
  • the instruction,
  • the description of the holy places,
  • a notebook with a table to write down the moves of the players,
  • 1 Krishna pawn and 6 gopi pawns made of wood,
  • 18 wooden numbered coins,
  • 6 gopi cards and 1 Krishna card,
  • 3 special power cards for Krishna,
  • 4 mystic gate small-cards,
  • 40 peacock mini-cards,
  • 9 boat mini-cards.

All small elements are packed nicely into elegant satin bags and together with the board ultimately closed in a stylish, ancient-like tube.


"Catch Krishna in Vrindavan” is a game truly made out of love and sincere wish to spread positive values around the world. Its authors, Achala and Govindadas, dedicated their lives to spiritual development, and the game itself is in fact a creative and fun expression of their love towards higher values, their spiritual master, and each another.



In 33 days starting on Krishna's Birthday, we need to collect minimum 16.108 euros in order to be able to start the production process of the game and open the comapany. This will be just enough to print first the 500 games. This means, that if only 500 persons preorder the game (and we are sure that there are many more fans of Krishna out there!), we can already start the production process.

Isn't it awesome?

However, we won’t be able to produce this game without your support. Production and launching of the game is a big project and it demands covering not only the costs of printing but also marketing, taxes, necessary licenses and salaries for all the people who have been working for many days and nights on it. An ambition to make our game of 100% biodegradable materials as well as not to have it “made in China” but in our homeland is an additional challenge. But I am sure that together we can make miracles. Are you in?





The same board - a completely different game.
We already know you will fall in love with it!

In this bonus game Radha and Krishna try to meet in Vrindavan but their grandmothers, old cowherd woman, try to find them and bring them back to their respective homes. This romantic bonus game keeps all players in suspense and requires good strategic thinking, as Krishna shows his position on the map only from time to time. All players have here slightly different special powers than in “Catch Krishna in Vrindavan”. Radha can hide in a temple to avoid meeting the grandmothers, Krishna can write a secret love letter to Radha from time to time, and the grandmothers… can use their secret underground passages.

Inside the game you will find 5 more wooden coins with different starting points for Radha and Krishna as well as the instruction printed in full color, all together nicely packed in a satin bag, just fitting into the "Catch Krishna in Vrindavan" tube.





Get to know another addition to the game created especially for the upcoming Diwali! We are not wasting time! This special addition contains the instructions to 3 completely new games to be played on the "Catch Krishna in Vrindavan" board along with 120 additional colorful wooden coins representing the Diwali lamps and 16 cards with specific tasks for each player. In the beginning of one of these 3 games each player receives a card with their task and tries their best to complete the task - before the other players complete theirs. No player knows the tasks of the other players, so it requires a great deal of strategic thinking. Light up the whole map of Vrindavan during this Diwali! But remember to complete your task before the others do theirs. The player who completes his task first becomes the winner of the game. Soon we will upload here more pictures and more information about this special addition to the game.









Do you want to feel better the atmosphere of Vrindavan while playing the game? We have prepared for you a special 45-minutes long mp3 recording with the sounds of nature from Vrindavan! You can choose it as your reward in one of the options on the right. Soon we will upload here also a free mp3 sample.




Every little bit helps and every donation is appreciated - even the smallest one. No matter how big is your donation for our project, you'll be included on our website on the list of initial donors who were there with us from the very beginning. We will reward you also by sending you a special e-book with the poems about Krishna and the gopis that were written this year by one of the creators of the game: Achala.











Are you an owner of a shop and you are already interested in ordering more than just one game? Give us the opportunity to serve you! Contact us directly and we will prepare a special offer just for you.



In case we fail to collect the minimum amount of funds needed for the start of the production process, you will receive all your money back. Depending on the number of preorders and the scale of production, there might be a slight delay in time in shipping. But no worries, we already have checked many shipping options and have many possible alternatives. We will make sure that you will receive your package as soon as possible. All parcels will be tracked and insured, so there is no risk that your parcel will get gone somewhere on its way. If such a situation will happen, you will immediately receive from us a replacement.



Do you want to be sure that you are always one of the first ones who receive the latest news from us? Sign up to our mailing list and stay updated: eepurl.com/bxfxyP

Be sure to also follow us on facebook and twitter!



Do you have a fanpage, a webpage, a newsletter or a blog? Spread the word! Help us to inform more people about this exciting project. We are open for all possibilities. Please, do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to serve you. And together we can do miracles!

story:
Hello, I'm Thato Mogale

I am a 20-year-old self-taught game developer from Ga-Kgapane, Limpopo, South Africa. I love making video games as much as I love playing them. I am a big Chelsea F.C. fan and I love Marvel films. I grew up in and out of poverty, but I've always made the most out of it. I have been a solo independent developer for nearly 2 years now and despite the lack of resources, I have spent hours upon hours in that time, sharpening my skills and abilities, until I've become an expert. And looking back, what a journey it has been, from playing with a brick as a toy car to making video games. 

 

What's this game about?

Smack A Thief is a 3D, tower defence, action mobile game where the objective is simple, stop house robbers from stealing your stuff by smacking them! The game gets progressively more difficult as you go, and there are 4 powerups to aid you along the way.

HOW TO PLAY
Light Smack - Tap on the thief
Medium Smack - Hold your finger on the screen and release it on the thief when the bar turns red and the crosshair appears
Hard Smack - Hold your finger on the screen a little longer and release it on the thief when the bar turns red and the crosshair appears

Take a look at the game on the Apple App Store, or the Google Play Store!

Where will the money go?

The money will count as capital, and will go towards:

- Building a team. I currently do everything myself (you name it, I do it) and that's too much for one man. So I need skilled individuals that can help me with game design, art, programming, audio (sound effects and music), animation etc.

- Adding more features (levels, powerups etc) and improving gameplay

- User Acquisition. This is when a video game is promoted and advertised to gain more users, which in turn will generate more revenue.

- The money will also lay a strong foundation for sequels and future games

Having studied accounting, business studies, and economics in high school and university (at Wits University, which is the top business university in Africa) for 4 years prior to getting into game development, I am well-equipped even on the financial side.

How much of an impact will your money have?

A lot. It will improve the game itself ie. the art, gameplay, audio (music and sound effects), physics, graphics, graphics, the list goes on. This is a game that could potentially be the next Crossy Road, Flappy Bird or dare I say, Minecraft success story. And if you're looking at the bigger picture, your contribution will mean even more than that. There are not a lot of African game developers out there, and I am hoping that the success of this game will inspire young people to get involved in the video game industry, and overall, the tech industry.

 

What is the ultimate goal?

And even if the target goal is not reached, the money will still be spent on improving the game. I will still continue to pour my heart and soul into this project and improve the game in whatever way I can with the resources I have. Hopefully, I can one day scrape together some money to move to Silicon Valley in California (where there are more opportunities for tech companies).

At the end of the day, I want to make a high-quality game for everyone to enjoy and it would be my greatest ever achievement to fulfil this.

 

Don't have any money? You can still help

If you can't contribute, that's okay, you can help by downloading the game on the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store and spreading the word by sharing the game's link with your friends and family and following Smack A Thief on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Oh and please remember to use Indiegogo's share tools!

I am also looking for a game publisher or investor, so if you work in the video game industry or know anybody who does and has an interest in working with me please let me know.
story_txt:
Hello, I'm Thato Mogale
I am a 20-year-old self-taught game developer from Ga-Kgapane, Limpopo, South Africa. I love making video games as much as I love playing them. I am a big Chelsea F.C. fan and I love Marvel films. I grew up in and out of poverty, but I've always made the most out of it. I have been a solo independent developer for nearly 2 years now and despite the lack of resources, I have spent hours upon hours in that time, sharpening my skills and abilities, until I've become an expert. And looking back, what a journey it has been, from playing with a brick as a toy car to making video games. 
 
What's this game about?

Smack A Thief is a 3D, tower defence, action mobile game where the objective is simple, stop house robbers from stealing your stuff by smacking them! The game gets progressively more difficult as you go, and there are 4 powerups to aid you along the way.
HOW TO PLAYLight Smack - Tap on the thiefMedium Smack - Hold your finger on the screen and release it on the thief when the bar turns red and the crosshair appearsHard Smack - Hold your finger on the screen a little longer and release it on the thief when the bar turns red and the crosshair appears
Take a look at the game on the Apple App Store, or the Google Play Store!
Where will the money go?
The money will count as capital, and will go towards:
- Building a team. I currently do everything myself (you name it, I do it) and that's too much for one man. So I need skilled individuals that can help me with game design, art, programming, audio (sound effects and music), animation etc.
- Adding more features (levels, powerups etc) and improving gameplay
- User Acquisition. This is when a video game is promoted and advertised to gain more users, which in turn will generate more revenue.
- The money will also lay a strong foundation for sequels and future games
Having studied accounting, business studies, and economics in high school and university (at Wits University, which is the top business university in Africa) for 4 years prior to getting into game development, I am well-equipped even on the financial side.
How much of an impact will your money have?
A lot. It will improve the game itself ie. the art, gameplay, audio (music and sound effects), physics, graphics, graphics, the list goes on. This is a game that could potentially be the next Crossy Road, Flappy Bird or dare I say, Minecraft success story. And if you're looking at the bigger picture, your contribution will mean even more than that. There are not a lot of African game developers out there, and I am hoping that the success of this game will inspire young people to get involved in the video game industry, and overall, the tech industry.
 
What is the ultimate goal?
And even if the target goal is not reached, the money will still be spent on improving the game. I will still continue to pour my heart and soul into this project and improve the game in whatever way I can with the resources I have. Hopefully, I can one day scrape together some money to move to Silicon Valley in California (where there are more opportunities for tech companies).
At the end of the day, I want to make a high-quality game for everyone to enjoy and it would be my greatest ever achievement to fulfil this.
 
Don't have any money? You can still helpIf you can't contribute, that's okay, you can help by downloading the game on the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store and spreading the word by sharing the game's link with your friends and family and following Smack A Thief on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Oh and please remember to use Indiegogo's share tools!I am also looking for a game publisher or investor, so if you work in the video game industry or know anybody who does and has an interest in working with me please let me know.

story:
My name's Tuomo Laine, who's currently studying at Vocational Institute. I've been making video games for nearly 20 years. Bride for the Princess is my second Visual Novel.

I want to create a story based game, which will focus on a Princess who has been known for her preference of female companions and how this will affect her in a world where it is considered a taboo: from people plotting against to take her position to outright murder.

Bride for the Princess tells a game about a Princess who must find someone to marry before her upcoming coronation due to a conspiracy; a legislation that was passed behind her back in attempt to ruin her. There's multiple partners to choose from and multiple endings.

With the help contributors, I will be able to fully realize my vision and bring this story forward in ways that I couldn't hope to achieve on my own.
 

Some of the characters can be seen bellow

We are looking to use the money to pay for several of the graphical scenes, as well as to provide localizations on multiple languages as well as to bring professional quality voice acting.

If we fail to meet the goal, any of the gathered funds will help to pay for localizations.

Bride for the Princess will use the medium of visual novel to tell a story about love, hate and lust.

I am happy to report that I have a good track record when it comes to getting the job done; I have previously released six commercial games and two free games. One of my previously finished commercial games was a visual novel, much like Bride for the Princess will be.

As previously mentioned, I'm still studying until 2020 so I may have delays due to the school taking my time. I'll try to find the time when I can to work on the project, even if it'll be just little bit per day.

Another challenge is that my computer is quite old and one of my hard drive has been acting up. I'm keeping back ups and try my best to ensure no data will be lost, but I may have to replace some hardware at one point.

If you can't contribute monetarily, there are still ways that you can help!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your interest to my project.

story:
Bluetooth Speaker for Nintendo Switch——（New Member of YesOJO family）

As Nintendo Switch’s exclusive Speaker，compared with other kind of speaker, YesOJO bluetooth Speaker is lighter, more powerful and more colorful. It is also a substitute dock for playing on other screens, a safe stand to play on the table.    

OJO Speaker as a portable Speaker for Nintendo Switch, contains high quality dual speakers with strong surrounding sound. With built-in15000mAh battery, it supports up to 6 hours playing at maximum. Besides, part of its components can be detached and replaced.

How will you use it? 

Exclusive designed for the Nintendo Switch 

Simply plug your Nintendo Switch into YesOJO Bluetooth Speaker and enjoy the total immersive gaming experience, no cable required.

Dual stereo 10W speakers for perfect audio quality and volume, providing rich audio quality and a deep resounding bass that evidently improves the gaming experience to a higher lever. 

Perfect Substitute for the Original Nintendo Dock.

Connect the OJO speaker to your Nintendo Switch, and enjoy all the original dock functions.

The structure is elaborately designed and it matches well with the Nintendo Switch seamlessly. The designer also adds more fun into the design by making the speaker panels replaceable. There is also an extra strap button for connecting the speaker with different strips for easy on-the-go.​

2 turbofan cool down your nintendo switch

As a new member of YesOJO family, YesOJO Bluetooth Speaker inherits the genes of versatility on the base of high quality sound effect. It is of a more approachable price with more personal choice available. All prototypes in these hardware iterations are carefully calibrated, tested, validated to ensure our design can meet all necessary performance specifications for this new product.

As we confirmed the prototype, we estimated how long it takes and how much it costs for taking YesOJO bluetooth speaker to mass production. Now we launched our crowdfunding campaign again and can’t wait to bring YesOJO bluetooth speaker to this world. We’d like to get your suggestions and support to further improve this exciting product.
 

The birth of YesOJO bluetooth speaker couldn’t have been possible without all the help from our industrial designer, mechanical engineer, electrical engineer, production manager, visual designer, marketing manager and many other people. We deeply treasure the opportunity to work together and bring this product to life, and we want to get your help to make a big move in creating better gaming experiences.

Risks and challenges

When you back OJO speaker on indiegogo, you have a delivery guarantee. You will get your guaranteed. 
This is our second project, because we have the experience, we have ironed out ALL the kinks to perfect shipping, mass production, communication and customer care. With that said there are always unforeseen events along the way, in order to deal with these we have in place several plans for production and delivery for any unforeseen happenings. We also communicate like mad to make sure you know whats happening throughout the project.

story:
Robot 4Z is a Cooperative, 2D Action game for up to 4 players.

Our plot takes place in the Mothership, a ship built to autonomously create it's own robots. The only problem is, someone hacked into the system and a few bots are disobeying orders and running rampant in the ship. You play the part of these rebels, fighting your way through the ship, tearing down any who oppose you.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Currently Robot 4Z only allows play through use of a gamepad, so make sure your friends bring one along to join in on the fun!

 

 

 

 

 

All collected pledges will be utilized in the following manner:

All money that comes in goes towards our team making more games! We love what we do and need the extra support from our fans to keep our dreams a reality.

 

 

 

                   Want to know more about us?

Check out these links to see more information:

  

Contact: vcortez@threeartmedia.com / marketing@threeartmedia.com
