story:
สำหรับภาษาไทย ขอเชิญทุกท่านที่ลิงค์นี้ : http://aeternoblade.com/iggth/

Message from Creator 

 Hi, It's me "Toptanian" again. After the success of AeternoBlade . Which we are very thankful to our fans. More than 50,000 copies worldwide have been sold via major Console Platforms including 3DS, PS4, PSVita.

[Pictuce of AeternoBlade I]

 We are ambitious to make AeternoBlade reveal more story of our main characters. Many fans ask us about Bernard. How can he be imprisoned in the Everlasting void?

[Pictuce of AeternoBlade I]

Want to know that? AeternoBlade II will reveal all the story about him.

[Pictuce of AeternoBlade I]

In AeternoBlade,  because the limitation of the budget made us a lot of constraining to finish the game. But AeternoBlade II, we are now can aim to the better quality of gameplay and graphic.

We read every comment, listened to every YouTuber reviews our game. All the problems, we've learned and will be correct in AeternoBlade II.

By practicing the team for Unreal Engine 4 for 2 years.Now, we are sure that AeternoBladeII could be the great game for our fans.

However, we still want to make the higher quality of cinematic action, gameplay, sound and story-telling. So, Indiegogo campaign would be a great chance for us to help us reach that point.

Well, it is the great time for our fans to contribute to YOUR GAME. Support us making the great sequel of the time manipulation action&puzzle genre. This help would not only making AeternoBlade II success, It will show us that we have many gamers love our game. Then we will plan more spin-off and side-story of AeternoBlade.

Don't leave us walking alone. Please show up and support us.

Make Sequel to this AeternoBlade Series with us!

What is AeternoBlade II

  •   AeternoBlade II is the sequel of AeternoBlade, a time-manipulation action & puzzle side-scrolling platformer featuring with world exploration and RPG elements. We enhance more features in AeternoBlade II including Time-stop, Time-forwarding plus more action features that will make gameplay more intense and interesting.
  •  The game will be on PS4, XBOX ONE, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. 

After the event of AeternoBlade. Freyja has been living a peaceful life with her friends at the Ridgerode village. One day, The dimension begins to unstable and the existence of this reality seems to be disappeared. It is the cause of her actions to changed the world lines. To fix this, her journey begins once again.

On the other side of the world, two warriors, Bernard and Felix. Head to Eternity Fortress according to the Chronos Kingdom's 'Oracle' to stop the disaster that foretold to have occurred from a strange dark hole appeared in the sky, their fate exists will be revealed in AeternoBlade II.

 

Freyja is the protagonist of the previous AeternoBlade. After succeed in defeating the demon lord of darkness, Beladim,  and helped her village, saved Zevil and Carol become alive again in the new world line. She now back to the peaceful life as a guard of the village. However, her story is just beginning.

 

Bernard is a high-rank warrior of Chronos kingdom. Strong sense of duty.
According to the prophecy of the 'Oracle' of the kingdom, with his comrade Felix, he travels to Eternity Fortress to stop the cause that will lead the kingdom to disaster.  He is childhood friend with Felix and Rosaline. He is one of our playable characters.

 

Felix is also a high-rank warrior of Chronos kingdom and childhood friend with Bernard and Rosaline. He goes to the Eternity Fortress with Bernard to stop the cause that will lead the kingdom to disaster. His personality is quite opposite of Bernard. According to some tragic in the past made him a disbeliever of the Chronos God religion that spread widely in the Chronos kingdom. He is one of our playable characters.

 

 

Rosaline is the princess of Chronos Kingdom. She has the mysterious power that inherits from her bloodline of the royal family. She is also the childhood friend of Bernard and Felix. 

 

 

Zevil is a character from the previous AeternoBlade who help Freyja on her journey.
After the incident of AeternoBlade, he quit the job as the Adventurer and started the shop with his sister Carol. He again, assist Freyja on the journey this time.

 

Carol is Zevil's little sister. She helps him run the shop that newly opened. 
She had been friend with Freyja in a long time when her brother went on as the adventurer.
She comes with Freyja to help her on the journey along with her brother Zevil. 

 

As the same as previous AeternoBlade. AeternoBlade II is an action platform game. Use time-manipulation ability to solve puzzles and to survive in battle. Featuring with world exploration and RPG elements. We enhance more features in AeternoBlade II including Time-stop, Time-forwarding and more action features that will make gameplay more intense and interesting.


3 Playable Characters 

  AeternoBlade II has 3 playable characters with difference abilities and storyline. You can play as Freya, Bernard and Felix.

 

 

More type of AeternoBlade!

We now have 3 characters with 3 weapons that Aeternoblade can be changed into.
Each one has a unique ability that will have you with new experience!!

AeternoBlade of Past
Freyja's AeternoBlade is in the form of sword like before. It has decent power, range, speed and comes with the ability to reverse time.

AeternoBlade of Past's ability

  • Time Reverse: Everything except Freyja will be played back. Some green flashing objects called timeless object, however, cannot be played back by this ability.

  • Time Wap: Place the marker at Freyja's current position, After that, when pressing the button again Freya will be warped back to the marker to solve the puzzles and avoid the attack in battle.

 

AeternoBlade of Present
AeternoBlade of Present is in the form of Halberd. It has more powerful power than the sword but less speed.

AeternoBlade of Present's ability

  • Time Stop: All objects will stop moving. Bernard can make stacking attack to the stopped enemy, make them to standing ground and can change the direction of the moving projectile.

  • Stone Breaker: The Halberd can be used to destroy the obstacles that normally can not do. Make the way to the new path.

 

AeternoBlade of Future
AeternoBlade of future is in the form of whip blade. It has less power than the others but has the benefit of high speed.

AeternoBlade of Future's ability

  • Parallel Self: Felix can use his AeternoBlade to record his action, then come back to present and make to the parallel of him to help attack enemies or solve the puzzles. 

 

  • Hook chain: The whip blade can be used to hook on the far above objects to help him move up to far more of the platform.

 

New Actions

  • 3 Weapons: 3 characters have different battle styles depend on their weapon. 

Freyja Action ( Sword )

Bernard Action ( Halberd )

Felix Action ( Whip Blade )

 

  • Parry System: You can parry to the enemy with a weapon. It will give you chance to break their weapon.

 

  • Perfect Dodge: With perfect dodge, it will give you bullet time to storm monster. 

 

More action you can do on AeternoBlade II.

More puzzle and world depth

With more abilities to use, we also have more type of puzzles to be solved. The map has more of the depth that you can travel to. This time the map can be more complicated than before.

 

Quest System, Shop and Upgradable relics

Zevil and Carol now will assist you on the journey with his newly opened shop.
They also provide quests and upgradable relics that will let you have more powerful relics than the previous AeternoBlade. Occasionally, Carol may ask your help to do some quest for her.

 

* Aeternoblade 2  Steam version MAY come out the last.

*** If Stretch Goal unlock otherwise you will get a Pc Box version.

Help make our campaign spread to our fans. Let's complete the quest together!

Links  :   Aeternoblade II Facebook Page | Twitter Account | Youtube Channel | www.Aeternoblade.com | Indiegogo post | Indiegogo Video

Here are what we will give back to our fans when our quest done. Let's found out what next!

 

Corecell Technology Co.,Ltd. We are a small team based in Bangkok, Thailand. You might not know that we have been in the gaming industry for more than 15 years. We started with the ambition to make high-quality games, but our dream has been delayed by the business condition. Corecell has to work as contractor for many publishers around the world. Until, AeternoBlade released with blood and wound of our company that make Corecell has back on track and keep producing our own title.

 

 

TEAM 

 Executive Producer of AeternoBlade Series who has worked 15 years in the game industry since J2ME, GBA, NintendoDS ,Nintendo3DS,PS3,PSP,PSVita,PS4. His ultimate goal is bringing Thai game industry to be accepted by world-wide gamer. 

Long time programmer at Corecell. Joined the AeternoBlade team with PSvita version in 2014.
Developed framework for CoReUs Engine with Unreal Engine 4, Story planning and help with action design.

Designer who has many talents. Big fan of AeternoBlade. Has enthusiasm  to make the AeternoBlade II to be far more greater from the previous one. Works for Level design, Action design, Puzzle design and Visual design for the game.

AeternoBlade of PresentAeternoBlade of Present is in the form of Halberd. It has more powerful power than the sword but less speed.AeternoBlade of Present's ability
Time Stop: All objects will stop moving. Bernard can make stacking attack to the stopped enemy, make them to standing ground and can change the direction of the moving projectile.

Stone Breaker: The Halberd can be used to destroy the obstacles that normally can not do. Make the way to the new path.
 
AeternoBlade of FutureAeternoBlade of future is in the form of whip blade. It has less power than the others but has the benefit of high speed.AeternoBlade of Future's ability
Parallel Self: Felix can use his AeternoBlade to record his action, then come back to present and make to the parallel of him to help attack enemies or solve the puzzles. 
 
Hook chain: The whip blade can be used to hook on the far above objects to help him move up to far more of the platform.
 
New Actions
3 Weapons: 3 characters have different battle styles depend on their weapon. 

Freyja Action ( Sword )

Bernard Action ( Halberd )

Felix Action ( Whip Blade )
 
Parry System: You can parry to the enemy with a weapon. It will give you chance to break their weapon.
  
Perfect Dodge: With perfect dodge, it will give you bullet time to storm monster. 
  
More action you can do on AeternoBlade II.
More puzzle and world depth
With more abilities to use, we also have more type of puzzles to be solved. The map has more of the depth that you can travel to. This time the map can be more complicated than before.


 
Quest System, Shop and Upgradable relics
Zevil and Carol now will assist you on the journey with his newly opened shop.They also provide quests and upgradable relics that will let you have more powerful relics than the previous AeternoBlade. Occasionally, Carol may ask your help to do some quest for her.



 




* Aeternoblade 2  Steam version MAY come out the last.

*** If Stretch Goal unlock otherwise you will get a Pc Box version.





Help make our campaign spread to our fans. Let's complete the quest together!

Links  :   Aeternoblade II Facebook Page | Twitter Account | Youtube Channel | www.Aeternoblade.com | Indiegogo post | Indiegogo Video

Here are what we will give back to our fans when our quest done. Let's found out what next!

 Corecell Technology Co.,Ltd. We are a small team based in Bangkok, Thailand. You might not know that we have been in the gaming industry for more than 15 years. We started with the ambition to make high-quality games, but our dream has been delayed by the business condition. Corecell has to work as contractor for many publishers around the world. Until, AeternoBlade released with blood and wound of our company that make Corecell has back on track and keep producing our own title.  TEAM 
 Executive Producer of AeternoBlade Series who has worked 15 years in the game industry since J2ME, GBA, NintendoDS ,Nintendo3DS,PS3,PSP,PSVita,PS4. His ultimate goal is bringing Thai game industry to be accepted by world-wide gamer. Long time programmer at Corecell. Joined the AeternoBlade team with PSvita version in 2014.Developed framework for CoReUs Engine with Unreal Engine 4, Story planning and help with action design.Designer who has many talents. Big fan of AeternoBlade. Has enthusiasm  to make the AeternoBlade II to be far more greater from the previous one. Works for Level design, Action design, Puzzle design and Visual design for the game.

story:
Have a look at our website for more information. Link below. Keep in mind we are a new company with a unique look in the gaming industry and with your help in contributions we can spearhead our game to heights only dreamt of. 

Website: https://endlessrunninggames.com/

We at Endlessrunninggames take our work very passionately. We aim to deliver the best games possible for people to enjoy and we also aim to be one of the best companies in mobile games. We are a young company but are driven to create the best possible projects. We are a team of six people which include:

  • 1 Owner & CEO
  • 3 Developers
  • 1 graphic designer
  • 1 Marketing Specialist

 Our campaign is to basically raise funds to better our game in every possible aspect. which are:

  • Increase the quality of graphics
  • Graphics will be optimized through characters, environments, starter packs and the whole look of the game in general.
  • Additional themes
  • Adding a angry ghost bull as a starter ( find out by downloading the game ;) . 
  • Additional character and starter packs
  • Multiplayer feature that will allow you to compete with other players and friends live to see who's the best bull catcher
  • Chat Features 
  • Have a better focus on bugs and try to maintain them throughout pre and post production to better the players experience.
  • Try to add more employees to the team to help increase experience in the staff and efficiency in the game.

* Your contributions will not only help us in producing catch the bull, it will be the foundation for our future in the gaming industry. Without you we would complete our project in a year or two but with your help we will complete our project in 2 to 3 months at most. As the only thing we lack is your support and hopefully we can get it. Please help to bringing this unique game to life.

- Our funding goal is 30,000 dollars. This money will be going to:

  • Better game engines to increase the quality in graphics all throughout the game
  • Add more staff to help with the production and bugs and graphic designing.
  • Marketing will be a major factor as we have to market for the world as we will be targeting country by country and our aim is to reach the top of the charts to gain more recognition. 

- We will be offering 5 perks:

  1. Bull Admirer: Thanks for your support! Every bit counts and you made us take a step closer to our goal. You will not be forgotten
  2. Bull Catcher: 100,000 in game coins
  3. Bull Master: 250,000 in game coins and 1 merchandise item. 
  4. Bull Legend: 500,000 in game coins and 2 merchandise items plus 1 surprise merchandise package.
  5. Bull Tamer: 1,000,000 in game coins and 3 merchandise items, 2 surprise packages with new free updated characters and starter packs.

* If we don't reach our goal the funds will still be put to good use. We have ranked our objectives from most to least important. If we don't get our complete funding we will get the most important objectives done first and then worry about the others.

* Your kind hearted contributions will make a huge difference like you cant believe, You'll make a great game come to reality and putting smiles and enjoyment on peoples faces.

- We believe at Endlessrunninggames that our debut game Catch The Bull will be a huge hit. I don't just say this because I'm biased, no we have stats to back up our claims. We started a promotional campaign on Facebook to get the feel of peoples reaction to our game. So we set a one month campaign and we got almost 55,000 followers for our page and about one thousand emails about the release of the game.

* Check out our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Endless-Running-Games-...

- Some risks and challenges are that we have to compete with other runner games like subway surfer and bus rush. I believe we have the upper hand because we've implemented a unique style of game-play that other runner games don't have which is catching and balancing bulls while running and chasing bulls with our amazing car power-up.

* We have also started to integrate multiple new environments other from the ones you've seen in our video at the top of our page. We've added a beach environment that looks stunning and can also be improved by your dear contributions. We've also added a night cycle along with the day and it will also be improved. The paths will also be widened as there were some complaints on the width of the paths. We take all your criticisms and try to better ourselves. Look at the picture below:

- If your unable to contribute we understand and we would kindly like to ask you if you wouldn't mind to make some noise about our game with your friends and family. 

- Also don't forget to use the indiegogo share tools to raise awarness about the next best runner game to hit the market: Catch The Bull.

- Thank you for your support and don't forget to check our website that's being updated regularly: link is above. Also have a look at our facebook page and support us.

We take all your criticisms and try to better ourselves. Look at the picture below:

- If your unable to contribute we understand and we would kindly like to ask you if you wouldn't mind to make some noise about our game with your friends and family. 
- Also don't forget to use the indiegogo share tools to raise awarness about the next best runner game to hit the market: Catch The Bull.
- Thank you for your support and don't forget to check our website that's being updated regularly: link is above. Also have a look at our facebook page and support us.

story:
Animal Fury History

 

A comunnity of animals protect the source the magical water that sprouts from the sacred highlands. They constantly fight against the sorcerer who represents the forest´s evil spirit. Who´s capable of unspeakable things to take possesion of the sacred highlands. and thus. open the bidimensional portal that will allow him to take control of the whole forest.

Animal Fury Characters

 

 

THE GAMEPLAY MODE

The most awesome fight to protect the holy water is about to start!

 

What we need?
With your help, we want you make part of this amazing project by your donations. We need to raise $6000 to complete the video game with all characters and missions from Animal Fury. The total amount will be invested in publish it, and promote it. If we can't to get that accomplishment, our team will make a totally and functional demo of our amazing video game.

REWARDS

As a thanks for backing us, we have created some really cool rewards!

From the second one, all rewards include all awards before it.!

1. Mention in acknowledgment video.

 

2. Mention on the video game credits.

 

3. Facebook frame

4. Kato animation with an special greeting.

 

5. Special Kato images dressed like an Scorpion, Ryu and Haohmaru.

 

6. Early access to beta version.

7. Personal sketch with Animal Fury style.

8. Animated postal with personal sketch made with Animal Fury style.

 9. Autographed Pitch Bible

  

Our challenges.

Besides to get the good energy from the Magic Forest, in the headquarter of Ignicion Games we are a professional team that include  3D modellers, animators and texturizers. All of us are very commited and we are very passionated people with this video game, and thats why we want to make a great experience for you!. We love mobile games, but we want Animal Fury to be on PC, Xbox and Play Station too. We know that it is not an easy way to make it possible, but with your help, and our very hard work, we can do an amazing job!


Our team count with qualified personal planning and executing projects, also has solid fundamentals using the best frameworks and tools from video games industry..

 

 You don´t have money, but still want to help? No problem, there are other ways to make it!

 

You can help us to spread around the world this magica story. You can share this campaign with your friends to let them know that something really special is happening here!. Indigogo help us a lot, so use that share options!

story:
繁體中文版／简体中文版


The game has become Steam Greenlit thanks to our community's help!


TAIKER is a Metroidvania game with combo-focused combat system, aspiring to become the continuation of classic 2D platformer like Castlevania and Metroid.

>> Demo (PC Windows) <<

You can now download our demo and play the first stage of TAIKER!
Be sure to read the Demo Instruction Manual or the control could be confusing!

Features

  • Classic experience of side-scrolling platformers
  • Exploration of a lost technological world
  • Story with Multiple Endings
  • Intense combat with dynamic, astonishing Combo Attacks
  • Trait System to develop various skills to create your own fighting style
  • Amusing, deliberately designed Puzzles and Mazes
  • Playable Boss Characters to unlock by defeating them
  • Character-switching for combat and puzzle-solving

Story

Landscapes/Characters

A drowned city left over from the old world. It was abandoned after the cataclysm.

Underground world. Could there be any buried secret?


Aircraft from the old world.

 Female and male protectors. Only the very few talented people can be trained to become a protector. They help maintain civilization and keep order among society.

Gameplay

One of the key features of TAIKER's gameplay is the Combo Attack system. Different characters may have different movesets, so let's take your initial character Peggy for example. 

The basic combo is quadruple slash attacks by pressing "attack" four times. The last one knocks the enemy back. And on the third hit, if you press "skill" instead, she will release a crescent-shaped shockwave to end the combo. 

You can do different combos depending on what skills you've learned and chosen. When your character is in air, there's also a variant combo with different ending skills. So there's a lot of options in battle!

Along with combo attacks, two other key systems for combat are the Enemy Marking and Trait System.

Enemy marking allows you to lock on enemies and activate special moves, such as sliding toward the target, while trait system provides a learning tree to unlock different skills and abilities to choose from for combo attacks!

The game is currently under development by a two-man team, Gary Lin and Yu Chia Ming, in Taiwan. We really loved platformer games like Castlevania, Mega Man, and Metroid. We've been always hoping to merge a gorgeous combat system into this genre, and TAIKER is the result!

TAIKER is our first game, but we have been working in the video game industry as programmer and artist for over a decade. We made up our mind to build our own games as an indie game studio because we want to create a game that we will really love and be proud of, a game in honor of the old-school gaming experience we all had during our young age.

If you haven't played our demo yet, I recommend you pause reading and give it a try! The game is still away from perfection, and we need financial support to achieve that. We don't want to rely on publishers, so we take this crowdfunding campaign as a great opportunity.


Our plan

One crucial part missing in the game now is the music. If we meet our goal successfully, we will be able to collaborate with the best composers to create great audio works for the game. We place a high value on music because it would be the key to enhance the depth of atmosphere in the world of TAIKER.

And to bring the game to our players as soon as possible, we do want to expand the team by recruiting 2-3 staff members. We have had a few candidates, they are all talented artists and designers and will be a great help to us.

The game is only in English and Chinese for now, yet we've planned to release the game in more languages, for instance French, Spanish, and Russian. But please understand that it would have to depend on how well the campaign goes, so it's not promised.

Last but not the least, if we're able to reach the stretch goals, there will be more playable characters in the game! The proposal of stretch goals would come after we met the standard 45,000 goal. Help us get through it!

The game is scheduled to be finished in 6-8 months and be released on Steam in late 2016. Though the road ahead is so long that we can only estimate it.

Here are all kinds of rewards you can get in different tier perks!

Rewards

Special Thanks 

Any support is gratefully appreciated! All backers' name will be shown in credits!

Digital Game 

A digital copy of TAIKER for you when the game is released! Choose from one of the following platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux.

Instruction Booklet 

A booklet with colorful graphics in PDF format that introduces controls, combat systems, character movesets, combo inputs, etc.

Secret Perk Access 

We will send you a secret link after your contribution. This link allows you and your friends to see our secret perk (see below in Perk Tiers) that has a limited claim number!

Early Beta Access 

We will invite you to play our latest beta version every once in a while! You can be the first one to know what's new and how the development is going! And we will take your thoughts and feedback as important reference to improve the game!

Original Soundtrack  

The digital full collection of music tracks from TAIKER!

Digital Art Pack 

Exclusive collection of high-definition artworks including concept arts, sketches, character sheets and others.

Contribute Your Idea To An Enemy Minion! 

Limited to five backers. Help us design one of the enemy minions in game! We will contact you to discuss your ideas for the enemy design and do our best to realize it! Your name will be shown in the credits as Enemy Designer!

Contribute Your Idea To A Playable Character! 

Limited to ONE backer only! Help us design a playable character in the game! We will contact you to discuss your ideas for the character and do our best to realize it! Your name will be shown in the credits as Character Designer!

Perk Tiers

$1: Backer

Thank you so much! All backers are irreplaceable to our project!
Reward:

$12: Treasure Hunter

Secret Perk!  Limited to 800 backers and requires secret link to see it.
Take away the treasures and give thanks to the friend invited you!
Rewards:+

$15: Taiker Citizen

Welcome to the world of Taiker! You have become a citizen now. Enjoy the game!
Rewards:+

$18: Taiker Supporter

Your contribution to Taiker civilization is conducive! You've been granted the title of Supporter! Have this beautifully illustrated instruction and show the secret link to your friends!
Rewards:+++

$22: Taiker Warrior

Your contribution to Taiker civilization is memorable! You've acquired the right to become a Warrior! Get a step ahead others through early beta access!
Rewards:++++

$30: Taiker Knight

Your contribution to Taiker civilization is eventful! You've been granted the title of Knight! Enjoy the fantastic music!
Rewards:+++++

$30: Taiker Paladin

Your contribution to Taiker civilization is momentous! You've been granted the title of Paladin! Enjoy the exclusive and fabulous artwork!
Rewards:+++++

$35: Taiker Protector

Your hidden talent in mental power have awakened. You've been chosen to become one of the mighty and honorable Protector!
Rewards:++++++

$500: Taiker Arc Engineer

Only the chosen ones are able to become an Arc Engineer! You have the ability to design and create your own minions!
Rewards:+++++++

$1500: Taiker Grand Protector

You're the legendary founder of Protectors. You will train your apprentice to learn unique and powerful skills and bring dramatic influence to the world!
Rewards:+++++++

Stretch Goals

It remains a mystery until the standard goal is reached. Get the link and invite your friends to help reveal the big secret!

Your contribution to Taiker civilization is memorable! You've acquired the right to become a Warrior! Get a step ahead others through early beta access!Rewards:++++


$30: Taiker Knight
Your contribution to Taiker civilization is eventful! You've been granted the title of Knight! Enjoy the fantastic music!Rewards:+++++



$30: Taiker Paladin
Your contribution to Taiker civilization is momentous! You've been granted the title of Paladin! Enjoy the exclusive and fabulous artwork!Rewards:+++++

$35: Taiker ProtectorYour hidden talent in mental power have awakened. You've been chosen to become one of the mighty and honorable Protector!Rewards:++++++

$500: Taiker Arc EngineerOnly the chosen ones are able to become an Arc Engineer! You have the ability to design and create your own minions!Rewards:+++++++

$1500: Taiker Grand ProtectorYou're the legendary founder of Protectors. You will train your apprentice to learn unique and powerful skills and bring dramatic influence to the world!Rewards:+++++++

Stretch Goals
It remains a mystery until the standard goal is reached. Get the link and invite your friends to help reveal the big secret!

story:
Welcome to Endohumans!

Here you will get some inside information on our upcoming fitness gaming app that will change the world! You can also sign-up as a member of our team by contributing to the campaign in order to

be one of the first players to test Endohumans prior to release!

Also invest to enjoy many perks like a share in revenues, t-shirts, wristbands etc... 


The IDEA

Smartphones, fitness bands and fitness trackers are all over the place as technology companies have quickly realized that there is a large interest and appetite for such products.

BUT...

Almost all existing fitness applications are plain boring giving you only standardised tables and statistics as output.

There is no motivation to work-out and have fun.

We want action!

ON THE OTHER HAND...

There are great games out there which just have us literally sitting in front of a computer all day and never exercising or taking care of our body!

MEET...

         

Endohumans will be an original revolutionary App that will marry these two concepts so we get a captivating adventurous storyline which, in order to proceed in, the user will need to get his feet on the ground and start working out!

THE STORY

So imagine you've just downloaded a new seemingly common smartphone fitness application  which like many others tracks your steps/runs/cycle rides and other workout info with the normal maps and musical playback... however this time something extraordinary happens!

This is not like any normal application! Soon you discover that your application has been "intercepted" and you are being communicated by the "Endohuman Defense Network" (EDN), a "supposedly" top secret global agency which is responsible for defending mankind against an unknown enemy.

Do you have what it takes to join the Network?

The only way to find out is to carry out the training and missions assigned to you by the EDN as they "intercept" your fitness app while you are ACTUALLY and PHYSICALLY working out and give you instructions on how to complete the mission!

While you become a secret member of the EDN, you will need to earn Enduras. Enduras are the Network's  recognition and power points.

You will also access via a "top-secret" uplink a mysterious computer which will guide you  on online quests to solve puzzles through the use of the internet and your wits in order to uncover the greatest conspiracy mankind has ever known and saving the world!

Teaser trailer


GAMEPLAY

In order to progress in the game and unfold the exciting and mysterious storyline you will need to earn promotion through the Endohuman Network by generating Enduras.

Enduras are needed to unlock newer missions, newer quests and progress the storyline.

They can be generated by:

a)  Physically completing Training Missions in the App

When you start playing you will be asked to perform training missions in order to graduate the Endohuman Academy and acquire the necessary skills to join the Network and help save mankind! Enduras are granted while you are working out (with your smartphone) based on distance, time, pace, breaking personal records, number of workouts per week etc. Even after you graduate you will be able to perform training missions to earn more Enduras and achieve further promotion.

b)  Physically completing EDN Missions in the App

After you graduate, depending on your level and Enduras, you will be called upon to  carry certain EDN Missions where "The Carpenter" and other in-game characters will "communicate" with you in the app and give you your missions which will include walking/running, beating a certain time, delivering an encrypted message, solving a quest, escaping pursuit etc).

c)  Importing workout  data from outside the App

You also generate enduras by importing workout and other data from other Fitness Apps and hardware (e.g. importing from Apple Watch, Apple Health, Google Fit) . These will then be translated to Enduras based on the Endohuman "ancient secret" algorithm,  therefore you can continue to use other apps to train which will be consolidated into the game through this function. Endohumans will also export workout data performed in our app to selected third party applications (e.g. Apple Health)

d)  Solving quests 

It's not just about working out! You will also need to train your mind and soul as you are communicated by a mysterious computer (depending on your level and enduras) which guides you as you carry out very interesting internet scavenger hunts and provide the correct answer in order to earn more Enduras and progress the storyline!

e)  Other methods

You can also earn Enduras through other methods like interacting in the Endohuman Network (website forum), referring friends etc

Phew!

That was a lot of talking so here is a graphical representation of how Enduras are generated in the game!


Exciting right? You betcha!!!

HOW WE WILL USE THE RAISED FUNDS

Despite some thoughts and offers to sell our idea and work-in-progress, we have decided to stay loyal to our vision.

We therefore plan to personally oversee the delivery of the Endohuman project, in collaboration with our app development partners as well as with your help (as funders), so as to not compromise the game and storyline development in any way.

The idea and storyline is all set out, and we have already started developing the first version of the app (Chapter I - Earth). We will also use the funding to upgrade the necessary IT infrastructure (website, servers etc) and set up a marketing campaign while if we exceed our target we will invest in enhancing the existing features and including professional video interludes/animation and hiring professional voice actors!

This is an "all-or-nothing" funding campaign so if the amount raised is not at least €25.000 all the campaign funding will be returned to the funders by Indiegogo at the end of the campaign. So there is no risk in investing and the project not going ahead due to lack of funding!

We are a hybrid team comprising of Accounting, Marketing and IT Security experts and require an initial capital inflow to obtain offers from professional smartphone app game developers.

The current team is fully committed to the project and will find an excellent professional app development team to cooperate with and bring this to realisation.

INITIAL FEEDBACK

We've already received some great feedback from gamers, runners, techies, local media and Fitness &Technology Companies. We are really flattered and encouraged to continue. Some of many examples of relevant tweets and influential twitter followers:

  


WHY IS FUNDING SO IMPORTANT TO US

Endohumans will not be just any game...

Its development will be a small spark that will ignite an extraordinary concept that  will just take a life of its own and grow to unimaginable size and potential. Our passion and purpose is very strong and we are focused and eager to get straight to work.

We have an amazing plot and mock-up of the entire project in our minds  which just needs to come alive (kind of like Gepetto's Pinocchio)! When Endohumans comes to life, it will not only satisfy our business goals and aspirations but also the kid in every one of us that finds out that magic really does exist and dreams can come true!

Thanks for reading and hopefully sharing our dream by investing.

Even a €1 investment is valuable and appreciated by the development team.Just click contribute!

Your investment will count and will help shape and excite the fitness gaming world for sure!

The team will of course keep you briefed on the status of the project with regular updates every few days.

WHAT YOU'LL GET IF YOU INVEST IN ENDOHUMANS

Depending on the amount you invest and the success of the campaign you may receive:

A warm thank you

In return for any contribution and because we appreciate your faith in  our idea, we will include our thanks and your name in the "info" page within the app.

Free download of Endohuman and tester

By investing at least €3 you will earn a free download of the app (as early as its beta testing phase) and all subsequent releases/versions/chapters.

Endohuman wrist band

If you invest  €15 you will also receive a super cool ENDOHUMAN wrist band in addition to the free download.

Endohuman T-shirt
If you invest  €45 you can get a cool ENDOHUMAN T-shirt!

 

Share with other campaign funders 5% of first year net revenue!

Those that contribute at least €25 will be pooled together and share amongst them, 5% of the app's net revenues during its first 12 months in the app store!We are also running a Referral Scheme so if one of you wishes to promote the campaign with Indiegogo’s share tools (those nice icons on the left!) while logged into their Indiegogo account (to allow us to track referred funding) and brings in at least €1.000 of funding through directed traffic to our campaign, will also join the above  5% sharing net revenue pool for year 1 (as described in the "Perks Area" of the campaign.

HOW DO I INVEST?

You can easily invest in our App through your Paypal Account or with a credit/debit card using Paypal's guest checkout feature.


WHAT NOW?

While you are waiting for the best game in the world, you can:

a) Contribute
b) Share and spread the word and help build momentum!
c) Visit the Endohuman website
d) Like our facebook page
e) Follow us on twitter
f) Subscribe to Endohumans on youtube

It is the endohuman thing to do!

and a final word...

Look around the internet for information on the Endohuman Network.
It has started appearing in mysterious ways!!

A dark deep secret is surfacing in the horizon.
...and so we surface too...

story:
Meet the team!

We're an international team of 5 guys from different parts of the world, each bringing a specific set of skills to the table.

We share a common vision of making a truly unique immersive gaming experience!





                                      
               Facebook                                 Twitter                                  Youtube

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
"You'll be free or die!" 

- Harriet Tubman -

Secrets never remain in the shadows forever. Explore the dark depths of a hotel that was once home to a man who sold people like chattel. Take the role of Anastasia and guide her through a dark, haunted, dilapidated hotel on her quest to find out what happened to her mother, but also uncover the truth of the horrors people lived through while being part of the "Peculiar Institution." With a small arsenal of weapons, a journal and wits, fight vicious specters, unlock hidden treasures, solve complex puzzles and riddles discover the truth about what happened to Francine. 

Story

"A warm breeze sifts through the treetops, green branches casting shadows in the bright sunlight. Anastasia opens the door her Honda Civic and lets some of the warm air in. She looks around the area before getting up. She sees an old weathered sign, cracked and broken with pieces of wood scattered around. She opens her notebook and checks the photo section. It’s the sign for the forgotten building she is seeking, but now its completely ruined. Next to it, a picture of her mother, Lisa Francine.

She was told by all the locals that someone came here, looking for clues about a hidden slave trading office, dating back to the late 1700s. And those who seek out, never come back. The forest is haunted with spirits of a…”twisted” nature; a primal evil that has been allowed to fester. Anna steps out her car and crosses the street and walks toward to the sign.

Among the shrubs and overgrowth is a broken pillar. She steps beyond the stone and sees an old dirt road beneath the overhanging canopy of thick trees. Moving carefully, Anna pushes her way through the thicket, and emerges in an open clearing. Now, the sun is starting to set. Echoes and whispers begin sift through the wind. She hears a voice; it sounds like her mother. Despite her unease, she continues through the meadow and onto a darker path. And in the thickness of the forest, and as the sun sets, the path she walks on only gets darker."

Themes

This game is about what the United States truly is and how it came to be. It was not long ago that over four million people were held in bondage, sold, bred, and forced to labor for someone else. Francine is about the horrific reflection that United States history is showing. It’s about the mentality and the systems that were put in place in the name of business and profit. It’s about the lives of the people who were enslaved, what they had to suffer through, their trauma and how it echoes into today.

story:
Short Summary 

Wooley booger

Created by Trevor Scott/Sylvia Mendoza/Jeff Smith

Trevor R. Scott, and editor Carl F Johnson

Voices of Jeff smith and Trevor Scott 

Voices of Trevor Scott and team inkitcomics

Country of origin

United States

Language(s)

English

Production

Executive producer(s) inkitcomics studios 

Trevor Scott and team inkitcomics

Production company(s)

Trevor R Scott < Ink_it_comics_Studios

Distributor inkitcomics 

Broadcast in production

Original channel youtube

inkitcomics studos

External links

[http://inkitcomics.com

wooley booger American adult animated science fiction action comic book created by TREVOR R SCOTT and CFjThe series which is currently in production ...email scotttrevor2@gmail.com Website]

Trevor Scott is a Jackson Square Artist in New Orleans, LA. He started a company called Ink it comics also Ink_it_comics_Studios. Trevor Scott stared creating characters for a comic book series called Wooley Booger since the age of 8. Wooley Booger is about a rabbit named Reno that becomes a super hero. Reno's overall goal in the story is to find and save his girlfriend. He also must seek out revenge against whoever has kidnapped his girlfriend and is trying to kill him. Reno accomplishes something along the way. During the course of the adventure, he meets other characters that help him become a better version of himself while fighting the mob and freeing his girlfriend. The purpose of Wooley Booger is to show the different facts of human condition that causes people to not live up to their highest potential. Wooley Booger spotlights a deeper understanding of life itself. Reno forms a group of charters to help him along the adventure. Through their interaction with Reno, each character grows into a better version of themselves. The big picture in Wooley Booger is that as Reno's life develops certain characters, while their association with him might come to an end, he won't stop growing.  

    • It has always been my dream to give these characters a platform to be represented properly and order to fund money back into the company to help out people just like me with creative ideas.  

  • This is more than just a video game app, this app will build one of the many foundations that will support the company inkitcomics studios.  We are looking to build a company that will allow artists and creators alike to not have to  worry about distribution , or the headache of dealing with the modern industry cutthroat.  It is our goal to give artist creators etc the tools and space to create wildly innovative stories and designs.  We are looking to change the industry as a whole, dreams matter, in the near future we are looking to make dreams a reality.  Let's make the Wooley booger project happen together!!!

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • The company we are going through is Fiverr we deeply believe through our past experiences with dealing with  fiverr and it's employees this platform is best suited to produce this product in a timely fashion.  It is going to cost $5000 to the development pf the game app and production.  Another$2500 is going into artwork, level design, and back ground art.

  • $10 or more gets you a Thank you e-card!—wooley booger card

    $25 or more gets you a Thank you In the Credits!

    $50 or more  I will customize a character of your choice  animal or object.

  •  $300 or more Sponsor!—  

  • $500 or more Epic Sponsor!— 5 limited edition autographed posters, a free inkitcomics Tshirt and all the previous mentioned perks!

  • In the event that we can't come up with the funds anticipated, we'll have no choice but to cut down on the game app. This will no way result in voiding any rewards or change our overall outcome. One way or another, we will create the wooley booger game app to present to interested parties.

The Impact

the profits from the game app will allow me to expand my company 

  • It will allow us to create a platform for artists and other interested parties!
  • Believe you me! We are absolutely determined to get this project done!!!

Risks & Challenges

I just need the money to pay these bastards to get the game app done!!!!

  • I have made my entire living on artwork and my creativity I am a Jackson Square artist in New Orleans Louisiana.I am the best pony for this show and I have a dedicated group of awesome individuals that will help me along the way.
  • By delivering my artwork to the producers of Fiverr.com. 

Other Ways You Can Help

you can find Inkitcomics on Facebook Instagram Twitter Youtube make sure to follow us and we hope you have a fantastic day from all of us here at inkitcomics we thank you!

  • make sure to Make Some Noise about this awesome video game app and production use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Short Summary 
Wooley booger
Created by Trevor Scott/Sylvia Mendoza/Jeff Smith
Trevor R. Scott, and editor Carl F Johnson
Voices of Jeff smith and Trevor Scott 
Voices of Trevor Scott and team inkitcomics
Country of origin
United States
Language(s)
English
Production
Executive producer(s) inkitcomics studios 
Trevor Scott and team inkitcomics
Production company(s)
Trevor R Scott < Ink_it_comics_Studios
Distributor inkitcomics 
Broadcast in production
Original channel youtube
inkitcomics studos
External links
[http://inkitcomics.com
wooley booger American adult animated science fiction action comic book created by TREVOR R SCOTT and CFjThe series which is currently in production ...email scotttrevor2@gmail.com Website]
Trevor Scott is a Jackson Square Artist in New Orleans, LA. He started a company called Ink it comics also Ink_it_comics_Studios. Trevor Scott stared creating characters for a comic book series called Wooley Booger since the age of 8. Wooley Booger is about a rabbit named Reno that becomes a super hero. Reno's overall goal in the story is to find and save his girlfriend. He also must seek out revenge against whoever has kidnapped his girlfriend and is trying to kill him. Reno accomplishes something along the way. During the course of the adventure, he meets other characters that help him become a better version of himself while fighting the mob and freeing his girlfriend. The purpose of Wooley Booger is to show the different facts of human condition that causes people to not live up to their highest potential. Wooley Booger spotlights a deeper understanding of life itself. Reno forms a group of charters to help him along the adventure. Through their interaction with Reno, each character grows into a better version of themselves. The big picture in Wooley Booger is that as Reno's life develops certain characters, while their association with him might come to an end, he won't stop growing.  
    • It has always been my dream to give these characters a platform to be represented properly and order to fund money back into the company to help out people just like me with creative ideas.  
This is more than just a video game app, this app will build one of the many foundations that will support the company inkitcomics studios.  We are looking to build a company that will allow artists and creators alike to not have to  worry about distribution , or the headache of dealing with the modern industry cutthroat.  It is our goal to give artist creators etc the tools and space to create wildly innovative stories and designs.  We are looking to change the industry as a whole, dreams matter, in the near future we are looking to make dreams a reality.  Let's make the Wooley booger project happen together!!!

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

The company we are going through is Fiverr we deeply believe through our past experiences with dealing with  fiverr and it's employees this platform is best suited to produce this product in a timely fashion.  It is going to cost $5000 to the development pf the game app and production.  Another$2500 is going into artwork, level design, and back ground art.

$10 or more gets you a Thank you e-card!—wooley booger card
$25 or more gets you a Thank you In the Credits!
$50 or more  I will customize a character of your choice  animal or object.

 $300 or more Sponsor!—  
$500 or more Epic Sponsor!— 5 limited edition autographed posters, a free inkitcomics Tshirt and all the previous mentioned perks!
In the event that we can't come up with the funds anticipated, we'll have no choice but to cut down on the game app. This will no way result in voiding any rewards or change our overall outcome. One way or another, we will create the wooley booger game app to present to interested parties.


The Impact
the profits from the game app will allow me to expand my company 

It will allow us to create a platform for artists and other interested parties!
Believe you me! We are absolutely determined to get this project done!!!


Risks & Challenges
I just need the money to pay these bastards to get the game app done!!!!

I have made my entire living on artwork and my creativity I am a Jackson Square artist in New Orleans Louisiana.I am the best pony for this show and I have a dedicated group of awesome individuals that will help me along the way.
By delivering my artwork to the producers of Fiverr.com. 


Other Ways You Can Help
you can find Inkitcomics on Facebook Instagram Twitter Youtube make sure to follow us and we hope you have a fantastic day from all of us here at inkitcomics we thank you!
make sure to Make Some Noise about this awesome video game app and production use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that's all there is to it.

story:
Introduction

Welcome to our Project - we are glad you finally landed here.

Did you ever try to shoot a bullet into the ground and see what happens?
Probably it will grow a big beautiful tree of pistols or bullets or probably it will just be a bunch of wheat plants… Who knows? 
We do. 

Welcome to Corn Wars! You need to plant seeds and sell the fruit to be able to buy better seeds, weapons and pay your taxes.
Oh! Wait! Weapons? YES! They are… like… Uncommon tools for farming...?

The idea came up during Ludum Dare 41 Game-Jam and we had much positive criticism and lots of support during our live-coding-streams.

Game-Description

CornWars is a mash-up of classical farming simulation and a shooter-game. We plan to release it on PC but console ports could come in future depending on the success of the game. Basically you will play as a farmer on your very own small world. You will start with a small barn and one field. Get a few seeds at the local farmer store and grow your first plants, harvest them and make some money with their fruit.

These are the plants from LD version (Tech Preview) - The corn (on the right side) is in dead state (originating from diseases)

You will soon notice that farming "by hand" is very slow, hard and non-efficient. So how could you upgrade your business? Get some tools! Usually this would be a hoe, shovel and so on but at CornWars things are different. You need a shotgun to make farmland. Afterwards you can grab a revolver or pistol to shoot seeds into the ground which will makte this action way more efficient. In further game progress you will get even better weapons. Next step would be grabbing a sniper or other more ranged gun. At this point the game will change. You do no longer walk on the field to shoot seeds into the ground but instead get targets at the farm-tiles which you will have to shoot at. They willl then plant seeds in a radius depending on the weapon and a few other factors.

To plant a seed after you prepared the ground you need to aim and shoot a moving target on the farmland tile

This is the farming-part. Further there will be a multi-functional tank used for e.g. preparing the farmland or shooting bigger ammunition. There will be crafting to put your seeds into bigger ammunition.

The tank (first sketched model - will of course be refined for the actual game)

We will include bombs and grenades for various tasks. You will be able to call a airplane to "waterbomb" your fields for better growth... This is just a small insight into the game - we do not want to spoiler too much now :)

Also our game will feature different negative effects like diseases, robbery and even some opponents like foreign farmers or insects trying to ruin your harvest which will appear occationally. 

To make the game progress clearer and kind of challenging you will get quests to fullfill. If you need more room for planting you can buy more fields or increase your storage to be able to store more fruits. But after all do not forget to pay your taxes as every square meter will cost taxes.

This is our base idea from LD41 (Unfortunately german) - Till today there is much more planned content.

At the time of writing this text there are already more than 10 different plants, 16 weapons and 5 negative effects as well as a few other events planned. More ideas are added every few days.

Furthermore there will be a quest and achievement system to guide and challenge you through the game.

Timeline and Plans

We are starting over with a clean project (never rely on a jammed code) and are already in development-process. We participated in Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam which is a very well known challenge, happening three times a year (approximately every four months). During this contest we developed "CornWars LD" which is a basic implementation of our idea lacking a huge amount of content and showing slightly different mechanics. Also it has some bugs as in the nature of such a contest you are in a hurry and do not have time for structural plans or changes.

Our target is to get a steam shop page ready until end of may. We hope to be able to start into a first closed alpha round for the main part of the game by November 2018 with our Alpha-Backers (there are limited places available). At this time we will probably still be missing some features like quests and other specials but the whole game mechanic itself should be running. Futhrt we plan to go into full featured (public) Early Access until End of 2018 where full featured means all promised features should be implemented and working, all models and graphics should be ready and we do only need to balance a few things, fix some bugs that may appear and go on with implementing additions.

If the game has great success and that is a requested feature we want to implement some multiplayer support (Co-op farming) The time of this implementation will depend on a few factors and is in no way tied to any date yet.


Gameplay-Targets

People were asking how we plan to bind the player to the game. Why the player should play the game.

We already mentioned quests. You will have kind of a story line to play through by quests. Some might return, some won't.

Completing quests as well as some other circumstances will give you achievements.

There will be a hand full of leaderboards (like average coin gain per hour played or quest statistics)

Some quests will be challenges. Those challenges will also be subject for leaderboards.

Showcase

As mentioned we participated in LD41 and this idea comes from the jam. As such we have implemented a slightly differend and very rudimentary version of the basic game logic. You can download and play this for free by clicking here. It is kind of a technical preview of our idea. For example the preview does no contain big differences between revolver and sniper. The cooldowns are a bit nasty...

During development we will occasionally publish news about our progress here as well as do some live streaming sessions where you can ask questions and add your own ideas to improve the game.

 

Financial plan

The To-Be-Raised funds of this campaign will be used for license cost for our needed software.

If we get enough support we will get a coworking space to be bale to work toigether even more efficient.

The target of this campaign is the minimal volume of funds needed for us to afford the game development cost as well as to send the rewards out.

As you can see we really need some space for working on the project to be able to complete it in a timely and efficient manner.

Of course we are able and willing to add personal funds if we happen to need some more assets later. Furthermore we get some support over patreon and from our twitch subscribers. This also goes directly into the projects funds.

What if we are not able to collect the whole funds?

We will need to pay the licenses by our own. Furthermore the big goal is around 5.000 to 6.000€ to be able to get a coworking office space, better sounds etc. 700€ is just the fixed cost we will have in any case.

 

Stretch Goals

We also got a few stretch goals. Please note that the stretch goal contents mitght be delivered after our official release.

5.000€ - Together is better!

We will rent a coworking space where we can work together even more efficient. Probably we can shorten the planned release date?!

10.000€ - Additional content for full backing

This is our stretch goal which will ensure we got some extra buffer and can create some extra content and better marketing.

To thank our backers we will add one fantasy plant which we will plan and design together with our backers. The plant will be a very special and fancy plant with features other plants don't have.

Furthermore we will try our best to implement a few more other plants and contents which might else come in a DLC.

12.500€ - Trading

If we reach a goal of 12.500€ we will implement a trading post where you can offer goods for coins and other players can buy them. This will also add an additional layer of complexity as we will need to implement a higher demand on different items.

15.000€ - Co-Op Farming

If we reach the goal of 15.000€ we will implement a Co-Op Farming mode where you can play together with a friend at the same farm. 

30.000€ - Online-Realtime-Simulation

If we happen reach a goal of 30.000€ we are going to additionally implement a Real-Time online mode where other players could visit your farm and would be able to interact with you to for example fight against you, steal goods, or simply help you out. This is a huge addon as we will also implement features for the players to defend themselves.

 

Further Support

If you want to support our project a bit more or don't want to back us but support us anyways you can share this campaign with your friends and follow us on twitter.

story:
In the modern city of Herd, a somewhat hard working, ambitious woman named Sheryl tries to improve her life by becoming the best version of herself. But in her day to day there are elements such as cat callers, "chivalrous" men, man spreaders and many others  that are hell-bent in destroying her resolve and keeping her in her place. Despite these struggles, Sheryl finds her strength committed to proving them wrong.

Incentives

$10 - full game, all future DLCs, and special thanks at the end credits

$20+ - all prior level incentives + an in-game asset (building, house, business, NPCs, etc.) named after you or your social media handle. (Limit 200)

*If not all in-game assets are claimed they will be available for purchase later on for $15. That is the price for just the asset, it does not include the game.

Where does your donations go?

The money goes to upgrading hardware and software to improve efficiency in the development process. If goal is not met, development will continue at a slower pace.

Value of the game

This game shines a spotlight on real life interactions through a comedic lens.

Reality of this project

We are a group of friends who come from a background that includes coding from the age of 8, extensive video game knowledge over the last 30 years and a film school student who has a knack for script writing. Using our talents and knowledge we have come together to bring you a game that not only will present a challenge in its game play, but a challenge in presenting the logical extreme of taking little things and blowing them out of proportion.

The game itself will be a 1 time buy, aside from DLC and an extensive cosmetic package that will actually give you buffs in the game, there will be no microtransactions. We are group that's hates them just as much everyone else. The game is not designed as a pay to win.

Thank you again for looking at our project. We hope you have the confidence in us and back our project.
