story:
Let's Bring Knowledge about Crypto-Currencies and Blockchain through the game!

Crypto Mining War is a Free-to-play Multiplayer Online Battle Arena Game living in an original Crypto-related Cyber World! It combines Trading Card Game with a Powerful Battle Mode where 2 players will fight into a battlefield ! Using help (or not) of the Neutrino Unit, you will strategically deploy your cards in order to destroy the Opponent’s Mining Pool Tower, protected by 3 resistant Firewalls!

Create your deck, complete missions to make your cards evolve, join a Virtual Mining Pool to fight together and win the Crypto Mining War while learning about Crypto-currencies!

 

Game development is on its way with already many elements ready! Anyway, we want to offer a Brand New Backer Experience! We will make you enter into the game development! Instead of deliver a full project after too many months, we will offer to the Backer the possibility to access multiple intermediate version of the Game! From the really early Beta version to the « Near to release » Beta version!

Here’s how we will process; Game delivery will be cut into, at least, 3 intermediate versions:

1 - First beta will manage the Battle game experience – Stand-alone and Multiplayer.

2 – Second beta will manage the Virtual Mining Pool feature (like a Clan feature)

3 -  Third beta will manage the Tournaments feature

For each of these steps, we will work together, using your feedback to improve the user experience and make the game better ! We will also select some group of backers among the world, with whose we will directly talk in order to really take into account your advices and so, really understand the users needs and feelings.

 

- Help people to learn more about Crypto-currencies and Blockchain world while having fun playing the game!

- Bring a Crypto curiosity to players through a really fun multiplayer game with Crypto Esport, fully designed into an Original Crypto-related World!

- Organize tournaments in a Crypto-Esport way to make best players win Gifts and Cryptos!

- Bring the game to a higher professionnal level with better design, animations and gameplay!

- Create more cards and Game modes to play!

- We want you to love the game, enjoy playing it because you will also be a part of it!

 

The Base Gameplay of Crypto Mining War is simple :

- The main objective is to destroy the opponent’s Mining Pool Tower!

- Build your deck with your 8 favourite cards. Cards can be Single, Multiple Troops or Spells. It is your choice to find, for you, the best combination of cards to play!

- Start the Battle, be ready to deploy your cards in the battlefield as soon as you have cumulated enough Bitcoin to summon the card you want ! Card cost is displayed on the bottom right hand corner.

- In the middle of the battlefield will be positioned the Neutrino Unit. A strong and neutral unit which, once killed, will give you an advantage in the game: Boost, Troop Healed, Free Card, Spell launched on the enemies, etc.

- Would you rather attack the Neutrino by activating the Neutrino button (Green or Red) or no? This is your choice! Of course, Troop that attack the Neutrino will be vulnerable to the enemy’s attacks, you see the strategy, right ?!

- You will have to destroy first and at least part of the 3 firewalls that protect the enemy’s Mining Pool Tower to discover its place and be able to destroy it!

- Win as much battle as you can to get Victory Points and rise up to the highest Players ranks!

- With victory, you will get a random Crates that will contain Cards, Crypto Coinz and Crystals, providing the wherewithal to make your cards evolve, participating in tournaments, etc.

- If concerned Stretch Goal is reach, you will be able to customise your cards with equipments, like Crypto-guns, cyber-armor, hack tools and more!

Main screen of the game (can be upgraded)

Battle preview (will be improved with better designs)

From now, game count 22 original cards. You can check some of those right below : 

You will be able to make the cards evolve up to level 15. Every card has a Class, from Class 1 (bronze border) that is the most common one, to the Class 3 (Gold border) that is the rarest one !

Of course, common cards are much easier to find !

 

At regular frequencies (from 1 / week to multiple time a day, depending on the players amount), you will be able to participate in FREE tournaments (for free or using your ingame Crystals and Crypto Coinz, never any participation fees will be asked), where the best players will be rewarded in Real Cryptos (for legal adults and minor with parental agreement) or Gifts, depending on the game profit. Tournaments level will be multiple, in order to fit to most of the different player’s level (beginner, confirmed player, pro, etc.).

 

Crypto Mining War is born from the idea of Cyrille HEJL, CEO of Cryptos Interactive, a new Video Game company currently being created, a passionated web & game developper!

Our purpose is to bring entertainment and crypto-curiosity to both crypto-enthousiastic players and common players.

With Crypto Mining War, players will be able to learn how Crypto-currencies and Blockchain work while having fun!

For player that don’t know Cryptocurrencies world, there’s no need any crypto-skills to start the game, and, maybe, it will spark your curiosity. ;) 

 

You can go directly to the next section if technical stuff bother you;)

Crypto Mining War is creating with Kotlin langage associated to LibGDX game library.

The biggest advantage to work with Kotlin is that it’s a very well portable langage. This way, We will be able to deliver easily the Game in many platforms : PC (Windows & Linux) / MAC / Mobile (Android and iOS support) !

 

Boring to play with your computer or your Smartphone ? Why not meeting a friend and play together to the Crypto Mining War Board Game! 

From stretch goal 12 500, we will be able to create the board game associated to the video game ! Board game concept and rules are already done, only miss the financials!

Deploy your physical cards in the board, Make them move forward ! If two cards face to each other, They will fight ! Special abilities, Special cards and strategies to use and discover!

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Crypto Mining War is not an investment plateform, neither a mining plateform. Crypto Mining War is a game with the purpose of bringing entertainement and fun while learning about Crypto-currencies and Blockchain world.

There's no real risk as game is already in development. Game will be released with or without having reach the main goal of the campain. Anyway, the campain success would considerably accelerate the process! Moreover, the advantage to work with multiple beta version is that we can deliver a playable version of the game soon, even if it's not complete. After that, every day will be a work to improve the game and add the features, thanks to your returns of beta test!

About the Esport tournaments with rewards, there's no participation fees and game is free-to-play. Tournaments reward will depends on the company earnings, like sponsoring, advertising, goodies, etc. The company will make all the verification process to respect the law regarding game with Esport rewards, mainly concerning the real money reward (as crypto-currencies are considered as financial asset). So about this, it might be possible that Crypto-Esport would be prohibited in your country. We advice potential backer to check in their country law to find it out.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, but want to help bringing this project to life, you can :

  • Talk about this campaign around you.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share it with the world!
story_txt:
Let's Bring Knowledge about Crypto-Currencies and Blockchain through the game!
Crypto Mining War is a Free-to-play Multiplayer Online Battle Arena Game living in an original Crypto-related Cyber World! It combines Trading Card Game with a Powerful Battle Mode where 2 players will fight into a battlefield ! Using help (or not) of the Neutrino Unit, you will strategically deploy your cards in order to destroy the Opponent’s Mining Pool Tower, protected by 3 resistant Firewalls!
Create your deck, complete missions to make your cards evolve, join a Virtual Mining Pool to fight together and win the Crypto Mining War while learning about Crypto-currencies!
 

Game development is on its way with already many elements ready! Anyway, we want to offer a Brand New Backer Experience! We will make you enter into the game development! Instead of deliver a full project after too many months, we will offer to the Backer the possibility to access multiple intermediate version of the Game! From the really early Beta version to the « Near to release » Beta version!
Here’s how we will process; Game delivery will be cut into, at least, 3 intermediate versions:
1 - First beta will manage the Battle game experience – Stand-alone and Multiplayer.
2 – Second beta will manage the Virtual Mining Pool feature (like a Clan feature)
3 -  Third beta will manage the Tournaments feature
For each of these steps, we will work together, using your feedback to improve the user experience and make the game better ! We will also select some group of backers among the world, with whose we will directly talk in order to really take into account your advices and so, really understand the users needs and feelings.
 

- Help people to learn more about Crypto-currencies and Blockchain world while having fun playing the game!
- Bring a Crypto curiosity to players through a really fun multiplayer game with Crypto Esport, fully designed into an Original Crypto-related World!
- Organize tournaments in a Crypto-Esport way to make best players win Gifts and Cryptos!
- Bring the game to a higher professionnal level with better design, animations and gameplay!
- Create more cards and Game modes to play!
- We want you to love the game, enjoy playing it because you will also be a part of it!
 

The Base Gameplay of Crypto Mining War is simple :
- The main objective is to destroy the opponent’s Mining Pool Tower!
- Build your deck with your 8 favourite cards. Cards can be Single, Multiple Troops or Spells. It is your choice to find, for you, the best combination of cards to play!
- Start the Battle, be ready to deploy your cards in the battlefield as soon as you have cumulated enough Bitcoin to summon the card you want ! Card cost is displayed on the bottom right hand corner.
- In the middle of the battlefield will be positioned the Neutrino Unit. A strong and neutral unit which, once killed, will give you an advantage in the game: Boost, Troop Healed, Free Card, Spell launched on the enemies, etc.
- Would you rather attack the Neutrino by activating the Neutrino button (Green or Red) or no? This is your choice! Of course, Troop that attack the Neutrino will be vulnerable to the enemy’s attacks, you see the strategy, right ?!
- You will have to destroy first and at least part of the 3 firewalls that protect the enemy’s Mining Pool Tower to discover its place and be able to destroy it!
- Win as much battle as you can to get Victory Points and rise up to the highest Players ranks!
- With victory, you will get a random Crates that will contain Cards, Crypto Coinz and Crystals, providing the wherewithal to make your cards evolve, participating in tournaments, etc.
- If concerned Stretch Goal is reach, you will be able to customise your cards with equipments, like Crypto-guns, cyber-armor, hack tools and more!
Main screen of the game (can be upgraded)

Battle preview (will be improved with better designs)


From now, game count 22 original cards. You can check some of those right below : 









You will be able to make the cards evolve up to level 15. Every card has a Class, from Class 1 (bronze border) that is the most common one, to the Class 3 (Gold border) that is the rarest one !
Of course, common cards are much easier to find !
 

At regular frequencies (from 1 / week to multiple time a day, depending on the players amount), you will be able to participate in FREE tournaments (for free or using your ingame Crystals and Crypto Coinz, never any participation fees will be asked), where the best players will be rewarded in Real Cryptos (for legal adults and minor with parental agreement) or Gifts, depending on the game profit. Tournaments level will be multiple, in order to fit to most of the different player’s level (beginner, confirmed player, pro, etc.).
 

Crypto Mining War is born from the idea of Cyrille HEJL, CEO of Cryptos Interactive, a new Video Game company currently being created, a passionated web & game developper!
Our purpose is to bring entertainment and crypto-curiosity to both crypto-enthousiastic players and common players.
With Crypto Mining War, players will be able to learn how Crypto-currencies and Blockchain work while having fun!
For player that don’t know Cryptocurrencies world, there’s no need any crypto-skills to start the game, and, maybe, it will spark your curiosity. ;) 
 

You can go directly to the next section if technical stuff bother you;)
Crypto Mining War is creating with Kotlin langage associated to LibGDX game library.
The biggest advantage to work with Kotlin is that it’s a very well portable langage. This way, We will be able to deliver easily the Game in many platforms : PC (Windows & Linux) / MAC / Mobile (Android and iOS support) !
 

Boring to play with your computer or your Smartphone ? Why not meeting a friend and play together to the Crypto Mining War Board Game! 

From stretch goal 12 500, we will be able to create the board game associated to the video game ! Board game concept and rules are already done, only miss the financials!
Deploy your physical cards in the board, Make them move forward ! If two cards face to each other, They will fight ! Special abilities, Special cards and strategies to use and discover!
 

 














 
Risks & Challenges
Crypto Mining War is not an investment plateform, neither a mining plateform. Crypto Mining War is a game with the purpose of bringing entertainement and fun while learning about Crypto-currencies and Blockchain world.
There's no real risk as game is already in development. Game will be released with or without having reach the main goal of the campain. Anyway, the campain success would considerably accelerate the process! Moreover, the advantage to work with multiple beta version is that we can deliver a playable version of the game soon, even if it's not complete. After that, every day will be a work to improve the game and add the features, thanks to your returns of beta test!
About the Esport tournaments with rewards, there's no participation fees and game is free-to-play. Tournaments reward will depends on the company earnings, like sponsoring, advertising, goodies, etc. The company will make all the verification process to respect the law regarding game with Esport rewards, mainly concerning the real money reward (as crypto-currencies are considered as financial asset). So about this, it might be possible that Crypto-Esport would be prohibited in your country. We advice potential backer to check in their country law to find it out.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, but want to help bringing this project to life, you can :

Talk about this campaign around you.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to share it with the world!

story:
‘BELLATOR’ is a single hand control mobile (iOS/Android) action game with battles played by various characters.

 

 



Players can collect unique characters with different jobs and techniques, and create a best warrior of the kingdom through continuous battles. 








Control methods are simple.
Set the direction of the moving character(Swipe) and attack(Touch)!








‘BELLATOR’ provides various types of game settings that are played with the characters full of unique personalities. Select the best player and techniques suited for each situation and mode.

 


   






Continuous battles! Review your next opposing player and strategically select the character and technique for your best battle! The rewards for your victory increases as the opposing players become stronger. Fight with various items that appear in the map. Treasure chest contains bigger rewards?!


  


Various Battles 
 


Field Items






The best warrior of the kingdom needs a proper quest. Who will take down the most enemies that turn up endlessly?
 
Also, variety of monsters are waiting for you.
 




The warriors of the kingdom enter the battles with individual stories. What are the stories behind each character? Why is the kingdom in these battles? As many as these stories, numerous types of quests are presented.








Challenge other players! Collaborative matches with friends! Spectacular game modes are provided through the network!


 








Distinctive characters with different jobs and techniques are awaiting for you. Try collecting and growing characters that signify you. Characters with more classes and individuality are coming!








 
 
 











Warriors all have one powerful special skill and other individual normal skills. Select the skills appropriate to the game mode and the opposing player.

 



Normal Skills
 

    





Special Skills 
 

 






Grow your warriors with the rewards provided during the game! The warriors become stronger as their level moves up!


       









Medieval background that matches the characters! Countless field traps and items for extra excitement!



 



 
 



 
 








 



Items can be purchased at the store. Potions, re-match chances and even a default win by buying out the judge!


 





Artifacts are hidden all around the game map. Collect them during your play.


 





Put them on your warriors for more spectacular battles.

 




Who has more victories? Compare your scores with your friends through SNS, and go for the world ranking!
    










 

Desktop wallpaper

All the Backers will receive our thank you letter and wallpaper with our concept art.

 

Names on website

We will display the names of our supporters on our website.

 

 

 


$15 worth game money

Backers will receive $15 worth game money that can be used in the game.

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 


 


Beta early access

You will be given the access to our ‘BELLATOR’ beta version prior to the launching,
so you can play our game before anyone else.
Please give us your feedbacks.

 

2 characters are opened

2 characters that you can use in the game are given.

 

Digital art book

A PDF format art book with sketches,
illustrations and 3D works of BELLATOR are given.

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 


 

 

5 characters are opened

3 characters that you can use in the game are given. (total 5 characters)

 

Names on game credit

Your names will be mentioned in the credits of our game.

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 

 


 

Open to all the characters

3 characters that you can use in the game are given. (total 5 characters)

 

Provide 'Indiegogo only' artifacts

Provided ‘Indiegogo only’ artifacts that can be worn on the characters.

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 


 

 

Given a character card set

Given one character card set (5 cards) with character images and informations.

(Note: Images are mock-ups of works in progress!
Final product may be updated and refined.)

 

Provide 'Indiegogo only' character

Given ‘Indiegogo only’ character

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 


 

 

Given a special printed T-shirt

Given a T-shirt printed with the game logo.

(Note: Images are mock-ups of works in progress!
Final product may be updated and refined.)

 

Game art poster

Given a ‘BELLATOR’ poster printed with our concept art.

(Note: Images are mock-ups of works in progress!
Final product may be updated and refined.) 


$50 worth game money

Backers will receive $50 worth game money that can be used in the game.

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 


 

 

Given printed concept book

Given one character card set (5 cards) with character images and informations.

(Note: Images are mock-ups of works in progress! 
Final product may be updated and refined.) 


Given a character card 3 sets

Given 3 sets of character cards (15 cards) with character images and informations.

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 

 


 

Given 1 character figure

Given ‘BELLATOR’ character figure made with 3D printer.
One figure set from the 5 representative characters of each class will be selected randomly.

(Note: Images are mock-ups of works in progress! 
Final product may be updated and refined.)

 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 

 


 

Given 1 character figure set

Given ‘BELLATOR’ character figure sets made with 3D printer.
5 sets of representative character figures of each class will be sent.

(Note: Images are mock-ups of works in progress! 
Final product may be updated and refined.) 


+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 


 

 

Give names for the characters
(limited 10 people)

For the first 10 people,
they will get a chance to name the characters in the game.


 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!

 

 


 

Create 1 character you want

You can design a character you want by consulting with our designer.
Not just the design, but you can choose the technique, personality and name!
Also, game credits will mention your contribution.


 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!
(Early 2 perk not included)

 


 

 

Create 1 champion character & 1 map you want

You can design a champion character, your enemy,
by consulting with our designer.
Not just the design, but you can choose the technique, personality and name!
Also, game credits will mention your contribution.



 

+ ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS!
(Early 2 & Create 1 character perk not included)

 




 

 


 










We are friends since high school. We nurtured our dreams while play games and reading comic books together. We went to separate colleges and worked in various companies before we came together to make our own game.

We liked different types of games and had different preferences. However, our will to make our own game compensated for these differences. Our first attempt was to create a sports game. Soon, we realized that we needed too much resources and knew very little about ways to get them. In the end, we failed.

Since then, we made other utilities and worked on subcontracted development and design projects. Nonetheless, we once again began to design our own game, and, this time, we were going to see it through.





When we made the outline for new our game, we again came up with a demanding plan. The project was stalled for about a year. We lacked the manpower as well as the resources.

Continuous funding was needed to create such large amount of contents. Nonetheless, we have finally completed all the structures for the foundational system.

However, we still have to develop more contents and secure more stable system structure. We need your help and your interest.
Please help us present our game to the world.





We are a small group made up of one CEO/Producer, one Concept/Director, one CDO, one CTO and two beginning programmers. Also, we have not yet established the publishing rights and stable server for the game. There are still many areas that need our attention.

Nevertheless, we will not give up. We have learned such valuable lessons working on our game, and will continue to make our own paths. We do not second doubt our ability to resolve problems.

If you can show us your interest and help our project, we promise we will launch a game that will not disappoint you.

story:
@intenzibne

“Diesel Guns” - is a multiplayer old-school car combat game in the Twisted Metal, interstate 76 and Vigilante 8 style.



Features:

The game mechanics combines drive and fun of car combat and balance of classic shooter games.

Easy car and weapon control allow you to concentrate your attention to gameplay.

The supply of vehicles and weapons is the following: 6 main types of weapons, 4 special weapons, 4 fire modes, possibility of combining landmines and various vehicle classes with unique specifications and capabilities. All of this will help you uncover your tactical potential and find your own playing style.

Diverse and eye-catching battle arenas are here too.  Every location is like a sandbox designed in a certain setting and unlimited either by time or a place.


System Requirements:

  • Steam account
  • Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series video card or higher

Please help us reach 1000 Facebook Page Likes @dieselguns . As a reward we will put in the game a powerful weapon - Harpoon. Harpoon - triple shot, extremely high damage but very slow reloading!




Why Indiegogo?

The challenge for a game programmer is to end the game. The game programmer likes the process of making a game and yet he will come in with “a light purse”. The publisher doesn’t like a game itself but he likes successful games. He always has resources to bring a game to an end, the so-called “final kick”.  We have no publisher, in-game purchases, paid DLC as well as a charge for beta testing. We have made the game based not on camouflaged casino that makes money on you but the game at the heart of which is competitive spirit, drive and fun. We like making games and that is why we need your “final kick”.

Having received money we are planning to purchase the content and software, localize the game and rent servers.

Current progress:

  • Classes of cars - 4/4
  • Locations- 3/4
  • Bonuses - 3/7
  • Weapons - 6/6
  • Special Weapons - 0/4
  • Fire modes - 2/4
  • Special Abilities - 0/4
  • Power-Ups - 0/6



The Game



Cars

Besides their exterior, all the vehicles introduced in the game differ in key features such as speed, armor, maneuverability, capabilities and special-purpose weapons. That makes it possible for each player to find his playing style.


Weapons

There are 6 main types of weapons and 4 special weapons with 4 fire modes in the game. The weapon is balanced and has advantages and disadvantages. When choosing a weapon you have to take into account the speed and distance to an enemy and consider how severely his car is damaged, whether his shield is turned on and other factors.


Not only do you have to change the weapon for the required one quickly but also to use its fire mode properly. Every weapon has 4 fire modes: main, secondary, alternate and alternate secondary. The alternate fire requires 5 or more shells but it has much greater fire power.


Energy

Energy is a special resource replenished at the expense of damage or at high speed. You will always have to choose the way to consume energy: using nitro to overtake an enemy, the shield to protect from damage, jumps up to hard-to-get-at places or some special vehicle capability.


Bonuses & Power-Ups

Like in classic shooter games “Quake” and “Unreal Tournament” you should explore characteristics of the battle arena and be acutely aware of the place where valuable bonuses and weapons are. Apart from basic bonuses restoring an armor, energy and shields there are also valuable bonuses that make a jump higher, power – greater and damage - severer. In addition to it, you need to choose three power assists that will help you uncover your tactical potential fully.



STRETCH GOALS

GOAL 1: 6000$
MAP PACK: +2 maps

GOAL 2: 7000$
BONUS PACK: +4 bonuses, +6 power-ups

GOAL 3: 8000$
TRUCK: +1 truck vehicle class
RETRO CAR PACK: +5 retro car skins

GOAL 4: 11 000$
HUNT MODE: asymmetrical game mode



PERKS


EARLY BIRD 2$ (Limited)

  • Digital Game

  • Wallpapers

You will get the in-game car skin that designed special for backers. You will get the in-game gold weapon skin car and mark of death that designed special for pro backers.

story_txt:
@intenzibne
“Diesel Guns” - is a multiplayer old-school car combat game in the Twisted Metal, interstate 76 and Vigilante 8 style.

Features:The game mechanics combines drive and fun of car combat and balance of classic shooter games.Easy car and weapon control allow you to concentrate your attention to gameplay.The supply of vehicles and weapons is the following: 6 main types of weapons, 4 special weapons, 4 fire modes, possibility of combining landmines and various vehicle classes with unique specifications and capabilities. All of this will help you uncover your tactical potential and find your own playing style. Diverse and eye-catching battle arenas are here too.  Every location is like a sandbox designed in a certain setting and unlimited either by time or a place.




System Requirements:

Steam account
Windows 7 64-bit or later
NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series video card or higher






Please help us reach 1000 Facebook Page Likes @dieselguns . As a reward we will put in the game a powerful weapon - Harpoon. Harpoon - triple shot, extremely high damage but very slow reloading!



Why Indiegogo?
The challenge for a game programmer is to end the game. The game programmer likes the process of making a game and yet he will come in with “a light purse”. The publisher doesn’t like a game itself but he likes successful games. He always has resources to bring a game to an end, the so-called “final kick”.  We have no publisher, in-game purchases, paid DLC as well as a charge for beta testing. We have made the game based not on camouflaged casino that makes money on you but the game at the heart of which is competitive spirit, drive and fun. We like making games and that is why we need your “final kick”. 
Having received money we are planning to purchase the content and software, localize the game and rent servers. 


Current progress:

Classes of cars - 4/4
Locations- 3/4
Bonuses - 3/7
Weapons - 6/6
Special Weapons - 0/4
Fire modes - 2/4
Special Abilities - 0/4
Power-Ups - 0/6









The Game






Cars
Besides their exterior, all the vehicles introduced in the game differ in key features such as speed, armor, maneuverability, capabilities and special-purpose weapons. That makes it possible for each player to find his playing style. 



Weapons

There are 6 main types of weapons and 4 special weapons with 4 fire modes in the game. The weapon is balanced and has advantages and disadvantages. When choosing a weapon you have to take into account the speed and distance to an enemy and consider how severely his car is damaged, whether his shield is turned on and other factors.
Not only do you have to change the weapon for the required one quickly but also to use its fire mode properly. Every weapon has 4 fire modes: main, secondary, alternate and alternate secondary. The alternate fire requires 5 or more shells but it has much greater fire power. 







Energy
Energy is a special resource replenished at the expense of damage or at high speed. You will always have to choose the way to consume energy: using nitro to overtake an enemy, the shield to protect from damage, jumps up to hard-to-get-at places or some special vehicle capability.




Bonuses & Power-Ups

Like in classic shooter games “Quake” and “Unreal Tournament” you should explore characteristics of the battle arena and be acutely aware of the place where valuable bonuses and weapons are. Apart from basic bonuses restoring an armor, energy and shields there are also valuable bonuses that make a jump higher, power – greater and damage - severer. In addition to it, you need to choose three power assists that will help you uncover your tactical potential fully. 


STRETCH GOALS
GOAL 1: 6000$MAP PACK: +2 maps
GOAL 2: 7000$BONUS PACK: +4 bonuses, +6 power-ups
GOAL 3: 8000$TRUCK: +1 truck vehicle classRETRO CAR PACK: +5 retro car skins

GOAL 4: 11 000$HUNT MODE: asymmetrical game mode

story:
Austin, Texas is home to many gamers, gaming companies, and an ever growing number of tech industries. So why is there currently no place for gamers to go and watch the games that they want while getting served food and drink? Why is it so difficult to set up events to watch major gaming events like LCS or Blizzcon? I want to solve this problem.

What does AFK have to offer Austin?

  • A permanent home for Barcraft and other gaming events!
  • Craft beer on tap, and fresh food made to order.
  • A place for Texas gamers to get out and gather, and watch their favorite professional gamers all in one spot!

You might be asking yourself, this all sounds well and good, but who is the man behind the curtain, so to speak? My name's Josh, and I have been a gamer first and foremost as far back as I can remember. My professional experiences have been varied and colorful, with experience in food service, alcohol, food preparation, tech industries, entertainment, advertising, customer service, and even security. Two of my greatest loves are food and gaming, and I'm bursting with excitement over the chance to not only combine the two, but make people happy doing it. I know from experience that if you take care of the people, the people will take care of you.

I have many plans for what the future of AFK could hold, but for now, I just need help making a business that can stand on it's own on the simple grounds of being a place that gamers from all over would love to hang out at or plan large gatherings.

Why IndieGoGo?

Quite frankly, while I'm willing to put everything I have into building this business, property in Austin is very expensive. I have the money to get things to sell, but I need a place to sell it. I found a location near the UT campus that perfectly suits my needs and the needs of many Austin gamers of drinking age (Close proximity to student housing, nearby bus stop, proper zoning for alcohol distribution, high foot traffic, etc.) but I still need to be able to afford it.

Also, any money I receive that goes over the stated goal will go towards making AFK a much better experience for everyone! Better TVs for streaming, better food, a better barfront, and better selection of beer are all planned stretch goals that I would use profits from the bar to improve, but if I can get the money from this campaign these things will come in a much shorter time span!

Also, to show people how serious I am about this, if I don't get the bare minimum amount needed to open, I get nothing. I lose. Good day sir.

That's right. If I don't get the bare minimum of $50,000, it all goes back to the donors. I would feel awful taking the money that people had offered in good faith and being unable to fulfill my promises.

However, I don't think it will come to that, because I believe in the gaming community, and I believe that there are many people who want the kind of experience that I have to offer. This is especially true since I'm offering some pretty sweet swag for donors!

Other Ways You Can Help

Donating money, while greatly appreciated, isn't the only way you can help out. If you want to be a part of AFK's future but just don't have the funds, there are a few things you can do to help!

  • Tell your friends. Tell your boss. Tell your family. Tell your coworkers. Tell your dog. Tell anyone who will listen about this campaign and help spread the word! (Don't really tell your dog.)
  • Share this campaign on your own website, Facebook, Twitter, etc., etc.. The more people that see it, the better!
  • Keep checking back to this page for updates! I'm going to keep adding information to keep people interested and let them know more about the project!

Thank you for your time, and I hope we can build something amazing!

story:
OVERVIEW

Fantasy Dimension The Card Game is a dark fantasy CCG (known as Collectible Card Game, TCG, Trading Card Game). It was inspired by Magic The Gathering and some other card games, but offers completely different gameplay and rules.

Features:

* No random factors during the duels - fair play where thinking and tactics are the key
* Balanced cards - fair play with no much better cards at same value, but benefits in specific strategy or occasion
* 160+ unique cards - no cards with all exactly the same attributes
* Customizable main character - adjustable factors that affect style of playing
* Progressive deck building - new random cards for exchange after each victory
* Generated enemies - each duel offers enemy prepared with random factors
* Dark Fantasy theme - no disneyland, no japan
* Imaginative - old book style drawings
* Multiplatform - browser based (Windows, Linux, Mac, Android, iOS, and other)
* FREE - ad based, no microtransactions, no pay2win


GAMEPLAY

At the beginning of the game, player chooses one of few starter decks and difficulty modes.
Main character can be customized with attributes like endurance (starter health points for each duel), power (starter mana points for each duel) and number of maximum cards in deck, which allows to take various strategies of playing style.
Deck can have 20 cards (extendable to maximum of 30 cards with character attributes), but during combat all cards are available, each one can be used multiple times (if there is enough available power to cast, but once per turn), some units can offer own abilities to activate, and there are few basic spell cards that do not count to deck maximum.
This way, randomness and luck have been mostly eliminated from the game.
Victory unlocks new random card that goes to the library.
Deck content can be exchanged with content from the library before each duel.
There are unit and spell cards, where unit can summon specific character to the battlefield, and spell can direcly modify own units, enemy units, own main character or enemy main character.
There are no cards with all exactly the same attributes.
There are no cards that are much better than others in the same cost, but benefits of each card can be noticed in specific strategy or occasion.
If unit on battlefield activates special ability that is not passive, then it is done instead of attacking and costs no power.
Overall game rules are focused on a fair balance.
At the beginning of the duel, main character has starter power points (amount depends on character attributes), and gets small amount of new ones each turn which can be increased by some units or spells.
Each main character can cast one card per turn (unless it is a card with attribute that allows to cast another) for cost of required power, and use one special ability of each summoned character per turn.
Battlefield is divided into 5 slots for own units, and 5 slots for enemy units.
Basically, each unit (that was not used to activate ability, immobilized or summoned in current turn, except ones with special abilities) attacks enemy unit on opposite field or enemy main character (if there is no unit) in end of each turn, but this range can be modified by special abilities or spells.
The duel ends when one of main characters has endurance below 1 point.

Example cards:

Early Pre-Alpha:
- only 60 cards of total 160
- no direct spell cards yet
- basic Artifical Intelligence
- minimal interface



GOALS

* 500$ - guaranteed release, base playable game with mentioned features
* more - faster progress, more cards


BACKERS

* 0$ - advertisements, beta state access.
* 1$ - thanks!
* 10$ - no advertisements, early alpha access, suggesting ideas to the game for consideration.
* 100$ - same as before, but with name in game credits with optional link


FUNDS

Funds are going for time spent on programming part and server upkeep costs.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

I am independent programmer since late 90s, long time experienced with web programming in various languages and technologies (JavaScript/PHP/Ajax/ActionScript/Flash). I know technical limitations and server requirements after working on many commercial and completed projects.

Early alpha access for basic game with should be available for backers within a month, and public beta within a month later. Final version should be available within another month later. There are always possible delays, so please be patient.

Remember that game is browser based. Your game progress will be stored on a server with daily backup. There is always very small chance for server technical malfunction (not available), but I am using professional hosts with quick response to such situations. Used system is flexible, but I will run additional resources if needed.


FAQ

Requirements?
It is a browser based game, so any computer or device with internet access and modern internet browser like Chrome or FireFox. Game will work on Windows XP or later, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS, and probably something else.

Multiplayer?
In current base version, no. There are plans in near future, if the game will get enough interest.

Release date?
Early alpha state within a month for backers. Public beta state within a month later. Final version within another month later. Some delays are always possible.

How long this game will be supported?
If minimum for base game will be funded, then 2 years of support are guaranteed. Later, if this game will still get noticable positive response from current and arriving new users, there is no reason to kill it. It will be a reason for new extension updates. It is also possible that it might be released as standard desktop and mobile game.

story:
Hi

My name is Butch Binneman, a 71 year old South African, resident in Cape Town.
I have been active in the Cape Flats communities for over 40 years, assisting with business development on a pro-bono basis.
Globally it is difficult for those less fortunate to acquire capital for any kind of income producing activity.
In order to assist with the eradication of the need to carry cash in crime ridden communities, and provide a method to access capital, the Mobile Payment Method (MPM APP) was created.
After extensive research it became apparent that MPM was unique in concept and capability, and was provisionally patented for me by well known patent attorney, Brian Bacon, of Cape Town.
Contributors will receive a detailed description of the MPM APP.
I have a registered company styled Mobiching (Pty) Ltd and the domain name mobiching.co.za (see logo and tag line) that will be used in the MPM roll-out in South Africa.
A portion of the distributable income from Mobiching (Pty) Ltd will be applied as a cash flow guarantee to funding institutions, to raise capital for ED (Enterprise Development) throughout South Africa, using registered co-operatives.
Please visit www.cofisa.co.za for information on financial co-operatives
Many "cottage industry" possibilities have been detailed that suit the skills available in the communities being targeted. 
Specific programmes at schools will provide uniforms, school feeding, books and approximately 35 sustainable jobs per school of 1000 pupils.
MPM can be used for the remotest communities to transact, as long as there is internet coverage.
MPM uses a double PIN security method and does not require any personal or banking information to be divulged.
Current "Tap & Go" methods do not have PIN control and the transactional amount is consequently limited.
MPM limits are the same as those set by your bank.
Bank particulars of users are cloud stored with HCE and NFC technologies applied.
Other payment APPS require funds to be deposited in the operators account before use.
MPM is limited only by the funds or credit available to you from your bank.
With the availability of NFC enabled SIM cards, non enabled mobiles can do a SIM Swap and become capable.
MPM offers a unique Agent/Principal option that allows agents to sell goods on behalf of a principal, with funds going directly to the bank account of the principal.
MPM offers the usual coupon availability feature.

 

What We Need & What You Get

You will note under "Perks" that an amount of One Dollar is entered. This is to allow as many people as possible to participate.
Larger amounts are most welcome.
We need global support because the MPM APP can be applied in any country to give benefits to the less fortunate or previously disadvantaged.
Because the MPM APP is used commercially it generates income from transaction fees.
Transaction fees provide running costs and profits to the operators, with a portion of the profit providing a cash flow recognised by financial institutions as a means to repay capital.
When the borrowed capital, serviced by the profit portion, is used to create an income producing enterprise, more sustainable jobs are created with a lifestyle change for the beneficiary participants.
No more begging for hand-outs and charity - help create the vehicle to fund self-empowerment, whilst the world at large benefits from the reduction in costs related to cash circulation.  
Each contributor will get the opportunity to use the MPM APP in their region, for a project of their choice that meets the "benefit to others" criteria. The operating rules will be made available to contributors.
Participation in the above amazing perk will be graded according to the contribution made, but every contributor can become involved.
The funding target will establish the highest commercial activity possible for MPM in South Africa, and give global exposure to the process and opportunity.
The global network of contributors will form the core of other networks and provide a platform for self funding philanthropy.
I have personally provided the funding for the MPM process and earlier knowledge gaining pro-bono activities, and will continue funding the South African launch of MPM, regardless of the response from contributors.
The contributors will MAKE IT HAPPEN globally, empowering themselves and others.
A website, currently under construction, will provide continuous updates on projects benefiting from the MPM method.

Contributors will receive a detailed description of the MPM APP.
I have a registered company styled Mobiching (Pty) Ltd and the domain name mobiching.co.za (see logo and tag line) that will be used in the MPM roll-out in South Africa.
A portion of the distributable income from Mobiching (Pty) Ltd will be applied as a cash flow guarantee to funding institutions, to raise capital for ED (Enterprise Development) throughout South Africa, using registered co-operatives.
Please visit www.cofisa.co.za for information on financial co-operatives
Many "cottage industry" possibilities have been detailed that suit the skills available in the communities being targeted. 
Specific programmes at schools will provide uniforms, school feeding, books and approximately 35 sustainable jobs per school of 1000 pupils.
MPM can be used for the remotest communities to transact, as long as there is internet coverage.
MPM uses a double PIN security method and does not require any personal or banking information to be divulged.
Current "Tap & Go" methods do not have PIN control and the transactional amount is consequently limited.
MPM limits are the same as those set by your bank.
Bank particulars of users are cloud stored with HCE and NFC technologies applied.
Other payment APPS require funds to be deposited in the operators account before use.
MPM is limited only by the funds or credit available to you from your bank.
With the availability of NFC enabled SIM cards, non enabled mobiles can do a SIM Swap and become capable.
MPM offers a unique Agent/Principal option that allows agents to sell goods on behalf of a principal, with funds going directly to the bank account of the principal.
MPM offers the usual coupon availability feature.

    What We Need & What You Get
You will note under "Perks" that an amount of One Dollar is entered. This is to allow as many people as possible to participate.

Larger amounts are most welcome.
We need global support because the MPM APP can be applied in any country to give benefits to the less fortunate or previously disadvantaged.
Because the MPM APP is used commercially it generates income from transaction fees.
Transaction fees provide running costs and profits to the operators, with a portion of the profit providing a cash flow recognised by financial institutions as a means to repay capital.
When the borrowed capital, serviced by the profit portion, is used to create an income producing enterprise, more sustainable jobs are created with a lifestyle change for the beneficiary participants.
No more begging for hand-outs and charity - help create the vehicle to fund self-empowerment, whilst the world at large benefits from the reduction in costs related to cash circulation.  
Each contributor will get the opportunity to use the MPM APP in their region, for a project of their choice that meets the "benefit to others" criteria. The operating rules will be made available to contributors.
Participation in the above amazing perk will be graded according to the contribution made, but every contributor can become involved.
The funding target will establish the highest commercial activity possible for MPM in South Africa, and give global exposure to the process and opportunity.
The global network of contributors will form the core of other networks and provide a platform for self funding philanthropy.
I have personally provided the funding for the MPM process and earlier knowledge gaining pro-bono activities, and will continue funding the South African launch of MPM, regardless of the response from contributors.
The contributors will MAKE IT HAPPEN globally, empowering themselves and others.
A website, currently under construction, will provide continuous updates on projects benefiting from the MPM method.

story:
Dead Cell Virus, Open world voxel post-apocalypse state

*Feedback is Critical, I would love to know what to add an what to change, This game is for the experience of the Player and with your help I can Improve this game to the player's liking!

05:55 On 19th Aug 2002... That was the day the earth stood still. Terrorists of unknown decent ignited thousands of Bio-Chemical Warheads in majorly populated Areas of the world.
London, Washington, Paris, Moscow, they're all gone... The earth's population dropped by the billions over night, The chemical introduced an unknown and currently incurable Infection which slowly eats at the persons nerve system giving them no pain, while it spreads like wild fire throughout the body, Infecting the persons motor skills, thought process, and unquenchable hunger, After a couple days you lose all control, and you.... are not you...

You are one of the few who have survived and now you must search this new wasteland
in order to fight for your life against what is left of the indigenous population,
now infected with the disease.

Go Solo, team up with friends to take on the world as you choose your path in this brutal
and chilling landscape using whatever means you stumble upon to survive.

Build! Craft! Fight! Play with your friends!

If you have any questions about the game feel free to email me
Email: Tycki.jacob@gmail.com

Summary
State: Alpha – Active Development
Developer: Soulwraith Games
Location: Hamilton, Ontario, Canada,
Game Type: First person, multiplayer, survival
Platforms: Windows, Linux, Mac OSX
Regular Price: n/a
Engine: Unity 5

story:
Cool Cuke Pin

Being an avid collector of enamel pins, I originally made this pin as a whim. This was just a little project for me. However, in light of recent events, I've made the decision to make this pin not for profit. All proceeds of this pin will go to TWLOHA (To Write Love On Her Arms), a wonderful charity that provides hope and help to people struggling with depression, addiction, self-injury, and suicide.

The Cool Cuke Pin is 1.25" soft enamel pin with a rubber backing. They will be produced by a third party. I will be paying for production of the pins out of my own pocket. ALL campaign funds will be donated to TWLOHA.

THIS IS A PRE-ORDER, SO PINS WILL BE PRODUCED AFTER CAMPAIGN ENDS. Please allow time for shipping. Thank you for being generous and spreading love! <3

story:
About Us

We are two geeks from Eastern Europe who are fond of modding games.

Previously, we have already made a bunch of maps that reached the top of CS:GO Steam Workshop.

 

      Jarro, 19, the idea & scripting & level-design

Steam & Youtube links

  • Have been making custom games modifications since childhood
  • Made 'Zombie Survival 2015' map (726k subscribers)
  • Made 'Truck Wars' map (320k subscribers)
  • Made Tetris for CS:GO in 3 days

 

      CTX, 23, level-design

Steam & Youtube links

  • Is famous for many of his co-op maps
  • Made 'coop_mission_haunted' map (642k subscribers)
  • Made 'coop_mission_rush' map (1m subscribers)
  • There is a rumor that Valve team has implemented official co-op update just because of his successful maps

 

 

Our Goals and Why do we need financial support?

As Steam Workshop offers no payment even for topnotch maps, we need your support to:

  • 400$: Host dedicated servers to make possible 24/7 testing of new updates and playing our maps directly with the community together.
  • 700$: Expand the levels along with our vision to make them as cinematic and superior as possible with the involvement of other professional mappers and modellers.
  • 1000$: Make our own maps soundtrack and trailer.

 

 

Concept x Gameplay

An idea of making western maps full of horse chases, dynamic shootouts and large areas of classical Wild West setting was inspired by observing plenty of movies (e.g. The Hateful Eight, 3:10 to Yuma), TV shows (e.g.Westworld) and games (e.g. Red Dead Redemption). We also want to gracefully expand somewhat dull and boring gameplay of ordinary CS:GO.

At this moment, we consider the following concepts of our western-themed maps:

  • Big Player vs. Player map
  • 'cs_'-like styled gamemode with hostage and 2 teams
  • Cooperative map with cutscenes and linear gameplay

All of them will include different types of transport and various features.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Development Process     

We may face a couple of problems and bugs related to Source Engine lying under CS:GO, as we did earlier (and subsequently overcame).

One of the biggest challenges was to correctly implement working vehicles (as noone has ever done it before for CS:GO), including horses, wagons and carriages

And nevertheless, we are making every building to look authentic

 

It will take some time (6-8 weeks) to end up with great results. Probably, we will be lucky to release our first Western-themed map in 3 weeks or even less!

We are open to your ideas and concepts!

 

 

Questions & Answers    

 

Q. Do these maps require a dedicated server to work properly? 
A. They don't. We optimize our maps so that they can be launched on any server - both from the default lobby (vanilla CS:GO), and a dedicated server. 

Q. Do you really want $1000 for a CS:GO map? 
A. For multiple Western-themed maps with unique features, such as vehicles. 

Q. Why Flexible Funding? Are maps going to be released anyway? 
A. The maps are going to released regardless of how successful the campaign is. But the more support we get, the more time we can spend on making the maps, and the more awesome they are going to be. We hope that the community who are familiar with our previous maps, as well as those who are simply interested in the project, could help us in creating and testing maps which require a large investment of time and effort on our part. 

Q. Does renting a server really cost $400? 
A. Hosting a public server with 32 players and Teamspeak slots for 1 month costs around $40, while hosting three such servers (US/EU/RU) for 4 months will cost approximately $480. 

Q. How can I be sure that development process is going well? 
A. We update our Indiegogo campaign at least every three days, so that you can see the progress. 

Q.  I have concerns/questions/suggestions, how can I contact you?

A. You are very welcome to contact us at E-mail

story:
Cyber Unity is a game with an attitude. It’s all about what humans are already coming in contact with and what may come to pass in the near future. The game is imbued with an atmosphere of a technocratic future and the energy of human superpowers.

Controlling the two protagonists in each of the four corporations ensures the dynamics of the gaming processes. The player characters’ ability of to travel to a parallel universe provides additional possibilities both to replenish the energy resource and influence opponents.

Online battles, narrative and daily missions, and the PvP mode create a special atmosphere of sustained interest and anticipation.

The turn-based combat strategy always allows enough time to think out the next move while maintaining the sense of freedom of movement of regular role-playing games.

The Cyber Unity team has been working on the project for thirteen months now and the game will be released on the market in December 2016 with its well-established ideas of turn-based strategies. We have taken risks to show the whole world our vision of the game because we believe in our ideas and are certain that they will be adopted and appreciated by the gaming community. The development of the project is almost over. Crowdfunding is yet another opportunity for us to promote the game and raise money for marketing. However, we are not going to remain indebted, and we will offer gamers the opportunity to acquire in-game bonuses, free PvP subscription and much more at a special price. The game was developed by a team of professionals who are passionate about their work, excited about their creation and its future users. This passion has fed into the game and is behind the game’s extraordinary effect. After completing just a couple of missions, you will be captured by the game’s atmosphere, and after a while the thoughts and feelings produced by the game will slowly make their way into your real life. And to good effect for that matter! We are genuinely delighted at the opportunity to communicate via the game with a vast community, and will stop at nothing to make that communication a happy and mutually beneficial one!

story:
In the meantime I am working really hard on the design and on in game mechanics. Now I have a prototype of the game and I hope to turn it into a complete game.

I chose IndieGoGo because it's a very open funding platform, and I hope to raise enough money to make a fully functional Single Player for our game.

Software: Help me afford the essential software needed for pushing this game forward.

Music & Audio: I will hire compositor to compose a full fledged soundtrack to the game.

Animators: I will hire high qualified animators to help me provide characters with proper animation. I want you to be able to feel the ENTOR Breakout universe.

Programmers: In order to do a proper single player game you need good A.I and lore. I have extremely innovative ideas on improving A.I beyond what you have seen in traditional games, and good things take time to develop.

Translators: The PC version of ENTOR Breakout should be fully localized into English.

Polish: I generally don't like releasing anything unless it has undergone a lot of polish. So your money will also go to making everything the best it can be.

I've decided to use IndieGoGo because I feel I can only innovate without barriers by remaining independent. I enjoy communicating directly with you and I love all your ideas for the game. This is what makes developing games so special to me, it's fun, it's innovative, I get to share with you, and I feel the need to create.


The main character is a woman, named Sandra she is an engineer, who is trapped in a space station.

Space station is filled by dangerous “security” droids, creatures, and some humans.

The objective of the game is to uncover the mystery of the space station and escape it alive.

To fulfill the game's objective, the player needs to uncover various documents that provide data about ingame lore, as well as clues that will help solving various puzzles within the space station.

The carrying capacity of the player is limited. Character items that the player does not wish to carry at the moment can be stored into an item shelter to be retrieved for later use.

To save their progress, the player must pick up a “data drive” and use it on any of the computer terminals scattered through checkpoint locations in the game.

However, the supply of a “data drives” player can acquire is limited, much like the player's ammo and healing supplies.

Players will encounter and fight various enemies: security droids and unseen creatures…

To restore the character's health, player needs to use first-aid sprays

Key items are also available that give the player access to other items or new areas.

Player can arm the character with weapons to defend herself from enemies, although the ammunition available for each firearm is limited and the player must learn to save ammo for situations where it is really needed.


The game begins on November 7, year 2057, when humans were already starting to explore the galaxy more easily. Humans have expanded their knowledge and have started to explore new resources on other planets.

Space explorers team “Fiza” was exploring the galaxy and was hit by small asteroid rain which done some serious damage to the spaceship. “Fiza” team started looking for nearest space station to get parts and repairs. Commander knew that all spare parts stations were too far, and the closest private space station to their location was named “EVE” which was under the authority of company “Scorpion3D”. But this station looked like it was abandoned for some time…

“Fiza” team did not have many choices, so they were trying to reach “EVE” as soon as possible. “Fiza” crew decided to land on “EVE” and start searching for required or adoptable parts in order fix the spaceship, unfortunately the spaceship was damaged badly and started to fall into pieces. The team was trying to reach evacuation pod’s section. After first evacuation pod launch the ship got engulfed in flames and everything exploded. No one from the crew survived. Sandra’s evacuation pod was damaged badly. Sandra was in space a few kilometers away from “EVE” and in few minutes time she reached “EVE” safely.

While Sandra was trying to figure out how to fix the damaged evacuation pod, and send the “SOS” message. A “mechanical sound” rings out, and Sandra moves to investigate. At this point, Player takes control of the character and begins to explore the “EVE”.  By exploring the station she realizes that the station is fully operational. While searching the area for further clues, Sandra is attacked by a “security” droid…

After the fight with security droid Sandra finds one of the first discoveries - there is a main computer named “R.I.F”. In order to gather more information from the “RIF” Sandra needs to fix the “RIF”, as computer is informing about malware and virus existence on the operating system. It is disabling almost all functionality of the “RIF”.

While searching the station, Sandra finds a human body and a communications transmitter near it. Sandra eventually finds the “EVE” station to be riddled with puzzles, traps, and horrors. Scattered documents suggest that a series of experiments were being taken under the authority and supervision of the nanotechnology and weapon technology company “Scorpion3D”. The samples have been taken from unknown planet named “Entor”. After these experiments the scientists got exposed to samples and everything gone terribly wrong.

After navigating a series of station blocks Sandra discovers a laboratory which contains  new types of weapons unseen by human eyes.

In there she will find the operating system for the “RIF”. 

In the lab Sandra gathers information about the planet “Entor” and more clues about planet’s location coordinates. “Scorpion3D” corporation is covering all tracks about this planet.

In the next game block Sandra finds the broken and ripped open security droids, aggressive organic creatures which are attacking her. During the battle previous levels will be damaged and Sandra cannot get back. She needs to look for another way to go back to the “RIF”

Sandra is back on track on the primary quest and  should look for the parts to fix the evacuation pod. Exploring continues …..

Free updates for ever:
Everyone who contributes to our IndieGoGo will receive the game of Entor BreakOut and all of its updates free, forever until the final release! I plan on developing it over the next couple years yet, so there is much more to come.

Special Unique Content On First Week of Campaign:

Certain tiers reward you with special unique content. This content is cosmetic only, but it will be desirable and look good when it is released. We plan to make and release this content when the game is done.  BADGE relevant to your perk!

50000 eur.

Only first episode of the game will be created from planned total of six episodes. As a lone warrior in the battlefield is just a lone warrior. In any case, this amount and more of the money will be spent on software licenses as in this stage I need tools with no restrictions to complete this work. No worries, it is my dream to tell you this story. That means I will never give up until I see it fully completed.

125000 eur.

We all have families and friends, and I am very lucky that my friends know about game programming, animation, and give their best to help complete the game. But they have their own jobs and cannot fully commit to the project. They  don't believe that people like you could help me to lure them to reach the game's full functionality and potential. In any case, I could perform such tasks myself, but I don't have a clone machine for multiplying myself.

300000 eur.

If You will help me reach this amount, all development team would be built and  work on the project full-time. I believe in other people and I trust that they can achieve something great.


350000 eur.

ADDITIONAL WEAPONS, ARMORS!

400000 eur.

CHARACTERS LEVELING SYSTEM!

450000 eur.

PET DRONE (SIDE KICK)

500000 eur.

MULTIPLAYER MODE!


With ENTOR BreakOut, my goal is to create a 1st 3rd person type of adventure game, which includes an inherent risk. Video game development is not an easy thing. It can be difficult to predict the stumbling blocks even in the best case scenario, so is with new project as ENTOR BreakOut.

So even if you can’t afford to contribute yourself, you can still win this copy of the game if you manage to shepherd in the most money through your own connections and campaigning.

!!!!!!!!! TAKE YOUR FREE GAME!!!!!!!!!!


The more noise we make, the more money we’ll raise, and the more likely this campaign will keep Entor BreakOut and its community growing.
Help share this campaign on your social networks and other medias, so that more people will know about this campaign. As this game is also trying to make its way onto Steam.

We’ll be awarding persons whoever brings the most contributions in using IndieGoGo’s sharing tools.


The true power of crowdfunding is the possibility to include you, the ones we are making this game for, in the development process. This section will be filled as the campaign progresses. All this project is currently managed by me. So, if you have any concerns, don't hesitate to contact me. I will be glad to answer! You can find me via: FaceBook, Twitter, WebSite.
story_txt:
In the meantime I am working really hard on the design and on in game mechanics. Now I have a prototype of the game and I hope to 
turn it into a complete game.I chose IndieGoGo because it's a very open funding platform, and I 
hope to raise enough money to make a fully functional Single Player for our game. Software: Help me afford the essential software needed for pushing this game forward.Music & Audio: I will hire compositor to compose a full fledged soundtrack to the game. Animators: I will hire high qualified animators to help me provide characters with proper animation. I want you to be able to feel the ENTOR Breakout universe.Programmers: In order to do a proper single player 
game you need good A.I and lore. I have extremely innovative ideas on 
improving A.I beyond what you have seen in traditional games, and good 
things take time to develop.Translators: The PC version of ENTOR Breakout should be fully localized into English.Polish: I generally don't like releasing anything 
unless it has undergone a lot of polish. So your money will also go to 
making everything the best it can be.
I've decided to use IndieGoGo because I feel I can only innovate 
without barriers by remaining independent. I enjoy communicating 
directly with you and I love all your ideas for the game. This is what 
makes developing games so special to me, it's fun, it's innovative, I 
get to share with you, and I feel the need to create.

The main character is a
woman, named Sandra she is an engineer, who is trapped in a space station.
Space station is filled
by dangerous “security” droids, creatures, and some humans.
The objective of the
game is to uncover the mystery of the space station and escape it alive. 
To fulfill the game's
objective, the player needs to uncover various documents that provide data
about ingame lore, as well as clues that will help solving various puzzles
within the space station.
The carrying capacity of
the player is limited. Character items that the player does not wish to carry
at the moment can be stored into an item shelter to be retrieved for later use.

To save their progress,
the player must pick up a “data drive” and use it on any of the computer
terminals scattered through checkpoint locations in the game. 
However, the supply of a
“data drives” player can acquire is limited, much like the player's ammo and
healing supplies.
Players will encounter
and fight various enemies: security droids and unseen creatures…
To restore the
character's health, player needs to use first-aid sprays
Key items are also
available that give the player access to other items or new areas.
Player can arm the
character with weapons to defend herself from enemies, although the ammunition
available for each firearm is limited and the player must learn to save ammo
for situations where it is really needed. 

The
game begins on November 7, year 2057, when humans were already starting to
explore the galaxy more easily. Humans have expanded their knowledge and have
started to explore new resources on other planets.
Space
explorers team “Fiza” was exploring the galaxy and was hit by small asteroid
rain which done some serious damage to the spaceship. “Fiza” team started
looking for nearest space station to get parts and repairs. Commander knew that
all spare parts stations were too far, and the closest private space station to
their location was named “EVE” which was under the authority of company
“Scorpion3D”. But this station looked like it was abandoned for some time…
“Fiza”
team did not have many choices, so they were trying to reach “EVE” as soon as
possible. “Fiza” crew decided to land on “EVE” and start searching for required
or adoptable parts in order fix the spaceship, unfortunately the spaceship was
damaged badly and started to fall into pieces. The team was trying to reach
evacuation pod’s section. After first evacuation pod launch the ship got
engulfed in flames and everything exploded. No one from the crew survived.
Sandra’s evacuation pod was damaged badly. Sandra was in space a few kilometers
away from “EVE” and in few minutes time she reached “EVE” safely. 
While
Sandra was trying to figure out how to fix the damaged evacuation pod, and send
the “SOS” message. A “mechanical sound” rings out, and Sandra moves to
investigate. At this point, Player takes control of the character and begins to
explore the “EVE”.  By exploring the
station she realizes that the station is fully operational. While searching the
area for further clues, Sandra is attacked by a “security” droid…
After
the fight with security droid Sandra finds one of the first discoveries - there
is a main computer named “R.I.F”. In order to gather more information from the
“RIF” Sandra needs to fix the “RIF”, as computer is informing about malware and
virus existence on the operating system. It is disabling almost all
functionality of the “RIF”.
While
searching the station, Sandra finds a human body and a communications
transmitter near it. Sandra eventually finds the “EVE” station to be riddled
with puzzles, traps, and horrors. Scattered documents suggest that a series of
experiments were being taken under the authority and supervision of the
nanotechnology and weapon technology company “Scorpion3D”. The samples have been taken from unknown planet named
“Entor”. After these experiments the scientists got exposed to samples and
everything gone terribly wrong.
After
navigating a series of station blocks Sandra discovers a laboratory which
contains  new types of weapons unseen by
human eyes.
In
there she will find the operating system for the “RIF”.  
In
the lab Sandra gathers information about the planet “Entor” and more clues
about planet’s location coordinates. “Scorpion3D”
corporation is covering all tracks about this planet. 
In
the next game block Sandra finds the broken and ripped open security droids,
aggressive organic creatures which are attacking her. During the battle
previous levels will be damaged and Sandra cannot get back. She needs to look
for another way to go back to the “RIF”
Sandra
is back on track on the primary quest and 
should look for the parts to fix the evacuation pod. Exploring continues
…..


Free updates for ever:Everyone
who contributes to our IndieGoGo will receive the game of Entor BreakOut
and all of its updates free, forever until the final release! I plan on
developing it over the next couple years yet, so there is much more to come.
Special Unique Content On First Week of Campaign:
Certain tiers reward you with special unique content. This
content is cosmetic only, but it will be desirable and look good when it is
released. We plan to make and release this content when the game is done.  BADGE relevant to your perk!

story:
Alice Running in Wonderworld is expected to be in development for Android and iOS. 

What's Alice Running?

Alice Running is one of the outstanding series by QvQ Studio.

We first launched Alice Running in Wonderland few years ago. With Alice, who has two big sluggish eyes called “dead fish eyes”. Players have to help her to get her favorable cakes with basic tap and slide. For command her to attack and jump. To defend all the blocking or enemies.

Two years later, we launched Alice Running Adventure. It updated to 3D. She can explore this amazing land, to find her favorable cake in 3D. There are more than 150 stages for helping Alice reaches her dream. Player also help her to solve all things faced in this area.

Now the VR (Virtual Reality) era is here. We have planned to launch Alice Running in VR. The first step we have already published Alice Running VR Edition. This is a Demo of Alice Running in Wonderworld. Next , we want to publish on more powerful platforms.

For more powerful platforms, we need more resource. We already collected a lot of experience on building 2D and 3D games. New resource can help us on increasing more contents, to reach more platforms and giving player more fun. That is the Alice Running we wanna build.

How to Play

Player act as Alice, control her running, flying and many other skills to reach the goal. Alice have a lot of skills to help her. Like attack, moving object....

The world provide a lot of items, to give her many different upgrade. For example, it makes her bigger or smaller. It may give advantage to her. But sometime, it is a disadvantage.

There are a number of stages waiting for player complete. Those stages have a lot of different targets and secrets. Player may play again the completed stages. To find out and reach all of these.

You can now download the Alice Running VR Edition (Demo) via following links:

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/hu/app/alice-running-vr-edition/id1092958125

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

What you can see in this Alice Running in Wonderworld:

  • Use Cardboard to run the game with VR. Connect with controller, you can join this Wonderworld.
    To have a full VR experience on the following Video. You need to wear Cardboard withYouTube app: https://youtu.be/RDKiPoiClzA

  • More costume can be unlocked for Alice.


  • A new created Alice modules, near high end quality.


  • VR will not be just 3D and watch around, players can have more interaction with Alice.


  • An upgraded flying experience will be added on the final version


  • You will experience consistent between each stage of adventure in Wonderland.


  • A live indicator with show how is the status and HP got.


  • New NPC will join the party, not matter it is friend or foe. They will help player to complete the story.


  • Continuous attacking, moving objects and more. Alice learned a lot of new actions.


  • You want to meet the Heart Queen? Don’t worry, she will join this story.


  • Even companies or enemies, new unique characters will join the game.


  • You got lost in the demo. We will guide you.


  • The flying stone is not just for decoration. Now you can stand on it.

  • Cakes are coming big? No, it is because of you became small.

Development Timeline

Additional Bonus with Additional Support

  • You can choice one of these Cardboards.

  • The 3D Paper Doll you can play in real life.
