story:
In the middle of a warlike conflict, the military has made strange choices. A boy tries to rescue his sister after their home is assaulted. Explore the ambient and talk to people to solve puzzles but be careful, enemies will hear your moves and go find you. You are a child, so it’s all about being witty and sneaky.

But wait... What is Anthem of Roses? What’s the name of the main character? Where is his sister? Why does everything looks so sad and dark? The list of mysteries goes on and on, so watch your steps and don't miss any clue to find out!

Itch.io | IndieDB | Gamejolt

We've been featured by indieDB on their headlines and also by Gamejolt on the adventure genre. We thank all the community for the great comments and ratings, hope you really enjoy Anthem of Roses, and we're glad to give you an updated version with bugs fixed and enhancements you've recommended us for making a better alpha-demo. 

                              

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • FRENCH: Restons Silencieux! - By Eagle Tale
  • ENGLISH: Stealth is your ally! - By Fellow Player
  • RUSSIAN: Прохождение на русском - By Leroi Ru
  • PORTUGUESE: Brincando de esconde esconde - By Criaturaestranh
  • ITALIAN: Non facciamoci sentire! - By Joki
  • Anthem of Roses Gameplay (demo) - By Razoor Boom
  • Run run - By Buff Daddy
  • Don't get caught - By Mathusnotfun
  • I suck at stealth!!! - By RadiCarl
  • Oh my gosh! - By Richeefer
  • Don't get caught! - By Cryptic Hybrid
  • Child Killer - By Toasty Jack
  • Anthem of Roses Alpha Demo Walkthrough Gameplay - By Media Games Guide
  • They got my sister...now they want me?! - By Gucci Sama
  • These dudes need to chill! - By Syphonator
  • Stealth is bae - By UltimaximWolf
  • Thats just a pig with a beret!!- By Jar of Pickles Productions
  • SHHH I'm hunting wabbits - By War Mc Killer
  • Super Sneeeky - By Spoonage
  • Anthem of Roses | early acces demo | playthrought - By JustHeather 
  • Make one sound, and you're dead - By StrikerGamez
  • The kid didn't stand a chance - By BleezeBoob
  • A cartoon apocalypse - By Padre Snowmizzle
  • I suck at stealth - By Mr Morose

  • Be Sneaky!  - By Xtreme Playthru

 

 

 

 

  • Anthem of Roses will be published on Steam for PC gamers and in a free DRM platform.
  • Languages available for text dialogues: English and Spanish.
  • Keyboard and controller support.
  • Music made with East West Sound Libraries and UHE Synths.
  • Made on Unity 3D.

  • Anthem of Roses will be published for Mac, Linux and IOS.
  • Languages added for text dialogues: Portuguese, French, and Russian.

  • Anthem of Roses will be published for XBOX ONE.
  • Languages added to text diaologues: Korean, Japanese, and German.

 

Daniel Mauricio Porras Bulla - Developer

Hi,  I’m a generalist video game developer from Colombia. I have knowdledge on all the aspects of making a video game, certified by different educational institutions and companies I’ve worked for. Although I consider myself autodidact.  You are helping me change my life, making a great future for my family, I will always remember the people who helped me making AOR come true :)

 

Lina Fernanda Ramírez Lamprea - Marketing

Hi, I’m a graphic designer from Colombia, I have 3 years of experience working on websites administration, graphic design and community management. I’m glad to support Daniel on the development of this project; I’ll be here posting news frequently and answering your questions.

 

 

Daniel Ferrán Porras Ramírez - The Boss

Hi, I’m Daniel Ferran, I'm 1 year old from Colombia, my job it’s to make my parents smile whenever they are stress out and remind them this must get done and hurry up. Also I like playing music and videogames too. 

 

 

 

I started the development of Anthem of Roses on 2012 by the name of Metrox Evolution Studios. At first it was made on 2D using Macromedia flash 8, ActionScript2, but then the software was suddenly very incompatible and that stopped the project at 70% of it's development on Spanish. At the beginning the soundtrack used the standard midi sound library, it had a 16 bit videogame sound, now I have great tools to remaster it, I’m looking forward to use the East West Sound Libraries, also now I have licenses to use professional synthesizers like UHE DIVA. Watch the 2012 alpha version here.

In 2014 I received a proposal from Bulkypix for publishing the game, but I declined this opportunity since the game was made on Macromedia flash 8 and they wanted to publish this for IOS.

At that time I tough I could make a version on 2.5D, and I decided to do it on Unity. Later on 2016 I worked on a version with a toon / cell shading style, but still the art didn't work as I expected and 3D basic art was way too far from the original idea.  

Over the years I’ve learned a lot on videogames developing. Now the game could be released on PC, Ios, Mac and Linux and even consoles. 

The game would be developed on Unity 2017 other software implied is Maya, Mudbox, Adobe Suite, Guitar Pro, Cantabile, Audacity and sound libraries.

Checkout out some Anthem of Roses tracks on Soundcloud (some of this tracks are on the current Alpha Demo):

 

 

 

Get the news on how this indie videogame becomes a reality, every week on gamejolt and indieDB! Posts will be on our website blog and videos on our youtube channel too. We’ll let you know about the struggles and achivements on the journey of making Anthem of Roses.  

 

 

 $10.000 dollars is enough money to make a video game? 
Living in Tibasosa, Colombia is way cheaper than living in the United States or Europe, almost 2/3 cheaper. We work at home, and the team is pretty small, so yes, basically that's all we need.

Are 8 months enough for making the game?
The story of the game, dialogues, basics of game design, player controller, basics of AI (artificial intelligence), soundtrack midi compositions (to be remastered with professional sound libraries) and concept art it’s already done.  We also have an alpha demo you can play on gamejolt, itchio or indieDB.
 

Thank you for reading this!
story_txt:
In the middle of a warlike conflict, the military has made strange choices. A boy tries to rescue his sister after their home is assaulted. Explore the ambient and talk to people to solve puzzles but be careful, enemies will hear your moves and go find you. You are a child, so it’s all about being witty and sneaky.But wait... What is Anthem of Roses? What’s the name of the main character? Where is his sister? Why does everything looks so sad and dark? The list of mysteries goes on and on, so watch your steps and don't miss any clue to find out!Itch.io | IndieDB | GamejoltWe've been featured by indieDB on their headlines and also by Gamejolt on the adventure genre. We thank all the community for the great comments and ratings, hope you really enjoy Anthem of Roses, and we're glad to give you an updated version with bugs fixed and enhancements you've recommended us for making a better alpha-demo.                                                                 
FRENCH: Restons Silencieux! - By Eagle Tale

ENGLISH: Stealth is your ally! - By Fellow Player

RUSSIAN: Прохождение на русском - By Leroi Ru

PORTUGUESE: Brincando de esconde esconde - By Criaturaestranh

ITALIAN: Non facciamoci sentire! - By Joki

Anthem of Roses Gameplay (demo) - By Razoor Boom
Run run - By Buff Daddy
Don't get caught - By Mathusnotfun
I suck at stealth!!! - By RadiCarl
Oh my gosh! - By Richeefer
Don't get caught! - By Cryptic Hybrid
Child Killer - By Toasty Jack
Anthem of Roses Alpha Demo Walkthrough Gameplay - By Media Games Guide
They got my sister...now they want me?! - By Gucci Sama
These dudes need to chill! - By Syphonator
Stealth is bae - By UltimaximWolf
Thats just a pig with a beret!!- By Jar of Pickles Productions
SHHH I'm hunting wabbits - By War Mc Killer
Super Sneeeky - By Spoonage
Anthem of Roses | early acces demo | playthrought - By JustHeather 
Make one sound, and you're dead - By StrikerGamez
The kid didn't stand a chance - By BleezeBoob
A cartoon apocalypse - By Padre Snowmizzle
I suck at stealth - By Mr Morose
Be Sneaky!  - By Xtreme Playthru
   
 
Anthem of Roses will be published on Steam for PC gamers and in a free DRM platform.
Languages available for text dialogues: English and Spanish.
Keyboard and controller support.
Music made with East West Sound Libraries and UHE Synths.
Made on Unity 3D.

Anthem of Roses will be published for Mac, Linux and IOS.
Languages added for text dialogues: Portuguese, French, and Russian.

Anthem of Roses will be published for XBOX ONE.
Languages added to text diaologues: Korean, Japanese, and German.
 Daniel Mauricio Porras Bulla - DeveloperHi,  I’m a generalist video game developer from Colombia. I have knowdledge on all the aspects of making a video game, certified by different educational institutions and companies I’ve worked for. Although I consider myself autodidact.  You are helping me change my life, making a great future for my family, I will always remember the people who helped me making AOR come true :) Lina Fernanda Ramírez Lamprea - MarketingHi, I’m a graphic designer from Colombia, I have 3 years of experience working on websites administration, graphic design and community management. I’m glad to support Daniel on the development of this project; I’ll be here posting news frequently and answering your questions.  Daniel Ferrán Porras Ramírez - The BossHi, I’m Daniel Ferran, I'm 1 year old from Colombia, my job it’s to make my parents smile whenever they are stress out and remind them this must get done and hurry up. Also I like playing music and videogames too.    I started the development of Anthem of Roses on 2012 by the name of Metrox Evolution Studios. At first it was made on 2D using Macromedia flash 8, ActionScript2, but then the software was suddenly very incompatible and that stopped the project at 70% of it's development on Spanish. At the beginning the soundtrack used the standard midi sound library, it had a 16 bit videogame sound, now I have great tools to remaster it, I’m looking forward to use the East West Sound Libraries, also now I have licenses to use professional synthesizers like UHE DIVA. Watch the 2012 alpha version here.In 2014 I received a proposal from Bulkypix for publishing the game, but I declined this opportunity since the game was made on Macromedia flash 8 and they wanted to publish this for IOS.At that time I tough I could make a version on 2.5D, and I decided to do it on Unity. Later on 2016 I worked on a version with a toon / cell shading style, but still the art didn't work as I expected and 3D basic art was way too far from the original idea.  Over the years I’ve learned a lot on videogames developing. Now the game could be released on PC, Ios, Mac and Linux and even consoles. The game would be developed on Unity 2017 other software implied is Maya, Mudbox, Adobe Suite, Guitar Pro, Cantabile, Audacity and sound libraries.Checkout out some Anthem of Roses tracks on Soundcloud (some of this tracks are on the current Alpha Demo):   Get the news on how this indie videogame becomes a reality, every week on gamejolt and indieDB! Posts will be on our website blog and videos on our youtube channel too. We’ll let you know about the struggles and achivements on the journey of making Anthem of Roses.     $10.000 dollars is enough money to make a video game? Living in Tibasosa, Colombia is way cheaper than living in the United States or Europe, almost 2/3 cheaper. We work at home, and the team is pretty small, so yes, basically that's all we need.Are 8 months enough for making the game?The story of the game, dialogues, basics of game design, player controller, basics of AI (artificial intelligence), soundtrack midi compositions (to be remastered with professional sound libraries) and concept art it’s already done.  We also have an alpha demo you can play on gamejolt, itchio or indieDB. Thank you for reading this!

story:
About the game

Arcane galaxy is an MMO space strategy based in a persistent universe.

Discover new galaxies, stars, worlds, moons, and asteroids.
With 400 billion star systems to discover in a single galaxy, there are endless possibilities.

Choose where your empire will start:

  • Hide in distant sectors of the galaxy and bide your time, build your empire, expand your reach and when the time is right, attack your prey.
  • Make yourself known, build a coallition of many players, pursue knowledge and understanding creating a federation of worlds covering vast sections of the galaxy.
  • Go solo, do trade, become your own superpower and make sure everyone knows you are in charge.

No limits on what you can do

  • Expand by colonizing new worlds and terraform uninhabitable planets, mine those planets and extract resources to drive your empire and fuel your conquests.
  • Fortify and defend your colonies
  • Discover other players, make allies, make enemies,
  • Explore the galaxies to discover resources, technology, and even abandoned ships.
  • Research new technologies, expand your empire's understanding of the universe and become a galactic superpower.

Welcome to Arcane Galaxy.

About me

Hello, I'm Russell, I have had a passion for sci-fi since a very young age, specifically space.  I really can't get enough of it. My profession is programming and I have been doing it for over 15 years. My hobbies include gaming, programming, 3d modelling, and sculpting, generally, my life revolves around a computer.

Development

I have been self-funding and developing this project and so far have reached an early pre-alpha stage.

The idea for this game has been floating around for a couple of years and I have been working on this game constantly for about 3 months.  The game is already in a playable state and currently published in a pre-alpha state on the android platform for testing. However, it will be multiplatform.

That being said it doesn't look pretty its has some very crude user interfaces with basic stock images, this is where your funding comes in.

Funding

  • I need images for all of the ships, buildings, and technology in-game
  • I need 3D models of the ships, buildings
  • I need high-quality textures

Any funds raised will go toward getting professional artists to produce high-quality images, models and textures.

Schedule

  1. October - pre-alpha
    1. ​Building mines, storage, energy, and advanced facilities.
    2. Building ships and defence
    3. Discovering technology
    4. Colonizing other worlds
    5. Transporting resources
    6. Attacking other players
  2. January - alpha
    1. ​Creating outposts
    2. Terraforming
    3. Intercepting
    4. Alliance system
    5. Espionage mission
  3. April - Beta
    1. ​Additional galaxies
    2. Planet killers
    3. Intercept mission
    4. Trading (between players)
    5. Galactic trading (Galactic market place)
  4. August - Full release
    1. Exploration missions
    2. ​Moons
    3. Asteroids

Future - continuous improvements and features. (Suggestions and ideas are always welcome)

Get involved to prioritise the above list on what feature you want to see first.

A few more details of what the game has so far:

The Galaxies

The galaxies in Arcane Galaxy are procedurally generated and are 10,000 light-years, across and 100 light-years in depth.

Spiral galaxies with over four hundred billion stars, trillions of planets and moons to explore and colonize. Each star, planet, and moon is unique, each with the ability to colonize, extract resources or destroy.

Technology 

You will have the research technology in order to gain more advanced buildings, ships, and defence. The tech tree will expand with the game adding new technologies to increase the game's scope. Technology ranges from simple chemical combustion to be able to tear holes in subspace and wormholes.

The ships

  • Espionage Probe
    • Send these probes to colonized worlds to discover the secrets of that planet and that player.
  • Light fighter, Heavy fighter, Cruiser, Battleship, Battlecruiser, Bomber, Destroyer, Dreadnought, and the Planet killer
    • These are the ships that will defend the planets they are orbiting or escort your other ships to protect them while on other missions, send these ships to attack other players.
  • Small cargo / Large cargo
    • Transport resources from one planet to another or trade resource with other players.
  • Terraformer
    • Found a class of planet that you want to inhabit but can't, the terraform will convert the planet to a habitable world so you can send a colony ship to do the rest.
  • Colony ship
    • Send these ships to worlds you want to inhabit to expand your empires reach in the galaxies
  • Mining outpost
    • Send these to gas giants to mine massive amounts of resource quickly
  • Solar satellites
    • Struggling for power? These are sure to give your economy a power boost
  • Boarding vessel
    • You can use these to intercept other fleets that are passing through your sectors of space board them and capture them.
  • Shield node
    • These protect your planets orbiting them and creating a force shield protecting both your planet and orbiting satellites and ships. the more you have the stronger your shield.

The missions

  • Colonize
    • Sending a fleet to colonize a planet expanding your empire.
  • Terraform
    • Terraforming a planet so you can colonize it.
  • Espionage
    • Spying on other players to gain intel on their strength and weaknesses.
  • Trade
    • Trade with other players in the galaxy.
  • Transport
    • Transporting resource from one planet to another, feeling generous, donate some resources to another player.
  • Attack
    • Attack other players in the galaxy, decimate their fleets, take their resource, destroy their planets.
  • Intercept
    • Intercept players on other missions, intercept players before they reach you take the fight to them.
  • Siege
    • Siege a planet, pillage their resources prevent their trading squeeze their economy.
  • Expedition
    • Send a science vessel out into the depths of the galaxy, find resources, technology, ships, and other surprises.
  • Mining outpost.
    • Send this ship out to gas giants to harvest their massive resources faster than normal collection of resources.

You will be able to track incoming fleets both hostile and friendly as well as being able to track fleets passing through your sensor range.

Other ways you can help?

  • Become an alpha tester (for android)
    • Head over to www.arcanegalaxy.com and register your interest I will add you to the alpha testing list. 
  • Make suggestions for new features, report bugs.

  • Any good at graphics, 3d Modeling, Texture creation, Shaders?
    Give me a shout on how you think you could help.

Any questions give me a shout I will endeavour to answer all questions within 12 hours.

story:
Hero Of Not Our Time is a non-standard RPG combining elements of a text quest, a classic rogue-like and turn-based strategy. The player will have to move from the left side of the field to the right while slaying various monsters that get in the way. There will be times that will call for extremely cruel, sadistic and absurd ways to clear location after location. 

This whole bloody mess will be accompanied by dynamic soundtracks that will make you kill!

 

The player will be able to pay for things with his blood. Literally. If you are still not scared enough then the powerful bosses who will not let you get bored will make your life better :)

We were inspired by many games, such as:

  • Hotline Miami
  • Dark Souls
  • Half-Life
  • Risk of Rain
  • Doom
  • Snatcher
  • Terraria

 

 

  • Six powerful bosses that are waiting for you ;)


     
  • Original combat system


     

  • More than twenty different player powerups!
     
  • A custom weapon having many assembly combinations!
     

     

  • More than fifty merciless monsters that will not give you a pass
     


     

  • The design of the game is made in a pixel cyberpunk style. Feel youreself in a distant future of the interplanetary scale!
     
  • Blood stains, pieces of meat and basically all the red color - all that brings brutality to the game...
     


     

  • The use of occult *snap* magic!


     

  • Your every action is stored in the dialog box


     

  • The help of your brave pet :0
     
  • And many other...

We have almost completed the development of our game. We are making the final touches so that we do not disappoint your expectations!
Unfortunately, we do not have enough funds to release the game in STEAM and advertise it in all kinds of media, so we ask you to help us with this.
Initially, the game will be localized in English and Russian. However, we can add other languages if we can raise more funds. Here is our roadmap: 



The game is almost complete and will be released on PC for Steam. If the crowdfunding campaign manages to be completed on time, we can tell you the exact release date of the game. At the moment, we have scheduled a release in September.

If you cannot help us financially for some reason, then please tell your friends about us so that we can release the game as soon as possible.

 

Our team called «Comengage» consists of four ordinary enthusiasts, each of whom is always busy with his duties. The team was formed six months ago, when we set a clear goal - "Create a 2D game for PC with a tons of blood and dynamic retro-styled music."

Game development began around the end of March. Then only one person was engaged in it, after a while 3 more people who were interested in the project joined him.

Here are the members of our team:

  1. Vladimir Nilen - the author of the idea, the first developer, founder of the Comengage team. At first he was engaged in programming and design of monsters;
  2. Mark Brosalin - chief artist, draws sprites, designs locations, environments and the game interface;
  3. Andrey Kashnikov - master of programming, helps Vladimir with the creation of game mechanics;
  4. Murad Poladov - it's me ^^. I do sound design, write game soundtracks and draw illustrations;

story:
takes place in a world where artificially intelligent robots have been created to accompany and aid humans in all their endeavors. They have become so ubiquitous that children are paired with MEDABOTS that become their companions and friends throughout their lives. Their universality has also sprouted ROBATTLES, sanctioned MEDABOT battles that soon became a popular international sport. Grand sporting events are organized all around the world where participants compete to decide who is the best MEDAFIGHTER of all.

 

Wellcome to the new Medabots ERA.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our protagonist, the PLAYER is just about to embark in their MEDAFIGHTER journey at the beginning of the game. As it happens, the PLAYER CHARACTER is a child to a former WORLD ROBATTLE CHAMPION whose mother, REGINA, has until today forbidden the PLAYER from participating in ROBATTLES.

 

 

However, she has recently relented, feeling she can no longer hold back her child and give him enough money to get a basic model. It will be up to him to get better parts. You will have to defeat opponent by opponent in different levels.

 

 

At the CITY PARK, the PLAYER can begin challenging other MEDAFIGHTERS... Such as a school kid, a tourist, a businesswomen, a punk and many more.

 

 

After earning some experience and money battling in the PARK the PLAYER is ready to take on something more challenging. TERRI congratulates the PLAYER on his victories and points out the QUALIFIER for the MEDALYMPICS is just around the corner – he hopes the player is ready to face some serious opponents.

 

 

Also, TERRI mentions that probably the tougher MEDAFIGHTER the PLAYER will face is RENNARD, a local rich kid. RENNARD always gets his hand on the best parts available thanks to him being the son to one of the founders of ADS TECH, a MEDABOT parts manufacturer...

 

 

All the battles will be 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2 and 3 vs 3, depending on each level.

 

 

After the PLAYER wins the LOCAL QUALIFIER, he can participate in the coming REGIONAL MEDALYMPICS. However, there is still some time to defeat enemies before the MEDALYMPICS start. Both TERRI and CAMILA suggest going to CITY CENTER: several skilled MEDAFIGHTERS usually hang around the plaza seeking challengers, so you must get ready and practice before the MEDALYMPICS!

After earning some more experience, money and parts in the CITY CENTER, the PLAYER CHARACTER is ready to participate in the MEDALYMPICS: the biggest regional ROBATTLE event and the gateway into the professional stages of ROBATTLE.

 

 

Our protagonist, the PLAYER, will have an avatar which will earn XP points to increase levels. You will start your way to the biggest worldwide online tournament. You will be able to win positions and try to get to the top 1 global ranking!

 

 

You will start with 1 robot and you will be able to win pieces of new robots while you defeat Medabot battlers. These pieces are exchangeable and you can mix all the pieces between the robots to personalize your best robot.

Every piece can be leveled up but for that you will need to gain experience by fighting.

 

 

 

Our Medabots team are creating all the characters, robots, pieces, environments, animations, design from scratch, we hope you enjoy our work and you can find some of the art here:

 

 

 

 

 

Our audio designers and singers have participated in many projects, they have created all the sound effects, attack effects, animation sounds, our official song and many more high-quality original soundtracks for Medabots project from scratch.

 

 

 

We are a team of more than 15 people including developers, sound directors, singers, graphic designers, background designers, rig animators, UI animators, script writers, statisticians... Our team is formed by people who have worked for leading companies in game and movie industry.

 

 

 

 

The MEDABOTS game project started 3 years ago with an initial investment of more than 1.000.000€ and we would be interested in raising awareness around the world with a partner that can enjoy this wonderful MEDABOTS era with us. The money invested will be used for game improvements and advertising, and of course, new ideas will always be welcomed.     

 

 

We are in the final stages of MEDABOTS game creation, in about 4-5 months we will have our first final beta test.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Medabots is a registered trademark , all the source code, databases, functionalities, software, designs, audio, video, text, screenshots, graphics (collectively, the "Content")  service marks and logos contained therein (the "Marks") are controlled by us and they are protected by copyright and trademark laws and various intellectual property rights in international jurisdictions. Any unauthorized use of these Content and Marks will be prosecuted.

Wellcome to the new Medabots ERA.
 

 
 

 


 


 
Our protagonist, the PLAYER is just about to embark in their MEDAFIGHTER journey at the beginning of the game. As it happens, the PLAYER CHARACTER is a child to a former WORLD ROBATTLE CHAMPION whose mother, REGINA, has until today forbidden the PLAYER from participating in ROBATTLES.
 

 
However, she has recently relented, feeling she can no longer hold back her child and give him enough money to get a basic model. It will be up to him to get better parts. You will have to defeat opponent by opponent in different levels.
 

 
At the CITY PARK, the PLAYER can begin challenging other MEDAFIGHTERS... Such as a school kid, a tourist, a businesswomen, a punk and many more.
 

 
After earning some experience and money battling in the PARK the PLAYER is ready to take on something more challenging. TERRI congratulates the PLAYER on his victories and points out the QUALIFIER for the MEDALYMPICS is just around the corner – he hopes the player is ready to face some serious opponents.
 

 
Also, TERRI mentions that probably the tougher MEDAFIGHTER the PLAYER will face is RENNARD, a local rich kid. RENNARD always gets his hand on the best parts available thanks to him being the son to one of the founders of ADS TECH, a MEDABOT parts manufacturer...
 

 
All the battles will be 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2 and 3 vs 3, depending on each level.
 

 
After the PLAYER wins the LOCAL QUALIFIER, he can participate in the coming REGIONAL MEDALYMPICS. However, there is still some time to defeat enemies before the MEDALYMPICS start. Both TERRI and CAMILA suggest going to CITY CENTER: several skilled MEDAFIGHTERS usually hang around the plaza seeking challengers, so you must get ready and practice before the MEDALYMPICS!

After earning some more experience, money and parts in the CITY CENTER, the PLAYER CHARACTER is ready to participate in the MEDALYMPICS: the biggest regional ROBATTLE event and the gateway into the professional stages of ROBATTLE.

 

 
Our protagonist, the PLAYER, will have an avatar which will earn XP points to increase levels. You will start your way to the biggest worldwide online tournament. You will be able to win positions and try to get to the top 1 global ranking!
 

 
You will start with 1 robot and you will be able to win pieces of new robots while you defeat Medabot battlers. These pieces are exchangeable and you can mix all the pieces between the robots to personalize your best robot.
Every piece can be leveled up but for that you will need to gain experience by fighting.
 

 

 
Our Medabots team are creating all the characters, robots, pieces, environments, animations, design from scratch, we hope you enjoy our work and you can find some of the art here:
 

 

 
 

 
Our audio designers and singers have participated in many projects, they have created all the sound effects, attack effects, animation sounds, our official song and many more high-quality original soundtracks for Medabots project from scratch.
 
 

 
We are a team of more than 15 people including developers, sound directors, singers, graphic designers, background designers, rig animators, UI animators, script writers, statisticians... Our team is formed by people who have worked for leading companies in game and movie industry.
 

 

 

 
The MEDABOTS game project started 3 years ago with an initial investment of more than 1.000.000€ and we would be interested in raising awareness around the world with a partner that can enjoy this wonderful MEDABOTS era with us. The money invested will be used for game improvements and advertising, and of course, new ideas will always be welcomed.     
 

 
We are in the final stages of MEDABOTS game creation, in about 4-5 months we will have our first final beta test.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

Medabots is a registered trademark , all the source code, databases, functionalities, software, designs, audio, video, text, screenshots, graphics (collectively, the "Content")  service marks and logos contained therein (the "Marks") are controlled by us and they are protected by copyright and trademark laws and various intellectual property rights in international jurisdictions. Any unauthorized use of these Content and Marks will be prosecuted.

story:
Short Summary

Queenship Game Studio makes games about mental health. House of Echoes is a 3D adventure game that illustrates the experience of hallucinations, triggers, outcomes, and tools for symptom management.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to pay work hours for our team and for end-stage game distribution and production finishing. In addition to our thanks, donors who pledge a specific amount or more will receive a free game key for House of Echoes, and top donors will receive public thanks, a copy of the game, and a copy of our first ship, Open Spaces - A Visual Novel of Anxiety and Agoraphobia.

 

The Impact

The mental health crisis is a global concern. The biggest challenge, followed closely by stigma, is a lack of access to learning and management tools. Queenship's goal is to help address this lack of access with clinically-informed games and gamified mental health tools that can not only assist sufferers with symptom management but help their communities understand the challenges they face and support them more effectively.

Hallucinations are much more common than most suppose. They are often seen as a symptom with several different mental health diagnoses, including schizophrenia, clinical depression, post-traumatic stress disorder, and several others. House of Echoes is intended to be a disquieting journey through the realm of hallucination and to introduce management methods throughout the game for those who live with this symptom.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, there are other ways you can help:

  1. Share our Indiegogo campaign with your personal reasons for doing so. Tell people why this is important to you.
  2. Follow us on social media, share posts, engage with our team, and tell us what else you'd like to see.

Thank you in advance for your help!

story:
What You Need to Know

After the Titans is a deck-building card game in a 100 card closed set with all the game mechanics of collectible trading card games. An indie game by two game enthusiasts in Houston, the Core Set has been well received by local game shops and board & card gamers.

This is an all or nothing campaign to get our newly tested and approved Expansion Packs printed and in your hands, while sharing the fun of After the Titans with others. Pick up After the Titans© Core Set as one of our campaign perks.



What is After the Titans?

My name is Homer Carroll, and After the Titans© is my debut game. It spawned from my passion for collectible card games and the need to have a quick fun game that my non-gaming friends could learn easily without investing time and money to enjoy it. It has been so much fun sharing this game with friends and having complete strangers play it and want a copy on the spot.

After the Titans© is a themed gateway card drafting game. This game encompasses all the fun of deck building collectible card games, without the time and money investment found in similar games. Game play is designed to be brisk and competitive. The Core Set is made for 2-4 Devotees, and one game lasts approximately 5 minutes per Devotee.

  • Each deck includes the After the Titans© 100 Card Core Set & Instructions
  • Core Set Contents: 100 cards: 10 Zeus Spells, 10 Athena Spells, 10 Ares Spells, 10 Apollo Spells, 40 Worship Cards, and 20 Beast Spells.
  • Command beasts, summon mystical objects, and worship your gods to increase your power and cast spells to eliminate other Devotees.



What's in the Expansion Packs?

The After the Titans© Expansion Packs will add a total of seven gods, completing the Pantheon, and adding new abilities like drawing additional cards, stealing cards from Devotees, increasing the Boons produced for Worship, and protection from Spells and Beasts!

  • Expansion Pack Contents: 20 cards: 10 Spells, 5 Beasts, and 5 Worship Cards.
  • The new gods: Hermes, Hera, Poseidon, Aphrodite, Persephone, Hades, and Hephaestus.

Here's a peek at a few of the Expansion Pack cards from each new god.

  • Hephaestus, bitter and ostracized, makes himself a fortress to keep others out.
  • Poseidon allows Devotees to draw additional cards, greatly increasing the speed at which deadly force can be achieved.
  • Hermes, the thief and courier, shifts the score and perception of battle. The rules themselves are subject for dispute as long as Hermes is around.
  • Hades waits in darkness, capitalizing off the misfortune of others; feigning weakness to cozen his opponents into their own demise.
  • Aphrodite spreads love and beauty to all Devotees. Charity is so endearing that none stop to ask, "to what end?"
  • Hera, Queen of the Gods, takes what she desires as all things are hers to do with as she pleases.
  • Persephone yearns for growth. Her unquenched needs spawn forth abundance for all Devotees.

The Campaign Purpose

To launch the Expansion Packs, the printing must first be funded.  The bigger the order, the less it costs per pack of cards, which is what the money collected will go towards. Additionally, the amount of each Expansion Pack desired will provide information on how many of each to order.


Now What?

If you already enjoy After the Titans and want more gods, now is the time to add your sponsorship, helping us breach the time gap for producing expansions. If you haven't played it yet, this is the perfect time to grab a deck and further the game's development. You're going to want to play with the rest of the Pantheon!

Here's Other Ways to Support our Success:
- Share this campaign with others on Facebook, Twitter, and Forums & Groups

- Always share using the links on the campaign page

- Leave an enthusiastic comment on the campaign page

- Tell your friends why they should have After the Titans in their gaming collection.


Our first goal is to meet 25% of the campaign this first week to get the momentum needed to make this happen. Due to ordering requirements, this is an all or nothing campaign. If you want the Expansion Packs, we need you to share this campaign with your friends.

story:
Hello there!

I believe you may be interested about our work.
Hi, I am your passional typical gamer. I been working hard in this project since a while and I represent 8 wonderful co-workers that are giving their best to finally create our little company of games. We are going to create games for a Half and Full Dive Virtual Reality.. Yes Full Dive.. but how? we do not even have those technologies yet right?. Well we are developing that technology too.
We have been working on the games developing and we have three already: One Moba game, the typical Mmorpg and one Fps.
The project began with other two friends and me. Later we needed to contract more because of the heavy load of work.  Thanks to that we made more friends with our same passion.
One of our friends say this technology could help people and change the world but honestly, at least for me, I do it because of my passion for games. It depends on people and how they see the world, at the end its your decision.

Games, Technology and Synapse

Around two months ago we lost our financial support (my work) and we can still survive because of my savings. Our monthly payment is 200 dollars for each one (that includes me),  but still we are facing bigger problems because we were preparing to move our project to California (USA) and won't be possible in our actual situation. plus we wanted to contract 11 more people to be a team of 20 at least. 
Our actual "Art Team" its just one person and most of us repeat in our different teams. Most of us have other jobs and right now I am working to keep funding the project.
If you help us, we make the compromise of not charging to the donators any monthly fee and consider you for some special perks in-game in our three games.  from special clothes, special devices, special weapons with signs.. something you can show-off!, for those who donate a lot, we could meet you in person to thank you and more.
Currently we already made some improving to the headset design. In simple words to make it cheaper than other devices almost by half. We still need to adapt a lot of things and develop more, that is why we need your support.
Mapping the signals of the human is not simple, thats why we need to get more workers. Your resources will go to rent a place where we will open our offices, a place to work but too a place to live. If we live in the same house we can lower the living expenses and focus in work all days. We need a lot of material and devices to help us.
Traveling to check new technologies to keep our device updated its hard when you have low budget.  But if we do not reach our goal or get any sponsor,  we will still use the resources to keep going and try our best. We are not surrendering because this is our passion and we believe in this.  Right now we are preparing everything and we hope to have our company working with at least those three games in four to six years.
With our games we are planning to connect the world.

Everyone have a Voice

Yes, your donation will put you in the position to comment but most important to suggest.
Each dollar you give will become in time, time that will be used to transform our world in to a Virtual one.

Nothing is impossible

A lot of people won't like the development of this technology and others wont believe that is possible. Remember, Impossible for us means Im-possible.

We know its not easy but that does not make us stop.

We need you! Yes you!
Please, if you want this to be developed but most important if you want to be part of our family:
  • Share our project with others
  • Donate if you can
  • Tell your friends, I mean we will be hiring soon

Thank you for reading and sorry for this presentation this is our first raise funding.
Please contact us or leave comments to cheer the team.
If you donate please send a message with your email so we can track your reward.

update 1.   we got a lot of messages lately asking why a lot of money
it resumes like this
*payments for a crew of 18 to 21 people during 6 years
*equipment : to trace and record the mapping etc
*rent for a place to work and to build our office
*material for the art group to improve the conceptualization of the games we have been designing
and thanks for all pm's  we appreaciate the feelings

story:
Golden Age of Civilizations

Rule your empire, fight or cooperate with thousands of players: this is Golden Age of Civilizations!

Here comes the Golden Age of Civilizations, a semi turn-based MMO strategy game, inspired by, but not following by the classic games of the genre, such as Age of Empires, Civilization and Rise of Nations; mixed up with MMO capability and flavored with the best parts of other good online games.

Who am I?

My name is Gábor Auth, a Java developer, a Linux administrator, an IT architect, organizer of some meetups topic of Java and IT in Hungary and speaker of some IT conference. Here is my CV:

http://wiki.javaforum.hu/display/~auth.gabor/Curriculum+Vitae

What is it?

I have a dream: I'm going to create an MMO strategy game! :)

The players can move or act with their units on the map, build new cities and units, build and improve resources nearby their cities and facilities in their cities. The improved resource (farmland, forest, mine, ...) gives more production to the nearby city and the improved facilities (barrack, wall, court, ...) give more power to the player's units and cities.

The game is semi-turn-based, each unit type has a different time to next move or act after the previous action, so that (for example) you move your Settlers unit at 10pm if the last action has been performed at 8pm with this unit because of the Settlers unit has two hours per action "speed".

The players choose technologies to research to improve their cities and units and allow to build new units or facilities. You can earn technology points and you can improve your technology point income by improve facilities in your cities and improve resources nearby your cities.

The players can initiate negotiations with the neighborhoods, so that you have the decision to declare war, make peace, remain neutral or organize an empire with them. Each empire has a government type (despotism, monarchy, republic, ...), so that the suitable players will be officers in the government of own empire.

Would you like to try it?

https://test.gacivs.info
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.gacivs.android.test

I have not finished yet, it runs only in browsers and Android cell phones, but it works. Join and play with hundreds of players! :)

I want to release early and release often, so the current version is simple, but the feature set is growing week-to-week!

What is it technically?

I started working on my game on spring of 2014. I researched the possibly best architecture based on cutting edge technologies and industrial best practices, it is scalable vertically (better and bigger hardware) and horizontally (more hardware).

I deployed it on cloud, I bought a domain name and SSL certifications, so I spent only a little more than $120 on this project, thanks a lot to open source and cloud technologies!

Some technology facts about the project:

  • Agile development
  • Open source (LGPL 2.1)
  • Based on Java, JavaEE and JavaScript
  • The primary target platform is HTML5 browser
  • The secondary target platform is Android
  • The third target platform is iOS (and/or Windows Phone)

What do I need?

So, this is my hobby project, I do not need your money for expensive hardware and software components, I will focus only the game development and hire subcontractors for artworks and other tasks that I can't do.

What do you get?

The game will go to production with freemium model, the players can join free and play free, but they can pay for features and benefits. What features and benefits? Bonus experience points and you can distribute these points to various skills.

And you can adopt a feature, a bug or an improvement!

So, I have a dream... one day I will publish this game... please help me! :)

Yes! You can help!

Please support it, donate it, test it, share it on social networks, share your opinions with me, discuss about the game with your friends... :)

Links

The public test: https://test.gacivs.info/
The Android test: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.gacivs.android.test

Social

The portal page: https://portal.gacivs.info
The Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/gacivs
The Twitter page: https://twitter.com/gacivs
The Google+ page: https://plus.google.com/+GacivsInfoSite/

story:
Cry of the Dead is a series with five planned installments; the first is named Dacian. Though mostly linear, Dacian offers a few quests and options that can impact your play later in the game. Cry of the Dead exemplifies the value of inner strength despite adversity and the help that family--chosen or born--can bring. It also highlights the struggles that come with being different and experiencing great loss. Three of the four members of this team met through a forum seven years ago. After working with each other on several small projects, Zander decided to make things official and create a company: Jaded Phoenix Studios. He, Zack, and Jade struggled for a while to decide what project should gain first focus as a team. Due to Jade's immense passion and focus, Cry of the Dead won. The entire team believes it is a story and message needed in today's world.

In a world saturated with superstition, doubt and fear, one man must face his future before he can discern his past.

Unable to harness full control of the power that flows through his being, Dacian emits accidental bursts of magic at inopportune moments. These moments typically arise when he has become angry or enraged. His adoptive parents have sought to hide his abilities; but their efforts have proven to be in vain. The type of magic Dacian wields is not typical for humans, as such he is an oddity, in more ways than one. This provides a breeding ground for hate, stemming from ignorance.

The winds have changed, and danger lurks on the horizon. Something has begun corrupting the minds and bodies of living creatures; and it's spreading rapidly.

In order to discover his true self, Dacian must learn to control himself and his temper, and tackle his inner demons.

Mori, located in the world of Valkyr (Val-kay-ear), is a sleepy village tucked into a seaside cove, protected from the ocean by a large barrier reef. Its beaches are a tourist hot spot, and tourism is their main economy. The natives that inhabit Mori follow the ways of their ancestors. Fishers, hunters, gatherers, warriors: these are the main professions of Morians. The story takes place during the week leading up to the Ceremony of Mana, a very important coming of age ritual for Mori's youth.

Along with helping Dacian learn to control and understand his mysterious abilities by playing through his troubling dreams, players will get to build up the town's defenses and stores while experiencing its daily life.

Combat Mechanics Demo available here.

To feel confident in our ability to complete this first installment, we will need $12,000. $10,500 enables us to pay our artists and musician for some more of their expertise as well as what they’ve already done. $600 goes to IndieGoGo for hosting our fundraiser. Another $600 is estimated for materials and shipping costs for our prizes. $300 goes to the boring, administrative parts of producing something commercial like trademarks and copyrights.

Perks range from a special thanks and mention on our website to a piece of custom art or music! In the lower tiers, you’ll find some really cool things like being listed as an author of a book in a travelling library. In the higher tiers, you’ll find a professionally published Art and Story Concept book which will include lore that couldn’t fit into the game as well as behind the scenes stories about the development of the project and art not scene in game!

If our goal is not met, the funds received will go directly toward the creation of more art and the completion of a fully playable demo featuring day one of nine. Once that demo is complete, you’ll see us back for another attempt to complete the missing eight days.

Cry of the Dead is unique in its vision because the author is of First Nations heritage. As such, much of the story, artwork, naming conventions, and cultures presented in its scope are based off of various First Nations tribes. Our team also represents a spectrum of minority groups and neuro-deviance, so the overall theme in Dacian of rising above adversity is something with which we all have a lot of experience.

Though the original demo was received incredibly well, we faced hurdles with the original engine’s limitations and ultimately decided to restart with a more reliable engine. This will be our first completed game, but the team has a plethora of success in other fields. (link to KT’s site, Quality Control, Zack’s Soundhound)

In addition to being a fun experience, we hope that Cry of the Dead will bring a greater awareness to the struggles facing First Nations throughout North America as well as other aboriginal groups across the globe.

As this is very much a project of passion, we are not terribly concerned about turning a profit on this game. The original plan was to use this game as a free proof of concept for the over all Cry of the Dead series. As such, fully funded or not, we will prevail and push forward. Funding just allows us to do so with a much closer deadline.

As a team, we realize that the biggest struggles throughout this process have come in three forms: lack of physical proximity, finicky engine, and art production speed. Realizing this, we decided to uproot all the work we’d done in RPGMaker VX and restart in Ace. This has led to much smoother maps and fewer headaches for our databaser and programming supervisor.

Part of the purpose of this campaign is to be able to buy our main artist’s time and gorgeous work on a salary--meaning they have more time to devote to our project instead of having to slave away at a regular job and only work for us on their off days. This will result in much faster development at the same quality.

We have also expressed concerns as a team about proper first nations representation in some of our effects art. Because of this, we brought in a magnificent Chipewan Dene artist to supplement in places that need an authentic hand.

Despite facing issues of three very different time zones, the team has been able to find ways to work smoothly together and bridge the zones. A large part of this comes from Zander’s history as a global newspaper Editor-in-Chief.

Zander Quinn is a transman with great aspirations and deeply running passions. Raised in the theatre (musical for the most part), there is a certain, calculated flair to his personality, even in stillness. Telling stories started as soon as he could speak, Zander excitedly leapt at the ability to write. He is a voracious reader and instinctive leader. Realizing that his passions lay in the stories themselves instead of a particular medium of telling, Zander created Jaded Phoenix Studios to find a truly multitalented team.

 

Jade Twan is an enthusiastic, quirky RMT stationed in Canada. In addition to her love of natural healing and helping others, Jade has long held a passion for writing, art, and games. Separated from the culture of her first nations heritage by adoption and stigma, Jade's family tree stems from mixed carrier dene and English heritage. As such, she is conscientious and passionate about the culture, rights, and needs of indigenous peoples. After years of telling stories on her own, Jade has found a family with whom she can gleefully create.

Zack Valence is a British musician with a heart of gold and a penchant for helping others. In addition to the fantastic soundtracks and lyrical works he produces, Zack also enjoys a bit of writing, voice acting, and foley work now and then. He can play real instruments as well as manipulating sound files.

Shelbie "KoniraThax" Pilcher is a quiet agender from North Texas who has spent the last eight years pursuing a career in comics and other sequential arts. Do to their high enthusiasm for all things nerdy, they have always loved video games and has always dreamed of working with a strong but humble team of equally enthusiastic and diverse individuals.

We are well aware that sometimes you might really want to get something or help someone out and just don’t have the means. That’s perfectly fine! We are just as grateful for word of mouth recommendations, words of encouragement, and social media shares as we are actual donations.

"Many ages ago, Valkyir was carved from the cosmos by the Old Gods. Their breath became the air, their bodies became the earth, and their tears became the water. From their gifts, came life. Plants, animals and all sorts of wondrous creatures sprung forth unto the land. Before the Gods began their eternal slumber, they bestowed gifts unto the most precious of their creations.

Humankind were given courage, determination and intellect. Elfkind were given intimate knowledge of divine magics and taught to shepherd the souls of the departed. The Sheikh were bestowed with powerful mastery over the elements.

Once their energy had been fully spent on creation, the Gods slumbered, leaving their children in the hands of Njoror, God of the sea.

It is said, that the people of Mori were born from Njoror. Initially we were as fish, living entirely below the waves. Slowly we began venturing into the land where it was discovered that we could breathe the air.

Mother Earth welcomed the new comers and bestowed unto us knowledge of the elements and mana. Although the ocean is not prominently our home, we've retained the ability to breathe underwater. 

Regular ceremonies are held to thank Njoror for his gifts and to praise Earth Mother for her wisdom."

- Odakota Ravenwind

Combat System:

  • Side View Battles
  • FTB Combat System - build up more turns in battle by increasing agility.
  • Combo System - put status ailments to use by setting off combo's, and combo finishers, after inflicting an enemy with an ailment.

Heads Up! - explore everywhere, a popup ? indicates a hidden item very close, and a popup ! indicates a hidden event.

Shop Leveling - Mori's economy has been stunted, help the shopkeepers flourish again by selling them certain items you find while dispatching the aggressive wildlife and monsters that have appeared.

Character and Equipment Customization:

  • Mana Gems: purchase gems to socket into equipment and weapons to directly increase any stat you desire. Beware, the Gems are unstable and might explode, destroying other Gems socketed in that piece of equipment. Increasing the Mana Weaver's Shop Level will allow them to create more stable, and stronger, Gems.
  • Mana Crystals: purchase or loot Mana Crystals that can be equipped to character skills to power them up! Add statuses, extra damage, increase the chance to inflict a status, etc!
  • Rage Generation: generating during combat, Rage is an extra resource that, when enough has been gained, will allow the player to utilize massive attacks against the enemy. Find and loot different Rage Generation Styles hidden throughout the world.

Dacian (Day-Shan)

Age: 24

Height: 6'4"

Class: Shadow Mage

Elements: Shadow, Electric.

"I just want to be myself."

Bio: Adopted by the Blackfoot family. He was found wandering on the outskirts of the Ebon Glade, a cursed forest, when he was just a baby. Uncertain of his exact age or birthdate, the family celebrates his "adopted day" rather than a birthday. Many villagers believed him to be a bad omen, especially with the powers he possesses; but there are many that feel he's destined for greatness.

Typically keeps to himself. Spent the vast majority of his childhood with his adoptive brother Keith. The two quickly became synonymous with mischief, mainly due to Keith's clumsiness. Unable to breathe underwater like the other natives, he and Keith concocted several ideas and inventions in order to help Dacian breath underwater. Most of their attempts failed miserably; one attempt resulted in Dacian's near drowning and has instilled a deep fear of water that lingers to this day.

The son of the village elder, Mikasi (Mee-kah-see), and his group of friends have always been Dacian's main antagonists. In order to escape from them, when he's not working at the inn, Dacian enjoys visiting a nearby oasis that has always held a unique draw on him.

 

Keith Blackfoot

Age: 24

Height: 6'2"

Class: Tribalist

Elements: Physical.

"I will protect her with my life."

Bio: Headstrong and clumsy. Has always been very protective of his family and friends, and is quick to intervene if he sees anyone harassing Dacian. Disapproves of people that make quick judgments of people. Trained as a Tribalist from the time he was 11 and became one of the youngest teachers, mentoring other young Tribalists in the arts of the beast and blade. One of the main creators of the Totemic Beastial Aspect style that is now incorporated into Tribalist training.

Has a major weakness for sweets. If he's protective of family and Dacian, he's definitely over protective of his baby sister, Naomi.

Is the only one of the three siblings to have ventured far from Mori, typically on training missions or accompanying travelers safely across open territory. Deeply concerned by the amount of animals that have become increasingly aggressive over the years.

 

Naomi Blackfoot

Age: 19

Height: 5'9"

Class: Mana Binder

Elements: Physical

"I don't understand, why all the fuss?"

Bio: Naive, pleasant and outgoing. Shed her youthful shyness in her mid teens, and is attempting to embrace the woman she's becoming. A talented Mana Binder and adept in combat, although there's not been much opportunity for her to prove herself with Keith getting in the way. Spent most of her days lazing around the underwater gardens with friends, or toiling away the evenings on the beach enjoying the sunset and the sound of the waves. Longs for adventure and to prove herself to be a strong and capable fighter in the eyes of her older brother.

Excitedly awaits the Ceremony of Mana which will mark her graduation from an adolescent to a woman, and regarded as an adult by their tribe. She's trained for this day for the last 5 years, working hard to hone her abilities.

Programming:

  • Yanfly
  • Kread-Ex
  • TheoAllen & TheTrueCyprien
  • HomeWorks
  • Falcao
  • Vlue

Fonts:

  • Alagard by Hewett Tsoi
  • Absinthe by Franck Trebillac

Custom Art: Konira Thax

Writer & Designer: Jade Twan

Soundtrack: Zackwell Valence

First Nations Tribal Designs: Michael Fatt

Finance, Marketing, and Development Lead: Zander Quinn

story:
We would like to announce a popular game in the West, Lots of people feel amazed and happiness while playing this game.


The game is inspired by 'Yutnori'. 

Yutnori is a popular game, which more than 70 million people play in Asia. The history of this game is full of fun and polished across hundreds of years deep enough to go back to Roman times. That is incredibly interesting.

Created by four people Daesu, Kacper, Minnie, and Yun. 

We intend that this newly created company brought the game which will fit in the modern era.

1. We think this game combines all the things we're best to create, and putting together to this Indiegogo campaign because we can't build this without you.

2. Please help us to make this game a reality. We hope you'll love it as much as we do.


Discovery features of the game!

Family fun game. (More the People more the fun)

When family or friends want to spend fun and enjoyable time, I say this proverb. "YUTGO also won the hearts of enemies." Still do not believe? Give it a Try!


Easy to learn

Even small kids can easily learn and play! You can play, if you read the rules manual or start directly playing.


Throw high!

Special dice are used in YUTGO, named as “Yut”. Instead of rolling, Yut is built to throw. It will make you feel fun, like throwing crazy things. The sound is also very joyful. Millions of people are missing the pleasure of that dice sound. Still don;t believe? Let's throw and feel!



The educational!

A profound impact of inventions on mankind has melted into the game. One passing by that point your horse is the great discovery. While you are playing the game it will not stop the excitement of interesting historical facts hidden in the dark.




Various Special Cards!

Special cards changes the situation of the game, it might get worst or even better. Beautiful cards make game more interesting to play. The humour and wit is a bonus! Now, unplug the card!


HOW TO PLAY


The rules are very simple.


Step 1. Throw the dice. 


Step 2. Move horse on the board.


Step 3. Take a Card. Act as instructed by card.


If you pass your piece (we named horse in YUTGO) to end of board, you will win. 

To cross boxes you need to score points by throwing Yut. A horse is captured (or taken) when an attacking enemy horse replaces it on its box. Smart decision and ingenious strategies will impact the results of game.


Catch

If you catch opponent’s horse, this will results in starting the game from beginning for them.


Carry/lift 

Same team horses may overlap in same box, then all overlapped horses can moves

 together (One’s horse caries others concept). At this time, if you get caught by opponent horse, all you have to start from beginning separately. But in case board is crossed without being caught, the entire overlapped players will finish the race or reach on the goal.


Shortcut

There are many shortcuts to reach the goal on the corners of board.


Special card

The player arrived at special box, has to pull a piece of a special card and must act as directed by the it.


Throw dice one more time

Yut have two sides, if player got all the same side he can throw it one more time, which will add more points. Same rule is applicable if opponent horse is captured.




















Important Thing about this project
This project is all about working together, In every stage of Card designing we will prefer your valuable opinions. We select the best cards by voting.
Please stay tuned on twitter and Facebook.


Together we will make a master piece.

Step 2. Move horse on the board.




Step 3. Take a Card. Act as instructed by card.



If you pass your piece (we named horse in YUTGO) to end of board, you will win. 
To cross boxes you need to score points by throwing Yut. A horse is captured (or taken) when an attacking enemy horse replaces it on its box. Smart decision and ingenious strategies will impact the results of game.

Catch
If you catch opponent’s horse, this will results in starting the game from beginning for them.

Carry/lift 
Same team horses may overlap in same box, then all overlapped horses can moves
 together (One’s horse caries others concept). At this time, if you get caught by opponent horse, all you have to start from beginning separately. But in case board is crossed without being caught, the entire overlapped players will finish the race or reach on the goal.


Shortcut
There are many shortcuts to reach the goal on the corners of board.

Special card
The player arrived at special box, has to pull a piece of a special card and must act as directed by the it.

Throw dice one more time
Yut have two sides, if player got all the same side he can throw it one more time, which will add more points. Same rule is applicable if opponent horse is captured.
































Important Thing about this projectThis project is all about working together, In every stage of Card designing we will prefer your valuable opinions. We select the best cards by voting.
Please stay tuned on twitter and Facebook.


Together we will make a master piece.

story:
This game is a mix of Collectible Card Game and RPG totally redesigned. It has got the best features of RPG and CCG games put together.

Strategy and attitudes will lead players into different stories and battles making this game being fun no matter how many times you play it. 

As game lovers, we'we put our best into this project. Playing Samurai Forge is fun and full of surprises! Time flies and it makes you feel like you can play it forever.

 

Try it now for free (demo version): 

http://store.steampowered.com/app/617350/Samura...

The Samurai Forge game is based on a book by the same author (not released to the general public yet). This story takes place in medieval Japan where the former emperor is mysteriously murdered and an evil army commanded by Azai Hidesada prepares to take over the country. In this scenario, five teenagers enlist on a resistance army and start their journey for learning and becoming Samurais. They will need not only develop fighting skills but also spiritual power, political influence and become honored to be able to face their destinies. Samurai Forge has some historical background mixed with a lot of fantasy emerging the player into a world of wonders.  

Ichiro, son of a famous blacksmith named Amakuni, is a strong boy, full of energy, who spends most of his time working with his father at the forge. Ichiro dreams of replacing his father after his death and finding out what happened to his mother, whom he never met.

Manami was raised by her grandfather, a respected retired samurai. She loves to take care of people and animals. She is very skilled in making and using potions.

Yuta is the tallest of them, son of farmers, jokester, a spirited boy, who has always drawn everyone’s attention. He is a fast runner and makes quick attacks with knives, his favorite weapons. His energy seems endless.

Son of a merchant, Kazuki has no intention to keep the business. He is as big as his father and takes advantage of that to pick fights. He has no other dream but becoming a famous samurai desired by women.

Itaru is a thin, good-looking boy with whom all girls in the village fall in love. Although he was not looking for love, he was looking for revenge on the murderer of his oldest brother. Training hard and dedication is his motto.

 

In Samurai Forge you will find 6 types of cards: Warriors, Accessories (armors, weapons and shields), Potions, Magic, Recipes (ex: recipe to forge a simple shield) and Materials (ex: wood, iron, silk, leather).

All cards have a rarity classification according to the easiness of collecting them:

 

Every warrior has an amount of honor, the higher the card's honor is, the more difficult it becomes to have it under your command. 

Warriors have 6 levels of chakra, and only through the forging practice can you advance your cards' chakra level.

Warriors have one of the four races: Human, Creature, Semi-God and Semi-Demon, a name and gender.

Warriors can be born with special abilities or can acquire them by elevating their chakra level.

Some warriors can wear accessories to improve their performance. 

 

Accessories can be collected or forged during the game. There are three categories of accessories: Armors,Weapons and Shields. Only warriors are able to wear accessories and improve their fighting performance in different ways.

 

Potions can be a very useful resource in battles. There are several types of potions that can help you to build a strong strategy against your enemies. You can also make your own potions in advanced levels.

 

Magic when used wisely can turn a lost battle into victory. Magic can affect one or more cards. Some have collateral effects, others don't.  

 

Recipes are cards that will teach you how to forge equipment or teach you what ingredients to mix in order to make a potion. Recipes are not used in battles.

 

Materials are useful resources used to forge weapons, armor, level-up warriors' chakra, make potions and magic.

 

An Important feature of Samurai forge is that you can learn to forge. Forging can be a good deal of help once you can produce your own weapons and armors. After all, nothing comes without practicing (no pain, no gain).

You need to collect recipes in order to learn how to forge new equipment.

Materials can be found in many places and should be used to forge your equipment.

 

Another use for the forge is to activate warriors' chakras and make them stronger.

Some warriors can suffer a mutation at top chakra levels and become some very rare cards.

Samurai forge gathers a unique set of features mixing strategy, card game, RPG and MMO all in one game:

  • Interactive story that changes according to players' decisions.
  • More than 150 unique hand-illustrated cards among Heroes, Potions, Weapons, Armors, Recipes and Materials.
  • 50 different villages, where in each one you'll find 4-8 missions with different challenges and enemies to defeat.
  • Forge your own weapons and armors.
  • Forge your cards stronger by activating their chakras.
  • Use dark magic and evoke ancient powers to help you in battle.
  • Help other players to complete Guild missions.
  • Level-up to reveal new game features. 
  • Replay any mission as many times as you want and every time enemies will have different behaviors and drop different items.
  • From time to time flash arena challenges will be offered to players. When completing the challenge in time, you will earn wonderful in-game rewards.

 

Above anything else, this game is about collecting! You start with an empty book of cards and can collect over 150 unique cards of different types (Heroes, Weapons, Armors, Potions, Magic, Materials and Recipes). Some of the cards will require a special talent or ability in order to be revealed. You will be fascinated by their special powers and abilities.

Second, this game is about discovery! A whole new world lies unrevealed. The game's map starts in medieval Japan, (new DLCs can be developed to expand worldwide) which is all unrevealed to players. As you advance through the ancient villages and resolve their challenges, you will advance on the map (Civilization style).  

Also, this game is about strategy! The game's story is not linear. Like many RPG Games you can make your choices and the story will change accordingly. There are 5 main characters and each one has a different background and ability.

Not least important, this is not a traditional card game that only copies Magic the Gathering. This game has its original battle system, which relies more on your strategy than on your luck.

Finally, this game is about having fun! It's a collaborative single player and turn based game. What does that mean? It means you can a play as single player as much as you want, but if you would like to join other players around the globe, you can count on them to achieve bigger challenges.  Also, in this sense, we will count on the game's community ideas and suggestions to make this game better at every version.

 

We have made a list of the major reasons for that:

  • It is a Fixed Goal campaign. If we do not achieve our goal this game will not be released (lack of interested people) :(  so sad!
  • You can get exclusive prizes that will not be offered any place else.
  • You can give your ideas and contribute on the game development process.
  • You can have card packs and other premium items at a very reduced price.
  • Be the first, play the game before everyone else. Before general public release, the game will be open for contributors only. 
  • Become an official game contributor.
  • Receive our deepest thanks and live in our hearts forever <3 

 

We are a group of old friends who love playing collectable card games. We are developers, illustrator, designers, film maker, marketing and lawyer by profession who decided to invest on making what we really love, video game!

 

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share this campaign to friends.
  • Join our community discussion group and let us know your ideas.
  • Support us on Steam platform.
