However, we want to publicly thank MiKandiJapan for supporting us with setting up an additional campaign! They've done an excellent job promoting Libra of the Vampire Princess, and they will continue to help us out! Stay tuned for more information!

story:
Hello.
I'm Michael. 
I'm an experienced engineer, product and project manager. I have been working in IT since 2003.
I like clever video games and I believe there are millions of clever people who want to play clever games with other people.

Snek Fite is a multiplayer game. It's not real-time multiplayer.  You have time to think, to program your battle snake and check how it behaves on battle arena. You program a snake to hunt enemy's tails, avoid dead ends, keep its tail secured.

After that, you can run duels with other snakes, run 4-snakes battles and Battle Royale mode (9 snakes on a field). It's what already works.

Now I and my small team want to make more possibilities: tournaments with prizes, programming snakes with AI, new design, cooperative mode, clans and lots of other things. And in the future, if everything will be great, we will manufacture a robosnake. But only if the original game will be successful. 

It's multiplayer. We can't work without clever people. Without you. If you are in intellectual games, love programming (even if you can't), join us. You are an awesome person!

Now we need two important things:

  • you as a player;
  • your friends as players;
  • funding, to be able to finish planned incredible must-have game features.

We will spend money on new design, cooperative mode, tournaments and other important things. We will export all battles historical data to the public, so you can use it to teach your neural network if you are in AI. But you don't have to be a programmer to play Snek Fite. Keep it in mind.

Here is our roadmap: https://github.com/noff/snek/projects/1 

Join our club, get your Snek Hat or Snek T-Shirt and help us to make clever games great again!

The ship has equipment, that is intended for maintenance bot assembly and repair. But in current situation this equipment is must to be used for fight purposes. You'll have to start with a repair bot, which is adapted for battle.

With progress in the game you'll receive some robot and weapons drawings. Saved up enough resources, you'll be able to create real masterpieces of robotics, and arm them with powerful weapon. 

 

So, your crashed ship is a base. Here you can create and repair robots, arm them, open new abilities and research new technologies. Also there is a possibility to communicate, trade and compete to other players.

To protect a base and an AI core from enemies attacks, it's possible to install defensive devices in the ship, like doors, turrets and traps. You can also defend the base by your robot.

It's known that best defense is attack, so the game is varied here. It's necessary to went in exploration missions, hunt for resources, fight against bosses. Alone, or with your friends.

For constructions, creations and improvements you will need resources. You can get them by taking and keeping special mines. But resources are necessary to all, so don't wait that you will get  these mines easily.

 

Action take place on the planet, where an advanced civilization was flourished long time ago. Now this planet is desolate. You can meet here only hostile mechanical monsters. They are patrol wastelands, seek downed ship's remains, and defend resource-rich lands.

You can meet small melee and ranged-combat enemies,

Strong enemies, who use various fighting abilities.

And also bosses and many other types of enemies.

You can't leave the planet now. Artillery, that shot down your ship can do this again easily. Because of that you need to investigate what is going on this planet, what those who command monsters want. And fight a lot to return your freedom.

 

There will be many weapon types in game. Various light and heavy weapons for melee and ranged combat can be created by ship's production capacity.

A good weapon will give you extra abilities.

 

Almost everything can be upgraded: AI core, base, mines, robots bodies and weapons. 

 

I made an unique battle system. The main feature is the active use of temperature and energy.

For example if you will hit enemy with plasma-type weapon, the target will heating. The target's metal will colored red and when temperature reached high value, the target will burned and take additional damage. Metal cools down with time.

If a weapon's damage type is cryo, then a target slows down, covered ice and after all it will be frozen.

You can also disable target temporarily, by overload it system with energy-type weapon.

An environment also influence a battle. For example the air in desert is very hot, and it will be easy to burned a target.

 

The game will be free to play.

Of course there will be a paid services in the game. But a player can complete all quests, achieve a high rating and obtain best equipment (but not unique looked) without investing money. Purchases just let a player save time for level up, get more fun from a gameplay, get unique-looked bots and weapons, accessoires, light up nicknames etc.

There will be a multiplayer in the game. You can go to mission with your friends, fight in an arena and participate in command battle with 5-6 players on each side.

Game will be released at the end of 2019.

 

My name is Sergey Baranov, i'm 32 years old. I'm a 3D-artist for many years. I like my job, and i like video games much. Like many other gamers, i always wanted to create a game by myself. But my programming skill was poor and this is not allow me reach the dream.

About a year and a half ago I realized that I had to try. I don't have any friends, which can leave his job and spent all time for a game developing. Then i start to study Unity-developing and C# scripting. Then I needed skills in riggind, skinning, animation, user interface developing, writing shaders, vfx, mobile optimisation, databases, working with video, etc. It wasn't easy. I wanted to start from simple game, but I could not make a game that I'm not interested in playing. Because of that the project was constantly growing, supplemented and redone. I understood, that i am advance too slow, and i leave my job. The accumulated money was enough to be engaged in development for another year and in the end I had a small demo version for android.

Here is links to my social networks pages:

 

Feel free to download game and try it on android devices:

 

To make a really good game, it has to be done lot of work. In most cases this is creation of in-game content, making many of cool robots, enemies, breathtaking locations and polishing of gameplay mechanics.

Funding will be spend on:

1. Hiring professional developers:

  • Concept artist
  • Environment aritst
  • Unity developer
  • 3d character artist
  • Technical artist
  • Game designer

2. Buying workstations

3. Renting a room for new studio

 

Code it's a special digital item, that can be exchanged for an in-game currency. 

1 Code is equivalent to 1$. So you can choose what to spend your money in the game.

For example, if a perk contain "Code 30" that is mean, when the game is released, you will get an in-game currency with quantity, that can be buy for 30 USD. And you'll can spend this in-game currency for in-game items, that can only be bought for real money.

Starter Kit  (25$)

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Сode 30

Starter Kit+   (25$) limit 200

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 45

Advanced Kit (45$)

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 55
  • Exclusive weapon (only for bakers)

Advanced Kit+ (45$) limit 100

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 85
  • Exclusive weapon (only for bakers)

Pro kit (75$)

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 100
  • Exclusive weapon (only for bakers)
  • Exclusive bot (only for bakers)
  • Closed beta-test access

 

Pro kit+ (75$) limit 50

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 150
  • Exclusive weapon (only for bakers)
  • Exclusive bot (only for bakers)
  • Closed beta-test access

Alpha kit ( 100$)

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 150
  • Exclusive weapon (only for bakers)
  • Exclusive bot (only for bakers)
  • Closed beta-test access
  • Closed alpha-test access

  • Digital art book

  • Exclusive bot (only for bakers)
  • Closed beta-test access
  • Closed alpha-test access

Personal weapon kit (300$) limit 5

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits

  • Exclusive bot (only for bakers)
  • Closed beta-test access
  • Closed alpha-test access
  • Weapon of any in-game type, designed and named specially for you.

Personal bot kit (1500$) limit 3

  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Name in credits
  • Code 300
  • Exclusive weapon (only for bakers)
  • Exclusive bot (only for bakers)
  • Closed beta-test access
  • Closed alpha-test access
  • Bot of any in-game type, designed and named specially for you.

Thank you!

story:
If you are not ready to make a donation, but interested in the game and wish to stay informed - please mail me at cocoa.indiegogo@gmail.com to stay in touch with once per 3-days animated gameplay gifs newsletter.

Game concept

  • It's a game about an adorable neko Cocoa and an item shop she owns
  • Game goal is to fulfil item orders, coming from customers (Like in Recettear)
  • You can take quests or just visit dungeons to find loot (Dungeons have monster encounters and action panel like in MMORPG)
  • Loot is needed to craft equipment or items for sale

About me

My name is Andrew, I'm a lonely developer and a true indie. I don't have much funds, so I use my money wisely. Now I'm available to develop the game full-time till May 19, 2018 with 2 000$ / monthly cost of development. Which I use for a living and paying my friend artist Julia for the great game art.

I've started the development on 27 Feb 2018 on TouchArcade and also on TIGSource on 21 Mar 2018. And my GameDev is going great! I'm happy to say that at the beginning a dungeon crawling part was like this and now it's like this. I've also opened an Imageshack animated gif album with my daily progress and have twitter.

Though I don't have much experience (and it's my first Unity game), so I'm studying programming+gamedesign and implement game features on the way

What We Need & What You Get

As I said, monthly cost of development for me and Julia is 2 000$. I need at least one additional month to make alpha-version of the game (both mobile and Steam early access) and publish it. But, honestly, I need more than that to implement most of the features I imagined.

All this needed to bring you adorable pocket nekoes and great Recettear-like gameplay experience.

Stretch Goals

  • 0 - 2 000 $ (´• ω •`) ♡ - I'll make a game for Android, iOS and Steam, translated into English.

 

  • 4 000$ ヽ(♡‿♡)ノ- 10 characters, 10 locations and 20 monsters total

 

  • 8 000$ ヽ(・∀・)ﾉ - More characters and locations! Story mode! 20 characters, 20 locations and 40 monsters

  • 16 000$ (☆▽☆) - Animated characters! Emotions! Effects! Characters and Cocoa will be animated with different emotions. More characters, locations and monsters!

  • 32 000$ ( ´ ∀ `)ノ～ ♡ - Multiplayer! Share your item shop and adventure guild with others. It will take a year to develop. Form parties with other players and visit dungeons. Create guilds and siege castles.

What I Have Now (05.04.2018)

I made a dungeon crawling part.

Trading part, like in Recettear:

 
 
And here is a small gameplay video, including trading, day / evening / night change, dungeon crawling, crafting and receipe researching (will fully translate it into English on April 15).
 
 

Now I'm working on putting things together and translating into English.

story:
About Tactical Kit for board RPG's

Hello dear Adventurers! My name is Artorio. I'm a game designer in a small freelance game development studio and I want to tell you about my latest "invention". It's a set of tools that helps you to show precise positioning for characters and their enemies in all environments and in any board game that uses turn based combat like DnD, Pathfinder, WoD etc.

Simply, unfold it, draw the play area, place tokens that represent characters and enemies and begin combat where you can count every step and see what your characters see. You can easily take this Kit  outdoors or to a cafe, but its solid reusable surface is even great at home.

Mat made from plastic plates with aluminium arming surface protected with an acrylic layer so you can safely use any type of water marker on it thousands of times. I can create a mat cover from two types of material: natural leather and "denim like" fabric. Also other accessories comes in these two types of material except chips. We create the chips from real wood with laser cutting technology.

The idea to create this kit for actual board gaming came to me few years ago. I created several prototypes, and tried them with friends in our epic adventures. All them work well, but we gained not only EXP while playing, we also tried to figure out what combinations are the best. So this prototype you see here has some "real background". In my party experience its really cool to use it "on board"!

    Perks

    Perks UPD 01

    Meet The Team

    We are a team of professional board gamers and we focus on playing every thing that we can find "playable". Also sometimes, when we are free from our main jobs, we create some stuff and have vacations...

    We believe that gaming does not need "extra" instruments and you can handle all with your imagination, but also we believe that everything goes better with a nice collection of power gaming tools!

    Risks & Challenges

    At this point of the project the risks are at a very low because I have planned and taken care off all aspects involved in the production of Tactical Kits. I have a mate that owns a big company that produces all types of "physical advertising", so he can provide machines for chips and plates production. Also my other mate worked many years in a leather and fabric workshop and he is ready help me with mat covers and bags.

    Also, I really love to create some nice things. Eventually I want some gamers across the Globe have fun in their adventures with tools that I created. It really means a lot for a game designer.

    But you need to understand that I'm not a professional manufacturer. I created prototypes and developed scheme to produce more. Also I have experience in video game development, I know how to follow deadlines. So if everything goes according to my plans, the project will be successful. But I can face some problems and they can make manufacturing process take more time. Just say, you need to know it.

    FAQs

    Do I need an iPhone to use Tactical folding kit?

    You don't need an iPhone to use Tactical folding kit. It also works without Android phones. Simply unfold your Tactical folding kit and use it. Also its 100% wireless!

    What’s in the box?

    Obviously - the "perk" that you buy!

    How many colors can I choose from?

    Sorry, but we can produce only one color for each material but we promise it will be looking nice!

    Do you ship internationally? Is shipping free?

    Yes we ship internationally. Yes, you need to pay for shipping but we try to find most cheap and secure method! If we find a method of shipping in your country cheaper than shipping price, we will send you a package with some surprises like dice kits or special chips, something useful in board games.

    When do you start shipping?

    June 2017. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you placed your order. 

    Where does my money go?

    To buy all materials need for project. On production process. On food for me, and all who are going to work on this project.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you already have hand made "Tactical Folding Kit" that you craft by yourself, in that case it will be a crime if you do not tell the world about how nice it is to play board RPG's with these simple tools!

    • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
    • Remind them to use and share some tools!

    And sorry, English not my native, so i think i do some mess in text, if you find errors please print-screen them, end send me via personal message or email me here - theheagame@gmail.com

    Thx!

story:
FEATURES

- Become a part of an atmospheric dystopian world!
- Make tough moral decisions!
- Explore a hostile city full of mysteries!
- Play as a beggar kid and make it through the day!
- Discover multiple endings!
- Solve riddles and follow creepy rumors!
- Enjoy this arty horror adventure!

Play Episode I here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/700893

 

 

OUR PASSION

We want to let the players dive into an atmospheric dystopian world and let them discover its mysteries! The setting is well thought through and you're going to enjoy all the details and the dark humor. The Players have to make rememberable decisions as the story gets more and more intense.

We have a lot of passion developing this story driven game and want it to be a rich, rememberable experience!

Reasons to Indiegogo

Your contribution enables us to continue working on The Guts of The City! The Indiegogo budget will be used for:

Rent & bills

Modest salaries

Software (Adobe Master Collection), hardware 

Other no-brainer development costs (proofreading, legal help, etc)

 

What you get as donor

- You help us developing the game of our dream and earn our eternal gratitude

- You make a lot of players happy that can't wait for a next episode of the Guts of The City

- Your name will appear in the credits!

(Every donor (who doesn't want to stay anomymous) will appear in the credits, depending on the amount of the donation with 1, 2 or 3 stars next to your name)
